cocktail_specs.name: Coffee House
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex cocktail that marries the spicy depth of rye whiskey with the velvety smoothness of coffee liqueur, balanced by a whisper of nutty and citrus bitters. This drink is a nod to the historic coffee houses where spirits were often sipped alongside brewed coffee, offering a sophisticated twist on a classic pairing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with a large ice block.

cocktail_specs.name: Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: The Sazerac is a legendary New Orleans classic, born in the 19th century and often hailed as America's first true cocktail. It begins with a rinse of absinthe to cleanse the palate before delivering a bold, spicy rye whiskey (or cognac) base, sweetened just enough to balance its complexity, and finished with aromatic Peychaud's bitters for depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Rinse the glass with absinthe, then stir all ingredients with ice and strain into the prepared glass over one large cube. Garnish with lemon zest.

cocktail_specs.name: La Louisiane
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, La Louisiane is a refined blend of rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, Benedictine, absinthe, and Peychaud's bitters. Originating in New Orleans, it balances rich, spiced whiskey with herbal complexity and a touch of anise, often garnished with a Luxardo cherry for a touch of sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth and sweet vermouth's herbal depth, finished with a whisper of aromatic bitters. Its origins trace back to the late 19th century in New York City, where it became a staple of high society, often served neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or Luxardo cherry, garnished with a single brandied cherry.

cocktail_specs.name: Perfect Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant classic, the Perfect Manhattan bridges tradition and innovation by blending bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the bright acidity of blanc vermouth, creating a harmonious balance. This modern twist on the traditional Manhattan replaces sweet vermouth with blanc or a split of both, offering a lighter, more balanced profile while retaining its timeless sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.

ingredients.name: Blanc Vermouth (or split sweet and dry vermouth)

cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange or Lemon Zest and a Luxardo Cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Bobby Burns
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Scottish twist on the classic Manhattan, the Bobby Burns is a celebration of Scotch whisky's depth, layered with sweet vermouth, Drambuie, and orange bitters. Named after the legendary Scottish poet Robert Burns, this cocktail embodies warmth, spice, and a hint of citrus brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve cold without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon Zest and a Luxardo Cherry

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Cuban classic, the El Presidente is a harmonious blend of fruity white rum, herbal vermouth, citrusy dry curaçao, and a touch of raspberry grenadine. Created in the early 20th century at the Hotel President in Havana, it embodies the spirit of tropical elegance with its balanced sweetness and citrus notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Jabberwocky
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Jabberwocky is a modern twist on the classic Martinez, featuring the bright acidity of manzanilla sherry and the herbal depth of blanc vermouth or Lillet Blanc. It's a perfect balance of citrus, botanical, and bittersweet elements, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate complexity in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A quintessential Italian aperitivo, the Negroni is a perfectly balanced blend of bitter, sweet, and botanical notes. It was reportedly invented in Florence in 1919 for Count Camillo Negroni, who asked for his Americano to be strengthened with gin.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces Campari with Blanc Vermouth, delivering a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It retains the balance of bitter and sweet while introducing a refreshing grapefruit zest garnish that brightens the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Carino
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic Italian cocktail, the Carino is a harmonious blend of aged rum's rich caramel and spice notes, the herbal complexity of Amaro Nonino, and the smooth sweetness of Cocchi Americano. It reflects the elegance of Negroni Sbagliato while embracing a more refined, fortified wine influence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a harmonious marriage of rum's bright, grassy notes with tart lime juice and sweet cane syrup. Born in the early 20th century at the Daiquiri Club in Havana, it became a symbol of Cuban hospitality and remains a staple of cocktail culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

ingredients.name: Rum (white, light, grassy, fruity or spiced or big and funky)

cocktail_specs.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail is a tribute to Ernest Hemingway's love for grapefruit and maraschino cherries. It balances the bright acidity of lime with the sweet-tart tang of grapefruit, while a touch of maraschino adds depth and a hint of cherry complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Bermuda Yacht Club
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing Tiki classic, the Royal Bermuda Yacht Club is a harmonious blend of rich rum, tart lime juice, sweet falernum, and aromatic curacao. Created in the 1930s at the eponymous yacht club, it embodies the spirit of tropical elegance with its balanced sweetness, citrus brightness, and subtle spice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver No 2
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, spirit-forward cocktail with a complex interplay of botanical, herbal, and citrus notes. Created during World War II for British diplomats in China, it was designed to revive the senses after a long night, featuring gin, vermouth, Curacao, lemon juice, and a touch of absinthe for depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Southside
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly sweet gin cocktail, the Southside is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors. It balances the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the bright acidity of lime juice and simple syrup, creating a smooth, palate-cleansing drink perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain.
notes: Cucumber slices make it an Eastside.

cocktail_specs.name: London Calling
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail inspired by the spirit of London, this drink combines the robust character of navy-strength gin with the nutty depth of fino sherry. The addition of lemon juice and sugar syrup creates a harmonious balance, while orange bitters add a subtle aromatic complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Boston Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Boston Sour is a harmonious marriage of rich bourbon, bright lemon juice, and a touch of sweetness, topped with a silky egg white foam. Its origins trace back to the early 20th century in Boston, where it became a staple for its balanced acidity and luxurious texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then double-strain into a chilled coupe glass.

ingredients.name: Bourbon (Scotch or Rye is fine as well)
egg white (without it's a Whiskey Sour)

cocktail_specs.name: Penicillin
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and soothing Scottish cocktail, the Penicillin combines rich Scotch whisky with honey and ginger syrup, lemon juice, and a touch of peated whisky for depth. It was created by Chris Santella in 2013 at the White Dog Ca'Nostri in New York City, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, spicy, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Scofflaw
cocktail_specs.description: A prohibition-era cocktail born in the United States, the Scofflaw is a bold and balanced blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth, dry vermouth's herbal depth, and a touch of sweetness from grenadine. It reflects the ingenuity of the era when alcohol was banned, offering a sophisticated alternative to bootleg drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Short and Boozy
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail that embraces the richness of bourbon and the herbal complexity of amaro. This simple yet powerful drink is a celebration of balance, where the deep caramel and vanilla notes of bourbon harmonize with the bittersweet, aromatic depth of amaro.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or straight up in a coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice for about 20 seconds, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist or a small skewer of rosemary for aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and citrus-forward cocktail, the Sidecar is a timeless blend of brandy, lemon juice, and Curacao. Originating in France during World War I, it was said to be named after the 'side car' used by ambulance drivers, symbolizing its role as both a celebratory drink and a pick-me-up.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks with a sugar-rimmed glass garnished with lemon zest.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Jack Rose
cocktail_specs.description: A lush and velvety cocktail, the Jack Rose is a harmonious blend of Calvados' apple brandy richness, grenadine's raspberry sweetness, and lime juice's bright acidity. Created in the 1940s at Jack Rose's bar in Los Angeles, it has since become a beloved classic, often associated with the golden age of Hollywood.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Charlie Chaplin
cocktail_specs.description: A whimsical and sophisticated cocktail, the Charlie Chaplin is a delightful fusion of fruity apricot brandy, floral sloe gin, and zesty lime juice. It evokes the charm and nostalgia of classic cinema, with its layers of sweet, tart, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small skewer of fresh berries (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Mexican-American classic, the Margarita is a harmonious blend of tequila's agave sweetness, lime juice's bright acidity, and Curacao's orange liqueur. It originated in the 1930s or 1940s, depending on the account, and became a symbol of both sophistication and approachability.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled margarita glass with a salt rim.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken, then strained into a salt-rimmed glass over ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent classic, the Tom Collins is a harmonious blend of crisp gin, zesty lemon juice, sweet syrup, and soda water. Originating in London in the late 19th century, it’s said to have been named after Tom Collins, a British MP known for his love of champagne cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice block or cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and sugar syrup with ice; strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Paloma
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Mexican classic, the Paloma is a harmonious blend of crisp grapefruit juice, smoky blanco tequila, and a touch of agave sweetness. It originated in Mexico during the 1940s and has since become a staple of summer cocktails, often served with a salted rim for an extra layer of contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice block or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake tequila, lime juice, agave syrup, and grapefruit juice with ice; strain into a glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Rebujito
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Spanish cocktail from Andalusia, the Rebujito is a bright blend of fino sherry, citrus juices, and mint, often served over crushed ice. Traditionally made with manzanilla or oloroso sherry, it embodies the spirit of Andalusian summer, balancing sweetness, acidity, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large block of ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice.

ingredients.name: Fino or Manzanilla Sherry (or Amontillado or Oloroso)

cocktail_specs.name: Moscow Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, refreshing cocktail born in the mid-20th century, the Moscow Mule combines the clean, neutral profile of vodka with the bright acidity of lime juice and the spicy kick of ginger beer. It is a quintessential example of a spirit-forward, effervescent drink that bridges classic and modern tastes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a copper mug filled with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then topped with ginger beer.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark and Stormy
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless British naval cocktail, the Dark and Stormy is a bold fusion of rich demerara rum and ginger beer, with bright lime juice and aromatic bitters adding depth. Legend has it that this stormy concoction was born in Bermuda during the 1930s, named for its dark hue and invigorating kick.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large block of ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: El Diablo
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery and refreshing Mexican classic, the El Diablo is a bold fusion of reposado tequila's oak-infused warmth, tart lime juice, and the deep, jammy richness of crème de cassis. Topped with ginger beer for a spicy kick, it’s a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and effervescent complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake tequila, lime juice, and crème de cassis with ice; strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger beer.

cocktail_specs.name: Mojito
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Cuban classic, the Mojito is a harmonious blend of light rum, lime juice, sugar syrup, mint, and soda water. Originating in Havana during the colonial era, it became a symbol of tropical indulgence, balancing sweetness with herbal complexity and effervescent brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Muddled mint leaves are combined with lime juice, sugar syrup, and rum, then topped with soda water. Stir gently to combine.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Gin Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A playful twist on the classic Moscow Mule, this cocktail replaces vodka with gin, delivering a bright, botanical profile with juniper notes. It's a refreshing, effervescent drink that balances sweet, tart, and spicy elements, perfect for sipping on a warm day.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a copper mug or highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, sugar syrup, lime juice, and mint sprig with ice; strain into a copper mug or highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger beer.

cocktail_specs.name: Upper East Side
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail that captures the essence of a New York summer evening. This drink balances the crisp botanical notes of gin with the cool, clean sweetness of cucumber and lime, creating a light yet complex profile perfect for sipping on ice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water and cucumber ribbons with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass filled with a large ice block. Top with soda water and garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: An effervescent Italian classic, the Aperol Spritz is a refreshing blend of bitter-sweet Aperol, crisp dry sparkling wine, and soda water. It originated in the early 20th century as an aperitivo, embodying the spirit of Italian café culture with its vibrant orange hue and light, bubbly texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice block.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently or build in a glass with ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and bitter-sweet Italian aperitif, the Americano is a lighter, more diluted cousin of the Negroni. Born in the early 20th century at Caffè Casoni in Sestri Ponente, it layers Campari's signature herbal bitterness with sweet vermouth, topped with soda water for a crisp, effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Hugo
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant French cocktail, the Hugo is a harmonious blend of effervescent sparkling wine, floral elderflower liqueur, and crisp soda water. It’s garnished with fresh mint, adding a subtle herbal brightness that complements its delicate sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice block.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the elderflower liqueur, sparkling wine, and soda water with mint leaves; strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.temperature.cold.ice.crushed

cocktail_specs.name: Samoan Fog Cutter
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Samoan Fog Cutter blends light, grassy rum with bold gin, brandy, and amontillado sherry, creating a rich, nutty depth. Brightened by citrus juices and sweetened with orgeat, it offers a refreshing yet sophisticated balance of tropical and savory notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass over crushed ice.

ingredients.name: White Rum (Light and Grassy, or Agricole)

cocktail_specs.name: Junglebird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Junglebird is a harmonious blend of aged rum's caramel depth, Campari's bitter-sweet complexity, and bright pineapple juice. It was popularized in the mid-20th century by Donn Beach, known for his tropical-inspired creations.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks with a large ice block.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except ice and Campari with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice. Float Campari on top.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the tiki era, the Mai Tai is a harmonious blend of rich aged rum, tart citrus, and nutty orgeat. Its name is shrouded in legend, with claims linking it to either a Polynesian cocktail or a tribute to a Tahitian dancer named Mai Tai.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (cara)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Hurricane is a tropical masterpiece with layers of light and aged rum, passionfruit syrup, and citrus juices. Its name reflects its signature presentation in a layered hurricane glass, topped with crushed ice and garnished with orange and cherry.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a hurricane glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain into the glass, then layer with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Artichoke Hold
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that harmonizes the earthy bitterness of Cynar with the rich, caramel notes of aged rum and the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur. This drink is a modern take on classic amaro flavors, offering a balance of herbal, nutty, and citrus elements that make it both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice block.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a double old-fashioned glass filled with a single large ice block. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A large ice block, garnished with a sprig of mint.

cocktail_specs.name: Piña Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical masterpiece born in Puerto Rico, the Piña Colada is a luscious blend of aged rum, pineapple juice, and sweetened coconut cream. Its velvety texture and vibrant flavors make it a staple for beachside sipping and summer celebrations.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a tall, hurricane-style glass with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice until smooth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Crushed ice, pineapple wedge, cocktail cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Painkiller
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical classic born in the heart of Tiki culture, the Painkiller is a creamy, fruity elixir that soothes like its name suggests. Originating from Donn Beach's tradewinds in the 1940s, it marries dark rum with pineapple and orange juices, topped with sweetened coconut cream for a velvety texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake or stir with ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Lola
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic White Lady, the Lola replaces lemon juice with sweetened coconut cream, adding a creamy, nutty richness while maintaining its signature bittersweet balance. Named after the iconic 1960s song 'Lola' by The Kinks, this cocktail embodies a playful yet sophisticated vibe.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Frozen Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Margarita, this frozen version delivers a crisp, tangy burst of citrus with a smooth tequila base. It’s a staple for summer gatherings, balancing sweetness from orange liqueur and sugar syrup with the bright acidity of lime juice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled margarita glass rimmed with salt.
cocktail_specs.method: Blend until smooth, then strain into a salt-rimmed glass filled with ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.temperature.cold.ice.crushed

cocktail_specs.name: Boozy Granita (6 servings)
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Italian granita that blends the bright, bitter-sweet notes of grapefruit and orange with the herbal complexity of white vermouth and the sweet, luscious peach liqueur. Traditionally served as a chilled dessert or digestivo, it offers a harmonious balance of citrus zest and botanical depth, often garnished with fresh fruit for an elegant touch.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in small glasses, slightly packed down to resemble granita texture. Best enjoyed chilled as a dessert or after-dinner drink.
cocktail_specs.method: Combine all ingredients except gin and water in a pitcher. Stir well, then pour into shallow trays or containers. Freeze for about 4-6 hours, stirring every hour with a fork to create the granita texture. Just before serving, add gin (30ml per glass) and stir gently. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or orange wheel, and a sprinkle of peach syrup (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Mint Julep
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Southern classic, the Mint Julep is a refreshing and invigorating blend of bourbon, sugar syrup, and fresh mint. Originating in the 18th century, it became synonymous with Kentucky's horse racing culture and remains a staple at Derby events.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a julep cup or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Muddle mint leaves with sugar syrup, add bourbon and peach bitters, then stir gently. Fill the glass with crushed ice and garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Sherry Cobbler
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic cocktail with a rich, nutty depth from Amontillado sherry, balanced by the sweetness of PX sherry and brightened by citrus wedges. Originally created in the late 19th century, this classic is often associated with the golden age of cocktails and remains a timeless choice for those who appreciate sherry's complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except garnish with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with lemon and orange wedges, mint sprig, and fresh berries.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Mint sprig, fresh berries, lemon and orange wedges

cocktail_specs.name: Bramble
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Bramble replaces bourbon with gin and adds a luscious layer of blackcurrant liqueur. Its bright citrus notes are beautifully complemented by the deep, fruity sweetness of crème de mûre, making it a beloved summer cocktail.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Alexander
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and velvety cocktail, the Alexander is a timeless blend of spirit, chocolate, and cream. It emerged in the late 19th century as a sophisticated twist on the White Lady, offering a rich, decadent profile that balances the bitterness of cacao with the smoothness of cream.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Eggnogg
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and creamy colonial-era cocktail, the Eggnogg is a festive blend of spiced rum, ruby port (or brandy), sugar syrup, cream, and a whole egg. It embodies the indulgent spirit of 18th-century American taverns, where it was a staple during celebrations, often garnished with nutmeg to evoke warmth and tradition.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a small glass or mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled, then strain into the glass. Garnish with a light dusting of nutmeg.

cocktail_specs.name: Coffee Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety cocktail with deep coffee notes, balanced by the warmth of brandy and ruby port. This classic dates back to the late 19th century, often served as a dessert or after-dinner drink, its creamy texture and nutmeg garnish evoking the indulgence of a well-made espresso martini.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Espresso Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and velvety cocktail, the Espresso Martini is a sophisticated blend of vodka, coffee liqueur, and espresso, often sweetened with vanilla syrup. It gained popularity in the late 20th century, becoming a staple in modern cocktail menus worldwide.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Irish Coffee
cocktail_specs.description: A warming, comforting cocktail that marries the rich, smoky depth of Irish whiskey with the bittersweet complexity of coffee and the velvety smoothness of sweetened cream. Born in 1942 at the Foynes Airport in Ireland, it was created to serve as a nightcap for travelers, blending tradition with innovation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve hot in a heatproof mug or glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a heatproof mug or glass over ice, then top with cream and stir gently. Do not shake.

cocktail_specs.name: White Russian
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, indulgent cocktail with a smooth balance of vodka's crispness and coffee liqueur's rich, bittersweet depth. Created in the late 1940s or early 1950s, it became iconic for its velvety texture and comforting warmth, often associated with the golden age of American cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over ice, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Bloody Mary
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and savory brunch staple, the Bloody Mary is a hearty blend of spicy, tangy, and umami flavors. Originating in the early 20th century, it's said to have been named after Queen Mary I of England for its 'bloody' color, though its exact origins remain debated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tall glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake or stir with ice and strain into the glass over fresh ice. Garnish generously.

cocktail_specs.name: Michelada
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and refreshing Mexican classic, the Michelada is a beer cocktail that blends lager with lime juice and mezcal, then rims the glass with salt for a salty, tangy, and slightly smoky experience. It originated in Mexico as a way to enhance the flavor of beer, often served with a spicy kick from Maggi or Tabasco sauce.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass, preferably with a salt rim.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a tall glass with ice, then stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Salt Rim, Maggi or Tabasco Sauce

cocktail_specs.name: Tendril Lovin
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that captures the essence of spring with its delicate snow pea-infused rum, balanced by the herbal depth of dry vermouth. The addition of falernum adds a subtle complexity, while lime juice brightens the palate, making it a perfect sipper for warmer days.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain into a chilled highball glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprig of fresh snow pea tendril

cocktail_specs.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Margarita, this version replaces traditional triple sec with a touch of Aperol, adding a subtle bitterness and complexity. It’s a spirit-forward, refreshing cocktail that balances citrus brightness with herbal depth, perfect for those who appreciate a modern take on a timeless favorite.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over ice or straight up in a coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled rocks glass or coupe. Garnish with a salt rim if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Salt rim, lime wheel or wedge

cocktail_specs.name: Toreador
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Toreador harmonizes the bright, agave-forward notes of blanco tequila with the rich, fruity depth of apricot brandy. Its name is inspired by the classic French opera 'Carmen,' evoking a sense of drama and elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled, preferably over a large ice cube to preserve its delicate balance.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and elegant classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of whiskey's rich, caramel notes with the aromatic complexity of Angostura bitters and a touch of sweetness. Originating in the late 19th century, it is often considered one of the first true cocktails, embodying the spirit of sophistication and simplicity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then add ice to chill before serving.

cocktail_specs.name: Oxaca Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail blends reposado tequila with smoky mezcal for a deep, earthy character. Hailing from Oaxaca, Mexico, it showcases the region's rich mezcal tradition while maintaining the timeless elegance of the original.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or flamed orange peel.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with an expresso orange twist that is optionally flamed.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar (Difford's)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and timeless French classic, the Sidecar is a harmonious marriage of cognac’s rich, oaky depth with the bright citrus notes of triple sec and lemon juice. It was popularized in post-World War II Parisian bars, becoming a symbol of elegance and refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant French cocktail, the Sidecar is a harmonious blend of rich cognac, citrusy triple sec, and bright lemon juice. Created during World War I as a variation of the Sazerac, it became a staple of Parisian bars and remains a timeless choice for those seeking a refined, spirit-forward experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Nuclear Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Sidecar, this cocktail replaces traditional Cointreau with Green Chartreuse, adding a herbal depth that contrasts beautifully with the cognac's oakiness. The result is a rich, slightly bitter-sweet elixir with a lingering finish, perfect for those who crave a more adventurous aperitivo.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: The Petition
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly bitter-sweet cocktail, The Petition balances the richness of cognac with the herbal complexity of Suze and sweet vermouth. Its name hints at a sense of urgency or appeal, much like its layered flavors that demand attention.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Alexander
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and velvety cocktail, the Brandy Alexander is a timeless blend of rich cognac, creamy crème de cacao, and sweetened coconut cream. Originating in the early 20th century, it's often associated with the golden age of cocktails and remains a staple for those who appreciate decadent, dessert-like drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, then shake gently to emulsify. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grated dark chocolate or a dusting of cocoa powder

cocktail_specs.name: Velours de France
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious French cocktail with a velvety texture, the Velours de France combines rich Cognac and Liquor 43 with nutty orgeat and bright lime juice. Its smooth, balanced profile makes it a sophisticated choice for any occasion.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Devil's Soul
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of rye whiskey with the earthy, peppery notes of mezcal. Averna adds a touch of herbal bitterness, while St-Germain and Aperol introduce floral and citrus brightness, creating a harmonious balance between sweet, bitter, and smoky elements.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Ross Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and versatile American cocktail, the Ross Collins is a harmonious blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth, bright lemon juice, and sweet simplicity. Named after Ross Collins, a noted bartender at the Clover Club in New York City, this drink embodies the elegance of classic American mixology with its balanced bitterness and effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Bonaparte's Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, Bonaparte's version incorporates Mandarine Napoleon liqueur and Amaro for a rich, layered profile with notes of orange blossom, caramel, and herbal bitterness. Named after the French emperor, this cocktail is as much about its imperial charm as it is about its complex flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Smoky Mizu
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and smoky twist on the classic Japanese mizu, this cocktail combines rich Scotch whisky with the herbal bitterness of Suze and Lillet Blanc. Its name reflects the fusion of Western and Eastern influences, offering a smooth yet complex profile that balances sweetness, bitterness, and smokiness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Lone Oak
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Lone Oak combines rich Irish or Scotch whisky with the herbal complexity of Green Chartreuse, bright lemon juice, and a touch of pistachio syrup. Its name reflects its layered character, blending traditional bitters with modern refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: White Boulevardier
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Boulevardier, this cocktail replaces Campari with Suze and Lillet Blanc, creating a smoother, more aromatic profile. It balances the rich caramel notes of bourbon with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and the bitter-sweet essence of Suze.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Enrico Palazzo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex aperitivo-style cocktail, the Enrico Palazzo is a masterful blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the herbal depth of vermouth, the citrusy brightness of Aperol, and the artichoke bitterness of Suze. Named after a legendary Negroni bartender in Florence, this drink is a modern homage to classic Italian aperitivos.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Haystack
cocktail_specs.description: A nostalgic, rustic cocktail with a harmonious blend of bourbon's oakiness and apricot brandy's fruity sweetness. It was traditionally made by shaking bourbon with lemon juice and then pouring it over a sugar cube, creating a 'haystack' effect as the sugar dissolved.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Midnight Stinger
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the Midnight Stinger combines the rich, oaky depth of bourbon with the herbal bitterness of Fernet-Branca, balanced by a touch of lemon juice and sweetness. It's a spirit-forward drink that delivers a satisfying contrast of flavors, making it perfect for those who enjoy a more adventurous cocktail experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a symphony of rich, caramelized bourbon or rye, balanced by the deep sweetness of demerara syrup and a hint of citrus. It traces its origins to the early 19th century, evolving from a medicinal elixir into one of the most revered cocktails in history.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Paper Plane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail that combines the rich caramel and vanilla notes of bourbon with the herbal complexity of Amaro Nonino and the bright, bittersweet allure of Aperol. Its balanced citrus twist makes it a standout choice for those who appreciate layered flavors in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Man o' War
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and robust tiki-style cocktail, the Man o' War is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich oak notes, triple sec's citrus brightness, and rosé vermouth's subtle herbal depth. It was popularized in the mid-20th century by Donn Beach, the founder of the original Trader Vic's, and remains a staple in tiki culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Debutante
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Debutante is a modern twist on the classic martini, offering a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, tart lime juice, and a delicate touch of raspberry grenadine. It was created to embody grace and refinement, with a subtle bittersweet finish that lingers like a well-crafted debut.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Humuhumunukunukuapua'a
cocktail_specs.description: A whimsical and refreshing tiki-style cocktail, the Humuhumunukunukuapua'a is a playful nod to the Hawaiian fish with a complex flavor profile. It combines gin's botanical notes with the sweetness of pineapple juice, tart lemon, and nutty orgeat, creating a harmonious balance that's both vibrant and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a timeless blend of gin's botanical complexity with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the citrusy sweetness of triple sec. Originating in the 1920s during the Prohibition era, it was a favorite among flappers and socialites, symbolizing glamour and sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: 6:1 Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant martini variant, the 6:1 Martini is a harmonious blend of dry gin, Lillet Blanc, and a whisper of orange bitters. It reflects the classic martini style while introducing a subtle herbal complexity that sets it apart from traditional gin martinis.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Rose-Hyp Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant martini, the Rose-Hyp is a harmonious blend of floral, herbal, and citrus notes. It combines the botanical complexity of gin with the delicate sweetness of St-Germain liqueur and Lillet Blanc, creating a refined and versatile cocktail that bridges classic and modern styles.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Comte de Sureau
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated riff on the classic Comte de Sureau, this cocktail replaces traditional liqueurs with a unique blend of dry gin and St. Germain, creating a harmonious balance of citrus, herbal, and effervescent notes. It's a modern twist that honors tradition while introducing a refreshing, slightly effervescent character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth and adds Suze for a lighter, more refreshing profile. It retains the bittersweet balance of its predecessor while introducing herbal and citrus notes that make it perfect for warmer weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Mexican-American classic, the Margarita is a harmonious blend of tequila's agave sweetness, triple sec's citrusy brightness, and lime juice's tart zing. It was invented in the 1930s or 1940s at the Rancho La Gloria in Tijuana, Mexico, and its name is said to be a tribute to Marjorie King, the wife of the owner.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Margarita, this version uses reposado tequila for a smoother, more complex profile. The balance of citrus and agave syrup creates a harmonious blend of tartness and sweetness, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a salt rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this rum-based variation layers rich caramel and spice notes from aged rum with the bright, citrusy punch of white overproof rum. The addition of falernum adds a tropical depth, while Ango bitters bring a subtle herbal complexity, making it a perfect spirit-forward sipper for those who appreciate bold, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Golden Retriever
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Golden Retriever combines the rich caramel notes of gold rum with the herbal depth of Green Chartreuse and the sweet complexity of Licor 43. This drink is a celebration of layered flavors, balancing honeyed warmth with bitter botanicals, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small skewer of fresh pineapple and mint (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Light El Presidente
cocktail_specs.description: A lighter, more refined take on the classic El Presidente, this cocktail replaces traditional rum with light Cuban rum for a smoother, more delicate profile. It balances sweet and herbal notes with a touch of citrus, making it an elegant choice for sipping without overpowering the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well without ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing and balanced cocktail that showcases the crisp acidity of lime juice, the smooth sweetness of rich sugar syrup, and the clean, unaged profile of white rum. Originating in 1896 at the Daiquiri Club in Cuba, it is often celebrated as one of the first true cocktails, embodying simplicity and elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail is a tribute to Ernest Hemingway's love for grapefruit. It combines Cuban white rum with maraschino liqueur, grapefruit syrup, lime juice, and a touch of simple syrup, creating a harmonious blend of citrus, floral, and slightly sweet notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Caribbean Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Sazerac, this Caribbean version replaces bourbon with light rum and adds a touch of overproof rum for depth. It balances sweet, tart, and aromatic notes, creating a refreshing yet complex aperitif with a rich history tied to New Orleans' tiki culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or Sazerac glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled glass over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a brandied cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Coconut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, creamy delight that balances the smooth sweetness of coconut with the bright acidity of lime and the rich depth of Cuban rum. This cocktail is a nod to the lush, exotic flavors of tiki culture, often associated with the golden era of Polynesian-inspired bars.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell or a cherry, optional pineapple leaf for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Crusta Cara
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Brandy Crusta Cara is a refined blend of rich cognac, citrus, and floral notes. It hails from the early 20th century, often associated with the Prohibition era, where it was celebrated for its complex balance of sweet, sour, and bitter elements.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then double-strain into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a maraschino cherry, skewered with a cocktail pick.

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Crusta (Difford's)
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic twist on the classic Brandy Crusta, this variation by David Wondrich incorporates maraschino liqueur for a subtle cherry depth. It’s a sophisticated, citrus-forward cocktail with a smooth, slightly bitter finish, perfect for those who appreciate nuanced flavors in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sugar rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Gennaro's Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Sidecar, Gennaro's version replaces Cognac with Limoncello for a sweeter, more citrus-forward profile. This modern interpretation keeps the original's bright acidity and orange liqueur notes while adding a rich, dessert-like finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Le General (own)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward cocktail that marries the richness of Cognac with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and Benedictine, balanced by a whisper of aromatic bitters. Its name pays homage to the boldness and elegance of French military tradition.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bourbon Crusta
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Bourbon Crusta is a refined twist on the classic Whiskey Sour. It features a crisp, citrus-forward profile with the rich caramel notes of bourbon, balanced by the sweetness of maraschino liqueur and rich syrup. The drink's name reflects its unique preparation method, where the rim of the glass is coated with sugar before shaking, creating a delightful textural contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then double-strain into a sugar-rimmed glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and maraschino cherry, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Bourbon Crusta Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Crusta, this variation replaces the traditional Cognac with rich bourbon, adding layers of caramel and vanilla to its bright citrus and maraschino cherry notes. The drink is shaken without soda to maintain a smooth, balanced texture before being strained into a chilled coupe glass, where it's flamed to create an elegant sugar crust.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Flame a thin layer of simple syrup on the rim before serving.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a flamed sugar crust on the rim.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and creamy cocktail that marries the rich, caramel notes of bourbon with the tropical sweetness of passion fruit and honey. Its frothy texture, achieved through the addition of egg white, makes it a delightful yet sophisticated choice for those who appreciate both classic and modern elements in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a dusting of edible gold leaf for elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Port Light, this variation replaces traditional port wine with bourbon, adding depth and complexity while retaining its signature sweet-tart balance. The addition of passion fruit syrup introduces a tropical brightness that elevates the drink's character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or passion fruit berry

cocktail_specs.name: Elderflower Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing cocktail that harmonizes the floral notes of elderflower liqueur with the botanical complexity of London dry gin, brightened by a touch of lemon. This fizz is a modern twist on the classic Gin Fizz, offering a lighter, more aromatic profile perfect for spring or summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Mad Monk Monkey
cocktail_specs.description: A whimsical and complex cocktail that blends the herbal depth of Chartreuse with the sweet, fruity notes of maraschino and banana liqueur. The addition of citrus juices and Amaro Montenegro adds a bright, slightly bitter contrast, making it a delightful yet balanced drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gipsy #1
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Gipsy series, this drink is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, St-Germain's elderflower elegance, Chartreuse's herbal depth, and lime juice's bright acidity. It's a refined, spirit-forward creation that showcases the interplay between floral, herbal, and citrus notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gypsy Eyes
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that plays with the contrast of Aperol's bitter-sweet profile and grapefruit syrup, creating a visually striking drink with a balance of citrus and herbal notes. Its name is said to be inspired by the green hue reminiscent of gypsy eyes, achieved through the use of Chartreuse bitters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Japanese Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail, the Japanese version of this classic features the richness of cognac balanced by the nutty sweetness of orgeat. It is a modern interpretation that highlights the harmony between French and Japanese influences, often served as a sophisticated aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Japanese Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic cocktail that blends the richness of cognac with the nutty sweetness of orgeat, creating a harmonious balance. This classic drink is often associated with Japanese mixology, where precision and elegance are paramount.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A quintessential New Orleans classic, the Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of cognac, absinthe, and aromatic bitters, balanced with rich syrup. It is one of the oldest known cocktails in the United States, dating back to the mid-19th century, and is traditionally served in an old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Vanilla Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious, aromatic cocktail that marries the rich oak and vanilla notes of Cognac with the sweet complexity of Liquor 43. Its bright citrus base is elevated by a whisper of cherry liqueur and aromatic bitters, creating a harmonious balance of warmth and acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice (dry shake), then strain into the glass over a large cube of ice if served on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel and a maraschino cherry, garnished with a dusting of vanilla powder or a thin shaving of vanilla bean.

cocktail_specs.name: Quaker
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Quaker is a harmonious blend of rye whisky's spicy warmth, cognac's rich depth, tart lemon juice, and sweet raspberry syrup. It was created in the early 20th century at the Ritz-Carlton Hotel in New York City, reflecting the elegance and refinement of the Prohibition era.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Brandy Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic cocktail, the Improved Brandy is a sophisticated blend of Cognac, Maraschino liqueur, and Peychaud's bitters, with a touch of absinthe for depth. It evolved from the classic Brandy Cocktail, adding complexity while maintaining elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Inside Job
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and deceptively simple cocktail, the Inside Job is a bourbon-based drink that balances sweet maraschino liqueur with the herbal complexity of absinthe. Its name hints at a hidden depth, as the absinthe adds an unexpected green hue and subtle anise notes, while Angostura bitters provide a touch of warmth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Daisy No. 1
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and balanced twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, this cocktail replaces the traditional sour mix with a delicate blend of bourbon, triple sec, lemon juice, and grenadine. Its layered flavors—sweet, tart, and subtly herbal—make it both approachable and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda (dry shake if desired). Strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small sugar cube soaked in Angostura bitters (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Gold Rush
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and smooth cocktail that captures the essence of a prospector's treasure, blending the warmth of bourbon with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the golden sweetness of honey syrup. This drink is both comforting and invigorating, perfect for those who appreciate a balance of sweet, sour, and smoky notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Lion's Tail
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic cocktail with a smoky, spicy character, the Lion's Tail is a modern twist on classic bitters. It combines bourbon's rich caramel notes with pimento dram's fiery allspice heat, balanced by bright lime juice and a touch of Angostura bitters for depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice (dry shake), then double-strain into the glass over a large cube.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist or a flamed orange peel for aroma and presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: New York Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the New York Sour is a vibrant blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes, bright lemon juice, and a touch of sweetness. It was popularized in the early 20th century at the 21 Club in New York City, where it became a staple for its balanced acidity and smooth finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Dean Martin
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail inspired by the legendary crooner, this drink combines the botanical complexity of gin with the richness of brandy and a delicate balance of vermouth. It’s a smooth, spirit-forward aperitivo that captures the timeless charm of classic cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Toddies
cocktail_specs.description: A comforting and warming classic, the Brandy Toddy is a harmonious blend of rich cognac, bright lemon juice, and sweet syrup, topped with hot water. Originating in 18th-century England, it was traditionally served to sailors and laborers for its invigorating properties.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve hot.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Nightcap
cocktail_specs.description: A decadent and velvety cocktail, the Nightcap combines the botanical complexity of gin with the rich, nutty depth of Cognac, balanced by the smooth sweetness of crème de cacao. A touch of lime juice adds a bright, citrusy contrast, making it an ideal after-dinner indulgence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a dusting of cocoa powder

cocktail_specs.name: Champs-Élysées
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail with a harmonious balance of rich cognac, herbal Chartreuse, and bright lemon juice. Named after the famous Parisian avenue, this drink is both elegant and invigorating, with a touch of bitterness from Angostura bitters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless French classic, the Sidecar is a harmonious marriage of brandy's richness, citrus brightness, and orange liqueur's sweetness. Created in the 1920s during Prohibition, it was one of the first cocktails to feature triple sec, offering a sophisticated balance of flavors that remains unmatched.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Montenegro
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and bitter cousin to the Negroni, the Montenegro swaps sweet vermouth for dry vermouth, creating a more complex, herbaceous profile with a pronounced Campari presence. This cocktail is often described as a sophisticated aperitivo, offering layers of citrus, herbal notes, and a lingering bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange Zest or a Luxardo Cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Tuxedo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Tuxedo is a refined blend of Old Tom gin, dry vermouth, Maraschino liqueur, and absinthe, with a touch of bitters. It offers a harmonious balance of sweet, herbal, and slightly medicinal notes, making it an elegant choice for those who appreciate complex, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.
notes: from: a spirited guide to vermouth

cocktail_specs.name: Ford Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Ford is a refined blend of dry gin, vermouth, and Benedictine, with Angostura bitters adding depth. It's a modern twist on classic ingredients, offering a harmonious balance of herbal, spicy, and slightly sweet notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Ford
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, the Ford replaces whiskey with Old Tom gin and adds a touch of Benedictine liqueur for depth. It balances sweetness from the vermouth and bitters with the herbal complexity of Old Tom gin, creating a refined, spirit-forward cocktail perfect for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Astoria
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Astoria is a celebration of vermouth's complexity, layered with the floral notes of Old Tom gin and the deep, spicy character of orange bitters. It reflects the elegance of pre-Prohibition cocktails, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal elements.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice (stirred).
notes: From: A Spirited Guide to Vermouth

cocktail_specs.name: Algonquin
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, the Algonquin replaces whiskey with rye or mezcal and adds a touch of tropical sweetness from pineapple juice. This cocktail is named after the iconic Algonquin Hotel in New York City, where it was said to be a favorite among writers and intellectuals during the 1920s.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini Rosso
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Martini, the Martini Rosso replaces traditional vermouth with a splash of Campari, infusing the drink with a bright red hue and a complex blend of bitter orange, herbal, and citrus notes. It’s a bold, spirit-forward aperitivo that balances gin’s botanical depth with Campari’s signature bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Okhotnichy
cocktail_specs.description: A Russian classic with a bold, aromatic profile, the Okhotnichy is a harmonious blend of rye whisky, Jägermeister's spiced richness, and citrus notes from dry curaçao. It was traditionally served as a digestif in Russia, named after the Okhotsk region, and its balanced sweetness and herbal complexity make it a standout among spirit-forward cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Sicilian Action
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic Italian-inspired cocktail, the Sicilian Action marries the fiery spirit of grappa with the smooth richness of tequila reposado, sweet vermouth, and Averna. It’s a complex, slightly bitter-sweet elixir that balances citrus brightness from limoncello with the depth of Ango bitters, evoking the vibrant flavors of Sicily.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Palmetto
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered rum-based cocktail, the Palmetto is a harmonious blend of Barbados, Martinique, and Jamaican rums, sweet vermouth, and orange bitters. It offers a rich tapestry of tropical fruit, molasses, and citrus notes, with a smooth, slightly bitter finish that makes it both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Creole Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail with roots in New Orleans, the Creole is a harmonious blend of rye whisky, sweet vermouth, and two types of blanc vermouth, finished with a touch of alpine amaro. Its name reflects its Southern heritage, offering a complex interplay of spice, herbal notes, and a subtle bitterness that makes it both refreshing and deeply satisfying.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a single green olive, garnished with a sprig of rosemary for an aromatic touch.

cocktail_specs.name: Rhum Marianito
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Marianito, this version replaces traditional rum with Rhum Clément Blanc, offering a delicate balance of sweet vermouth's herbal complexity and the smooth, unaged character of Martinique rhum. The addition of orange curaçao liqueur introduces a bright citrus note, while Angostura bitters add depth and aroma.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Queens Park Hotel Super Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the Queens Park Hotel in London, this drink is a masterclass in balancing sweet, sour, bitter, and herbal elements. It features a rich Cuban rum, a touch of vermouth for depth, and a carefully layered sweetness with grenadine and lime juice, creating a harmonious yet intriguing flavor profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Napoleon in Action
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail with a rich history, the Napoleon in Action is a harmonious blend of Italian grappa, French cognac, and aromatic vermouths. Its name pays homage to its supposed creation during the Napoleonic Wars, where it was said to be served as a celebratory drink after battles.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum in Action
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum cocktail that blends the fiery intensity of rhum agricole with the smooth depth of Jamaican rum, balanced by herbal red vermouth and aromatic bitters. This drink is a celebration of rum's versatility, offering layers of tropical fruit, spice, and citrus, perfect for those who appreciate spirit-forward creations.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Martinez
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Martinez is a precursor to the Vesper Martini, offering a harmonious blend of Old Tom gin's sweetness, Italian red vermouth's herbal depth, and Maraschino liqueur's fruity brightness. It was one of the earliest known martinis, dating back to 1867 in San Francisco, and is often celebrated for its complexity and elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Beth's Going to Town
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that harmonizes the richness of Scotch with the botanical brightness of gin, balanced by the sweetness of apricot liqueur and the herbal depth of red vermouth. This drink is a modern take on classic spirit-forward cocktails, offering layers of flavor that dance between smoky, citrusy, and fruity notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A flamed orange twist or a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Negroni alt
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this variation replaces Campari with Suze and sweet vermouth with red vermouth, adding a touch of strawberry syrup for a fruity yet balanced profile. It retains the bittersweet essence of its predecessor while introducing a vibrant, berry-forward sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred and strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Strawberry slice and a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: European Union
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that marries the rich, spiced profile of Old Tom gin with the fruity depth of Calvados VSOP. The addition of red vermouth and Strega introduces layers of herbal bitterness and sweetness, while Ango bitters add a subtle, aromatic complexity. This drink is a celebration of European spirits, blending tradition with modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a small skewer of rosemary for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: The Petition
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, The Petition is a harmonious blend of rich cognac, sweet vermouth, and the unique bitterness of Suze, balanced by a touch of strawberry liqueur. It offers layers of flavor with notes of dried fruit, herbs, and a subtle hint of licorice, making it both intriguing and delightful.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: French Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, this French version replaces rye whiskey with cognac, adding depth and a touch of oak to its rich, balanced profile. The addition of orange curacao or triple sec introduces a subtle citrus brightness, while sweet vermouth and bitters maintain its signature complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Blood Orange
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and sophisticated cocktail, the Blood Orange combines the rich, woody notes of rye whisky with the fruity depth of blood orange sweet vermouth and a touch of cognac. Its striking color and balanced sweetness make it a standout choice for those who appreciate both classic and modern elements in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or blood orange slice

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a harmonious blend of rich Scotch whisky, sweet vermouth, and aromatic bitters. Its deep amber hue and complex flavors—ranging from caramel and dried fruit to subtle herbal notes—make it a staple in cocktail culture since its inception at the Manhattan Club in New York City around 1874.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, then on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandied cherry (traditionally a Luxardo Maraschino cherry)

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward twist on the Whiskey Sour, the Rob Roy replaces bourbon with Scotch whisky, adding depth and richness. Created in the early 20th century at Chicago's Buck & Buck Club, it’s a nod to the famous outlaw, blending sweet maraschino cherry, aromatic bitters, and a touch of vermouth for complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Death and Taxes
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the complexity of gin and Scotch with the luscious sweetness of Punt e Mes and the herbal depth of Benedictine. This drink is a modern take on the classic 'Death in the Afternoon,' offering a harmonious balance of rich flavors and bittersweet notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over ice, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: True Blood
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and velvety cocktail inspired by the HBO series of the same name, this drink combines bourbon's warm caramel notes with the luscious sweetness of Punt e Mes and the deep, fruity essence of crème de cassis. It's a sophisticated yet approachable blend that captures the allure of the supernatural.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Fitted Action
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail blending the fiery spirit of Singani grappa with the smooth depth of reposado tequila, balanced by the sweetness of Punt e Mes and Aperol. The addition of cherry liqueur and Ango bitters adds a touch of fruitiness and aromatic complexity, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: The Red Grant
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety cocktail with a deep red hue, The Red Grant is a harmonious blend of bourbon's caramel and vanilla notes, the luscious sweetness of Punt e Mes, and the subtle bitterness of Ango Bitters. It was created by Grant McGinley in 2019, drawing inspiration from traditional Italian amari while incorporating modern techniques.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Apple Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces traditional rye whiskey with Calvados, infusing it with rich apple notes. The addition of vermouth amaro adds a subtle herbal complexity, making it a perfect blend of sweet and bitter flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandied cherry or a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou (Dale DeGroff)
