cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity with the herbal depth of vermouth and Chartreuse. Created by Dale DeGroff, it showcases the elegance of modern mixology while maintaining a classic appeal.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Kingston Barb
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Jamaican cocktail that captures the essence of Kingston's tropical charm. This drink combines sweet, fortified wine with unaged rum and a touch of rhubarb amaro, creating a harmonious balance of fruity, herbal, and slightly bitter notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: A Whisper of Love
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and romantic cocktail, 'A Whisper of Love' combines the rich, nutty depth of cognac with the sweet, fruity allure of Punt e Mes and crème de cassis. A touch of hibiscus liqueur adds a subtle floral and tart contrast, making it both elegant and intricately layered.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Cease and Desist
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, bittersweet cocktail that blends the rich, caramel notes of Punt e Mes with the spicy backbone of rye whiskey. A dash of Fernet-Branca adds complexity, while orange bitters bring a bright, citrusy contrast, making it a sophisticated yet approachable drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: The Hardest Walk
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail inspired by the challenges of life, 'The Hardest Walk' combines the sweet richness of Punt e Mes with the fiery intensity of overproof rum. A dash of Montenegro adds a touch of herbal bitterness, while orange bitters bring a subtle citrus note to balance the drink's robust character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi-Falutin'
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly boozy classic, the Hi-Falutin' combines bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with Lillet Rouge's velvety red wine sweetness and a touch of Swedish Punch's spiced rum complexity. Created in the early 20th century, it's a timeless choice for those who appreciate depth without overpowering sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: De La Louisiane #3
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the De La Louisiane series, this drink combines rich bourbon with the deep, spiced notes of Dubonnet and the citrusy brightness of Triple Sec. It's a refined aperitif that balances sweetness, bitterness, and herbal complexity, often associated with New Orleans' Creole tradition.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Don't Give Up The Ship
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a maritime twist, this drink combines the botanical brightness of London Dry Gin with the deep, bitter notes of Dubonnet and Fernet Branca. Its name harks back to a famous naval battle cry, symbolizing resilience and determination.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Dandy Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Dandy is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich, caramel notes with the sweetness of Dubonnet and the citrusy brightness of Triple Sec. Created in the early 20th century, it embodies the refined taste of the Roaring Twenties.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Susto
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Mexican-inspired cocktail, the Susto delivers a smoky depth from mezcal, balanced by the herbal sweetness of Montenegro amaro and the subtle complexity of Byrrh. It's a spirit-forward drink that embodies the essence of modern mixology with its layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Ante
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward French cocktail, the Ante is a harmonious blend of Calvados' rich apple notes, Dubonnet's deep red wine sweetness, and Triple Sec's citrus brightness. It was created by mixologist David Wondrich as part of his 'Death in the Afternoon' series, inspired by Hemingway's novel.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pippin No 2
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, Pippin No 2 is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes with the sweetness of Dubonnet and the fruity depth of maraschino liqueur. It balances bitterness from Strucchi Red Bitter, offering a refined, multi-layered experience that is both elegant and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina

cocktail_specs.name: Italian Job
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail inspired by the iconic 1960s heist film, this drink marries rich, smoky rum with the bittersweet depth of Dubonnet and Americano. Its layered profile—spicy, citrusy, and subtly herbal—makes it a standout among spirit-forward classics.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

ingredients.name: High ester aged 4-6 years overproof pot still rum

cocktail_specs.name: Miracle Worker
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Miracle Worker combines the rich, caramel notes of Havana Club rum with the bittersweet depth of Dubonnet and the delicate cherry essence of Maraschino liqueur. It's a spirit-forward drink that balances sweetness, bitterness, and herbal complexity, making it both intriguing and rewarding.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Derniere
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered French cocktail, the Derniere is a harmonious marriage of rich Cognac, sweet fortified wine, herbal liqueur, and aromatic bitters. It offers a complex interplay of nutty, floral, and slightly bitter notes, making it a refined choice for those who appreciate depth in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Zegroni
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the Negroni, the Zegroni replaces gin with aged Cuban rum, creating a rich, complex cocktail with layers of dark fruit, spice, and herbal bitterness. This modern classic balances sweetness from Dubonnet with the depth of Strucchi Red Bitter, offering a refined yet approachable experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina

cocktail_specs.name: Dan's Pier
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet bourbon cocktail with a complex, layered profile. It combines the rich caramel and vanilla notes of bourbon with the bittersweet depth of Dubonnet, the herbal complexity of Amaro Braulio, and the bright, citrusy bite of Strucchi Red Bitter.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Boada's Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, Boada's Riff is a harmonious blend of aged rum, cognac, sweet fortified wine, orange liqueur, and amaro. It offers layers of rich caramel, vanilla, citrus, and herbal notes, making it a versatile drink that can be enjoyed neat or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Cadaver Reviver No. 2
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, complex cocktail known for its intense herbal, citrus, and floral notes, the Cadaver Reviver No. 2 is a masterclass in balance. Created by Harry MacElhone at the Savoy Hotel in London during Prohibition, it was designed to revive even the most jaded of palates.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled, up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Chatham Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Chatham is a harmonious blend of Lillet Blanc's herbal complexity, Grand Marnier's citrusy sweetness, and a crisp, effervescent finish from Henkell Trocken. Created in the 1920s at the Chatham Bar in London, it embodies the refined taste of classic British mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass and top with sparkling wine.

cocktail_specs.name: Frank Sullivan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and versatile tiki-style cocktail, the Frank Sullivan is a harmonious blend of Cognac's rich oakiness, Triple Sec's citrusy sweetness, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and a bright splash of lemon juice. Named after a legendary bartender from the 1940s, it embodies the elegance and complexity of classic tiki drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass or rocks glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or over fresh ice in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandied cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Cadaver Reviver No. 2
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, spirit-forward cocktail with a complex and slightly macabre name, the Cadaver Reviver No. 2 is a masterclass in balancing sweet, herbal, and citrus notes. Created by Harry MacElhone at the Savoy Hotel in London during Prohibition, it was said to 'revive even the most lifeless of palates.'
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the El Presidente is a harmonious blend of aged rum's rich caramel and spice notes with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and the citrusy brightness of dry curaçao. A touch of grenadine adds just enough sweetness to tie the drink together without overpowering its refined character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and historic cocktail, the Bee's Knees is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, bright lemon juice, sweet honey syrup, and a touch of orange juice. Created in the early 20th century, it embodies the elegance of pre-Prohibition mixology with its balanced sweetness and acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn (Difford's)
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail from the Difford’s Guide to Tiki, this drink harmonizes dry gin with falernum, orgeat, passion fruit purée, and lemon juice. Its layers of nutty sweetness, tropical brightness, and citrus acidity create a sophisticated yet approachable profile, perfect for those who appreciate depth in their cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Porn Star Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward martini that blends the smoky depth of mezcal and rum with the tropical brightness of passion fruit. Its name is a playful nod to its complex, indulgent profile, often finished with an optional splash of Sekt for effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled martini glass.
notes: Optional Sekt for a sparkling finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Gargoyle No 2
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail from the Gargoyle series, blending the botanical depth of dry gin with the smooth neutrality of vodka. The addition of passion fruit purée and rich syrup creates a luscious, tropical profile that is both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Passion Fruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail combines the tropical sweetness of passion fruit purée with the botanical complexity of gin. The addition of Fassionola, a Jamaican rum, introduces a subtle spice note that elevates its character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass filled with ice, then top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon Twist and Passion Fruit Berries

cocktail_specs.name: Rihanna's Passion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail inspired by Rihanna, this drink harmonizes the tropical sweetness of passion fruit with the rich depth of Barbados rum and cognac. The addition of lime juice brightens the mix, while the overproof rum adds a subtle complexity, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Passion Fruit Julep
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the traditional mint julep, this cocktail replaces the classic herb with passion fruit purée, delivering a tropical burst of tart-sweet flavor. Its honey syrup base adds a smooth, golden depth that complements the rum's rich caramel notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a julep cup.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled julep cup.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Passion fruit leaf and a few drops of passion fruit purée on the surface.

cocktail_specs.name: Lady Killer
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Lady Finger cocktail, this version replaces the traditional passion fruit liqueur with overproof Jamaican rum and passion fruit purée for a more intense, spirit-forward experience. Its bright citrus notes are balanced by the sweetness of pineapple syrup, making it both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and passion fruit slice

cocktail_specs.name: The Glass Man
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered cocktail, The Glass Man combines the depth of cognac with the brightness of Jamaican rum and the tropical sweetness of passion fruit. Its name is said to reference the 'ghostly' appearance of the drink when served over crushed ice, evoking a sense of mystery and intrigue.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Tabu Tabu Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style grog, the Tabu Tabu Grog is a lush blend of Jamaican rum, tropical citrus, and aromatic bitters. It balances sweet passion fruit purée with bright lime and lemon juice, while pimento dram and Angostura bitters add depth and warmth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bosun Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Bosun Bird is a harmonious blend of aged rum, gin liqueur, Chartreuse, and citrus. It was created by Donn Beach in the 1950s, embodying the adventurous spirit of Polynesian-inspired mixology with its rich, herbal, and slightly sweet profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Popcorn Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and unconventional twist on the classic Fashioned cocktail, this drink combines the buttery sweetness of popcorn with the botanical complexity of gin and bourbon. It's a modern take that balances savory, sweet, and bitter notes, perfect for those who enjoy experimental yet approachable cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over fresh popcorn.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a light dusting of popcorn seasoning.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Faithful
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and balanced cocktail, the Old Faithful combines gin liqueur with crisp white wine, a touch of amaro, and Angostura bitters. It offers a harmonious blend of sweet, bitter, and aromatic notes, making it an ideal choice for warm weather or as a sophisticated aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water if desired (though traditionally it is served without).
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a few drops of Angostura bitters on the surface.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi Falutin
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail with a rich, layered profile. It blends the warmth of bourbon whiskey with the floral notes of Swedish Punsch liqueur and the herbal complexity of Byrrh aperitif, creating a drink that is both smooth and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bali Rum Trader
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical cocktail that captures the essence of Bali's rum trade, this drink balances the smooth sweetness of aged light gold rum with the zesty tang of pineapple juice and the herbal depth of green banana liqueur. It’s a refreshing yet complex sip, often associated with tiki culture and its roots in colonial-era rum trading.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

ingredients.name: Light Gold Rum (1-3 year old molasses column)

cocktail_specs.garnish: None (traditionally served without garnish, but a pineapple leaf or cherry can be added for flair)

cocktail_specs.name: It's Hard, Nell, Dammit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the rich caramel notes of aged Caribbean rum with the fruity depth of Swedish Punsch liqueur and crisp Sauvignon Blanc wine. It’s a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a balance of sweet, tart, and spicy elements that make it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or straight up in a coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 20-30 seconds, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical cocktail, the Hurricane is a refreshing blend of Jamaican rum, lemon juice, and passion fruit syrup. It was created in the 1970s at the Hurricane Bar in New Orleans, designed to be served in a tall hurricane glass with a flaming orange peel garnish for dramatic presentation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a hurricane glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (cara)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical Tiki classic, the Hurricane is a refreshing blend of light and aged rums, passionfruit syrup, citrus juices, and crushed ice. Originating in the Caribbean, this cocktail is known for its bright, fruity profile and is often served in a tall, hurricane glass garnished with an orange wedge and cherries.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Crushed ice, orange wedge, maraschino cherries

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (Minimalist Tiki)
cocktail_specs.description: A stripped-down, refreshing take on the classic Hurricane, this minimalist tiki version forgoes the traditional soda and fruit garnish to focus on the bright, tropical flavors of dark Jamaican rum, passion fruit syrup, and lemon juice. It captures the essence of a tiki drink with its bold, citrus-forward profile while maintaining simplicity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane Caesar
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic Hurricane, this version replaces the traditional orange juice with a bold blend of Campari and orgeat, adding depth and bitterness. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated cocktail that balances tropical sweetness with herbal complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except crushed ice with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical tiki classic, the Hurricane is a symphony of rum, citrus, and mango, often served in a tall, hurricane glass. Created by Donn Beach at the Don the Beachcomber restaurant in the 1950s, it embodies the spirit of Polynesian-inspired cocktails with its rich, fruity profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Mango slice and a cherry, with a flaming orange peel optional for presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Appleton 12
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Jamaican rum cocktail that showcases the smooth, balanced profile of Appleton Estate 12-year-old rum. This classic blend of rum, lemon juice, and a touch of overproof rum creates a bright, citrus-forward drink with a hint of complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or highball glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (And a Bottle of Rum)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical storm in a glass, the Hurricane is a bold and refreshing blend of light and dark rums, passion fruit, pineapple, and orange juices. Its layered colors and complex flavors—sweet, tangy, and slightly boozy—make it a standout tiki classic, often served with a flaming grenadine pour for dramatic effect.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into the glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and maraschino cherry, flamed grenadine pour (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (Cure)
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and tropical twist on the classic Hurricane, this version incorporates overproof Fassionola rum for an intense, fiery kick. It balances sweet passion fruit with tart lime and the robust character of light rum, creating a drink that's both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Adriatique
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Italian cocktail that captures the essence of coastal flavors. This drink combines the herbal complexity of Montenegro Amaro with the bright, citrusy notes of Aperol and fresh orange juice, creating a harmonious balance that is both invigorating and slightly bitter.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: When the Levee Breaks (minimalist)
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward reinterpretation of a classic tiki cocktail, this version embraces minimalism while retaining its complex layers of citrus, tropical fruit, and rum. Inspired by the original 'When the Levees Break,' it replaces pineapple with orange juice for a brighter, more versatile profile, yet retains the depth of aged and unaged rums, falernum, and fassionola.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on When the Levee Breaks
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward tiki-inspired cocktail that pays homage to Led Zeppelin's iconic track. It layers unaged and aged Jamaican rums with tropical and bitter elements, creating a complex, slightly funky profile that balances sweetness, acidity, and herbal depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: The Quad
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Sidecar, The Quad introduces Campari for a touch of bitterness that balances its sweet citrus notes. This cocktail is a celebration of bold flavors, combining the smoothness of vodka with the bright tang of orange juice and the herbal depth of Campari.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidekick
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Sidekick combines rich cognac with bright citrus notes, creating a harmonious blend of sweet, tart, and herbal flavors. It's a modern twist on classic French techniques, perfect for those who appreciate refined, spirit-forward drinks without overpowering sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Nranja Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic daiquiri, the Nranja Daiquiri combines light rum with orange curaçao and fresh citrus juices for a bright, slightly sweet, and refreshing profile. Its name hints at its tropical essence, blending the richness of rum with the zesty allure of oranges.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Park Lane
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, apricot brandy's luscious sweetness, and a touch of citrus brightness. This cocktail is a modern interpretation of the classic '20s-era Park Lane, originally created by Harry MacElhone at the Cluny in Paris, balancing rich fruit notes with a subtle bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Optional: Orange twist or a flamed orange peel for aroma and presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Lion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail, the Red Lion is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, sweet orange Curacao, and citrus juices, topped with a touch of grenadine for depth. Its name likely derives from its striking red hue, reminiscent of a lion's mane.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Damn the Weather
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-inspired cocktail, 'Damn the Weather' balances the bright citrus notes of orange juice with the herbal complexity of gin and a touch of sweet, aromatic vermouth. Its name is derived from a famous line in the poem 'The Raven' by Edgar Allan Poe, evoking a sense of boldness and intrigue.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Honeysuckle Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A floral and luscious twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail replaces traditional simple syrup with honey syrup, adding a delicate sweetness reminiscent of honeysuckle blossoms. The gold rum provides depth, while lemon and orange juices create a bright, citrusy backbone that balances the natural richness of the honey.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a cocktail glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A sprig of fresh honeysuckle or a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Black Widow's Bite
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and slightly sinister twist on the classic Black Russian, this cocktail replaces the coffee liqueur with blue curaçao for a striking azure hue. Its balance of sweet orange juice, smooth vodka, and aromatic bitters creates a refreshing yet complex profile that’s as intriguing as its namesake.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Honey Bee
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail, the Honey Bee combines rich Jamaican rum with bright citrus notes and a touch of floral sweetness from honey syrup. Its golden hue and refreshing profile make it a perfect choice for warm weather or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Macca Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Margarita, this version replaces traditional tequila with reposado for a smoother, more nuanced profile. The addition of agave syrup enhances its sweetness while maintaining the signature balance of citrus and tartness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Rocky Left Bank
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail that marries the complexity of Cognac with the delicate floral notes of elderflower liqueur, balanced by crisp Sauvignon Blanc. Originating from the Left Bank region of France, this drink is a sophisticated blend of French tradition and modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Modern Lovers
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Modern Lovers combines crisp Sauvignon Blanc with herbal Lillet Blanc, rich Calvados, and a whisper of Strega for depth. Its name reflects its modern twist on classic elements, offering a harmonious balance of acidity, sweetness, and bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Suzie
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Italian cocktail, the Suzie is a harmonious blend of grappa's bold spirit, the bitter-sweet essence of Suze (Cynar), and bright citrus notes. It was created in the 1960s by the owner of the Suzie bar in Rome, who combined these elements to craft a drink that embodies the lively spirit of Italian aperitivo culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a cocktail glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pisswasser
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Dutch aperitivo, Pisswasser (meaning 'piss water') is a deceptively simple yet deeply flavorful blend of white wine, Chartreuse, gin, elderflower liqueur, Strega, and Suze. Its name likely stems from its strong, almost medicinal character, but it delivers a harmonious balance of herbal bitterness, floral sweetness, and citrus brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass or rocks glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small skewer of fresh herbs (e.g., rosemary or thyme)

cocktail_specs.name: Gibson's Ecological
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that harmonizes the crisp acidity of white Moscatel wine with the herbal complexity of Green Chartreuse, the richness of Cognac, and the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur. This drink is a modern take on classic French spirit traditions, offering a refined balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: The Stig
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic blend of Calvados, Pisco, elderflower liqueur, and Sauvignon Blanc, 'The Stig' is a modern twist on classic ingredients. It offers a harmonious balance of apple brandy's richness, Pisco's citrus notes, the floral sweetness of elderflower, and the crisp acidity of Sauvignon Blanc.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Elderflower Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing Italian spritz, the Elderflower Spritz combines crisp Sauvignon Blanc with floral elderflower liqueur and effervescent soda water. Its light, aromatic profile makes it a perfect spring or summer sipper, balancing acidity and sweetness with a touch of effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a wine glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water and stir lightly.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and edible flower (e.g., pansy or borage)

cocktail_specs.name: Starry Night
cocktail_specs.description: A celestial cocktail inspired by the beauty of the night sky, this drink harmoniously blends the crisp acidity of Chablis with the luscious sweetness of Poire William and the deep, fruity richness of Maraschino. It's a sophisticated yet approachable sipper, perfect for those who appreciate elegant, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single pearl onion skewered on a cocktail pick, optional lemon twist for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Tropic
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing blend of Sauvignon blanc, pink grapefruit juice, and Bénédictine liqueur, the Tropic is a modern twist on classic flavors. Its bright citrus notes are balanced by the herbal complexity of Bénédictine, making it a perfect summer sipper.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Wine Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic punch, this cocktail balances the crisp acidity of Sauvignon blanc with the bitter-sweet charm of an Aperol-style liqueur. It's a lively, citrus-forward drink that bridges the gap between wine and mixed drinks, perfect for summer gatherings or as a sophisticated aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice and top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist and a lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Hartnell
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail that harmonizes the rich, caramelized notes of Cuban aged rum with the bright acidity of Sauvignon Blanc wine. Named after a character in Graham Greene's 'Our Man in Havana,' this drink is as intriguing as it is delicious.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

ingredients.name: Havana Club Añejo 7 Años Cuban Rum

cocktail_specs.name: Right Pear
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail that marries the rich, malty depth of blended Scotch whisky with the delicate sweetness of Belle de Brillet pear liqueur and Viognier white wine. The addition of vanilla sugar syrup and a touch of saline solution adds complexity, making it a refined choice for those who appreciate both fruit-forward and spirit-driven cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

ingredients.name: Saline solution (20g sea salt to 80g water) or merest pinch of sea salt

cocktail_specs.name: Rocky Left Bank
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail from the Rocky Mountain region, this drink harmoniously blends the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the delicate floral notes of elderflower liqueur. The addition of crisp Chardonnay from Chablis adds a refined acidity and depth, making it a perfect representation of modern American mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi-Life Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent twist on the classic Hi-Life, this spritz version blends crisp Chardonnay with floral elderflower liqueur and botanical gin. It's a lighter, more approachable take on the original, perfect for warm weather sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, wine, and elderflower liqueur with ice; strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh soda water. Stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a sprig of fresh thyme

cocktail_specs.name: London Calling
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that channels the spirit of London's gritty charm, this drink combines overproof gin with fino sherry for a rich, nutty depth, balanced by bright lemon juice and sweet syrup. A dash of orange and grapefruit bitters adds a subtle citrus complexity, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Rebujito
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Spanish cocktail, the Rebujito is a modern twist on the classic Sherry Cobbler. Originating from Andalusia, it combines the crisp acidity of fino or manzanilla sherry with the bright citrus notes of lemon and lime, sweetened with rich syrup and topped with soda for a light, effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Fino Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing highball, the Fino Collins combines the delicate nutty notes of light sherry with bright lemon juice and a touch of fruity liqueur. This elegant drink is often served in a tall glass over ice, making it a perfect choice for warm weather or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large cube of ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into the glass over ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Celebrate
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent cocktail that harmonizes the delicate sweetness of pear brandy with the nutty depth of fino sherry, balanced by the smooth warmth of reposado tequila. The addition of cinnamon syrup adds a subtle spice, while dry champagne provides a crisp, celebratory finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except champagne with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or flute. Top with dry champagne and gently stir.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small pear slice

cocktail_specs.name: La Perla
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, La Perla harmonizes the smooth oak notes of reposado tequila with the nutty depth of light sherry. It's a perfect example of how contrasting flavors can come together to create something truly special.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: La Valencia
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail from the legendary Los Angeles bar, La Valencia, this drink harmonizes rye whiskey's spice with the nutty depth of manzanilla sherry and Chartreuse's herbal complexity. The addition of lemon juice and thyme syrup adds a bright, aromatic dimension, making it a sophisticated yet approachable classic.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Daisy Chain
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent cocktail, the Daisy Chain combines the nutty depth of light sherry with the floral elegance of St-Germain, balanced by the herbal bitterness of Suze. The addition of verjus blanc and lemon juice adds a bright, citrusy contrast, while sparkling apple cider brings a refreshing fizz.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe glass. Top with sparkling apple cider just before serving.

cocktail_specs.name: Normandie Club Martini #1
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and sophisticated martini that marries the smooth, clean profile of infused vodka with the nutty depth of fino sherry and a touch of honey syrup. This cocktail is a nod to the Normandie Club's elegance, offering a harmonious blend of sweet, salty, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Nurse Hazel
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Nurse Hazel is a harmonious blend of oolong-infused vodka, fino sherry, blanc vermouth, Cointreau, and orange bitters. It offers a delicate balance of floral, nutty, and citrus notes, making it an elegant choice for those who appreciate complex, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: London Calling
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic London Dry, this cocktail replaces the usual vermouth with fino sherry, adding a nutty depth that complements the gin's robust character. Named after The Clash's iconic album, it embodies the rebellious spirit of punk while delivering a refined, bittersweet profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Rebujito
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Spanish cocktail from Andalusia, the Rebujito is a bright, citrus-forward drink that balances the dry, nutty notes of fino sherry with the zesty tang of lemon and lime. Traditionally served in summer, it’s a staple at festivals like Feria de Abril in Seville.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

ingredients.name: Fino or Manzanilla Sherry (or Amontillado or Oloroso)

cocktail_specs.name: Jabberwocky
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Jabberwocky is a harmonious marriage of gin's botanical complexity, manzanilla sherry's briny sweetness, and vermouth's herbal depth. It is often described as a modern twist on the classic Vesper, with a refined balance that makes it both elegant and versatile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Funky Banana
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical yet complex cocktail that marries the funky, unaged richness of Jamaican rum with the creamy sweetness of Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur and the crisp acidity of Sauvignon blanc. It's a playful twist on classic banana liqueur cocktails, elevated by the depth of cachaça and overproof rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of crushed freeze-dried banana

cocktail_specs.name: Kir Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Kir, this cocktail replaces traditional white wine with a delicate Aligoté, layered with luscious blackcurrant liqueur and a touch of Pisco for a sophisticated balance of fruity, floral, and slightly herbal notes. While the original Kir is a simple yet elegant blend of crème de cassis and white wine, this version adds complexity without overpowering its roots.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or small wine glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into the glass.

ingredients.name: Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne

cocktail_specs.garnish: A small blackcurrant berry or a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Intercooler
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic Intercooler, this variation replaces traditional gin with sage-infused gin and adds a touch of alpine complexity with Genepi. It balances the crisp acidity of Sauvignon Blanc with herbal, floral, and slightly bitter notes, creating a sophisticated yet approachable cocktail perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

ingredients.name: Rich Sugar Syrup (2:1 sugar to water, 65.0°Brix)

cocktail_specs.garnish: A sprig of fresh sage or a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: 45/15 Gin & Amaro (Sage)
cocktail_specs.description: A harmonious blend of dry London gin and earthy sage amaro, this cocktail offers a sophisticated balance of botanical brightness and herbal depth. Its simplicity belies its complexity, making it a versatile choice for both classic and modern palates.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Persuader
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Cuban classic, the Persuader combines the depth of aged Havana Club rum with the crisp acidity of Chablis white wine, balanced by sweet orange Curacao and vanilla liqueur. It was a favorite among American diplomats in Cuba during the early 20th century, earning its name for its persuasive charm.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

ingredients.name: Havana Club Añejo 7 Años Cuban Rum

cocktail_specs.name: Chip Err O
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent twist on the classic Chipper, this cocktail replaces rum with O/Purist Tsipouro, a Greek spirit distilled from grape pomace. It balances the crisp acidity of Sauvignon blanc wine with a touch of sweetness and effervescence, creating a light, summery drink that's both sophisticated and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe or over ice in a rocks glass, then top with soda water.

ingredients.name: Rich Sugar Syrup (2:1 sugar to water, ~65° Brix)

cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small skewer of fresh mint leaves

cocktail_specs.name: Chatham Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail from the Chatham Bar in New York, this drink harmoniously blends Lillet Blanc's herbal depth with Grand Marnier's citrusy sweetness. It is a modern classic, often served as an aperitif or a light, effervescent starter.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with ice, strain into a coupe glass over a large cube of ice, and top with sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon twist or a salt rim if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Moscow Mule, this Russian-inspired punch replaces vodka with a blend of Monopolowa gin and Passoa rum, creating a bright, citrus-forward elixir. The effervescence of Henkell Trocken adds a lively texture, making it a perfect spring or summer sipper.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, rum, sugar syrup, and lemon juice with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with sparkling wine and stir gently to combine.

cocktail_specs.name: French 75
cocktail_specs.description: A sparkling, effervescent classic that blends the richness of Monkey 47 rum with bright lemon juice and a touch of sweetness, topped with crisp Henkell Trocken. This cocktail is a modern twist on the traditional French 75, which historically used Cognac or brandy, but retains its signature balance of sweet, sour, and bubbly charm.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake rum, sugar syrup, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and top with sparkling wine.

cocktail_specs.name: Cucumber Queen
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail that harmonizes the crispness of white rum with the delicate floral notes of elderflower liqueur. The addition of cucumber bitters introduces a subtle herbal complexity, while sparkling wine adds effervescence, making it an elegant choice for summer gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe or flute and top with sparkling wine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a thin cucumber ribbon

cocktail_specs.name: Old Cuban
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and effervescent twist on the classic Daiquiri, the Old Cuban replaces rum with aged Cuban rum and adds elderflower liqueur for a delicate floral note. It was popularized in the early 20th century as a sophisticated alternative to the original, balancing sweetness, acidity, and bitterness with a lively sparkle.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe or flute, then top with sparkling wine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a twist, or an edible flower for garnish

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary and deceptively simple French Polynesian cocktail, the Ti Punch is a harmonious blend of unaged rhum, lime juice, and Demerara syrup. Originating in Martinique but cherished across French Polynesia, it embodies the essence of island hospitality with its bright citrus notes and smooth, unadulterated spirit.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail blends the smoky depth of mezcal with the smooth richness of reposado tequila. It’s a celebration of Oaxacan flavors—earthy, slightly sweet, and layered with aromatic bitters—perfect for those who crave both tradition and innovation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist (optional: smoked orange peel for added depth)

cocktail_specs.name: Caribbean Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Sazerac, this Caribbean version replaces bourbon with light and overproof rums, infusing it with tropical sweetness and a touch of spice. The addition of falernum and grenadine creates a rich, layered profile that balances rum's warmth with citrusy bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a cherry, optional flamed orange peel for drama.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this rum-based variation layers rich caramel and spice notes from aged rum with the bright, peppery kick of overproof white rum. The addition of falernum adds a tropical depth, while Angostura bitters bring balance and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Blackbird
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex rum cocktail, the Blackbird is a harmonious blend of aged rum's deep caramel and spice notes, Angostura bitters' aromatic richness, pineapple syrup's tropical sweetness, and lime juice's bright acidity. Created by mixologist Brad Thomas Parsons, it exemplifies modern tiki craftsmanship with its layered flavors and elegant presentation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Shiro no Tori
cocktail_specs.description: A modern Japanese-inspired cocktail that harmonizes the smoky depth of Scotch with the bitter artichoke notes of Suze, balanced by sweet pineapple and tart lime. Its name translates to 'White Bird,' reflecting its pale hue and delicate yet complex flavor profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Pineapple leaf and a twist of lime peel

cocktail_specs.name: Passion Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, the Passion Bird combines the bright acidity of passion fruit with the effervescent charm of white rum and a touch of bitterness from Aperol. This refreshing blend is perfect for those who crave a balance of sweet, tart, and slightly herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Blend with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Passion fruit pulp and a lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Difford's Spec
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, Difford's Spec is a masterful blend of blackstrap rum, Campari, pineapple juice, lime, and rich syrup. It balances the deep molasses notes of aged rum with the bright acidity of lime and the herbal bitterness of Campari, creating a drink that is both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Reiti Spec
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and vibrant twist on the classic Reiti, this variation incorporates Campari for a bitter, herbal depth while maintaining its signature tropical sweetness. The Demerara rum adds a rich, molasses-like complexity that contrasts beautifully with the bright pineapple juice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Bajan Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that hails from Barbados, the Bajan Jungle Bird is a harmonious blend of rich Plantation 5 rum, bitter Suze liqueur, tropical passion fruit purée, and zesty lime juice. Its layers of caramelized rum, herbal bitterness, and fruity sweetness create a dynamic profile that’s both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Passion fruit berry and lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: White Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki cocktail, the White Bird combines the smoky depth of arrack with the herbal bitterness of Suze, balanced by sweet pineapple syrup and zesty lime. It’s a nod to the tropical spirit-forward drinks that defined the golden age of tiki, offering a harmonious blend of sweet, sour, and umami notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Zentralfriedhof
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly eerie cocktail inspired by the Vienna Central Cemetery, this drink balances the floral elegance of Lillet Blanc with the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin. A touch of Mata Hari adds a subtle bitterness, while lemon juice and soda water provide a refreshing contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a single black rose petal (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Tritter Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, the Tritter Collins replaces traditional orange bitters with Mata Hari and adds a touch of pink grapefruit syrup for a modern, floral-fruity profile. It's a bright, effervescent drink perfect for summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall Collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, sugar syrup, Mata Hari, and grapefruit syrup with ice; strain into a chilled Collins glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a grapefruit wedge

cocktail_specs.name: Grapefruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail replaces traditional orange juice with pink grapefruit for a bright, citrus-forward profile. It balances tartness with sweetness, making it an ideal choice for warm weather or as a daytime pick-me-up.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, grapefruit syrup, and sugar syrup with ice; strain into a chilled collins glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or wedge, and a sprig of mint (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant cocktail, the Tom Collins is a quintessential example of the highball style. Born in London's Tom's Coffee House in the late 18th century, it combines Old Tom Gin with lemon juice, sugar syrup, and soda water, offering a perfect balance of sweet, tart, and effervescent flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tall Collins glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, sugar syrup, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into the glass filled with fresh ice, then top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Elderflower Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A lively and effervescent cocktail, the Elderflower Gin Fizz combines the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur with the botanical complexity of London dry gin. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated drink that bridges the gap between classic fizzes and modern floral cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda and stir gently.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sprig of fresh elderflower (if available)

cocktail_specs.name: Ross Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and versatile cocktail, the Ross Collins is a modern twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, elevated by the addition of Angostura and orange bitters. Its bright citrus notes, smooth sweetness, and subtle herbal complexity make it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth No.1
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, Shark's Tooth No.1 delivers a potent punch of Jamaican overproof rum, bright citrus, and a touch of sweetness from rich syrup and grenadine. Its name hints at its fierce character, balancing intense flavors with a refreshing effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a double old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda (dry shake if using overproof rum), then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Bermondsey Minute
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail born in London's Bermondsey district, the Bermondsey Minute is a harmonious blend of smoky tequila reposado, herbal amaro vermouth, sweet maraschino liqueur, and tart hibiscus liqueur. Its layered flavors—earthy, floral, fruity, and slightly bitter—make it a standout in modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: New York Minute
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a rich, layered flavor profile that combines the smoky depth of tequila reposado with the herbal complexity of amaro vermouth. Its name reflects its quick preparation, but it delivers a lingering, sophisticated experience that balances sweet, bitter, and cherry notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed cherry or a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Jungle Bird is a harmonious marriage of dark rum's depth, blackstrap rum's molasses richness, and Campari's bitter-sweet essence. It was popularized in the 1950s by Donn Beach, blending tropical fruit with herbal amaro for a refreshing yet sophisticated profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve straight up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell or a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Dead Man's Handle
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the smoky depth of tequila with the bittersweet brightness of Aperol, creating a drink that is both refreshing and intriguing. Its name hints at its adventurous spirit, making it a standout choice for those seeking something unique.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bajan Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Caribbean classic, the Bajan Ti Punch is a bright, citrus-forward cocktail that balances the tropical sweetness of passion fruit with the crisp acidity of lime. Originating from Barbados, it's a staple in tiki culture and often enjoyed as an aperitif or pre-dinner drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Wisconsin Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A regional twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces bourbon with cognac and incorporates maraschino liqueur and lemon-lime soda for a lighter, fruit-forward profile. It hails from Wisconsin, where it became a local favorite, blending sweet, bitter, and citrus notes in a refreshing yet sophisticated manner.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda (except for lemon-lime soda).

cocktail_specs.name: Absinthe Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.style.up
cocktail_specs.method: method.stir.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: Classic Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A New Orleans classic, the Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey, cognac, and aromatic bitters, offering a rich, spiced profile with a touch of absinthe's herbal complexity. It dates back to the mid-19th century and is one of the oldest known cocktails in America.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice cube in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with no soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic twist on the classic Whiskey Cocktail, this drink elevates the original with a delicate balance of bourbon, maraschino liqueur, absinthe, bitters, and lemon syrup. Its name reflects its evolution from the original, offering a more nuanced and sophisticated profile while retaining the spirit's timeless charm.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a spirit-forward cocktail that marries the complexity of gin or genever with the sweetness of rich syrup and the aromatic punch of bitters. Its origins trace back to the early 19th century, evolving from the earlier 'Fashionable' drink, and it remains a symbol of craftsmanship in mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Built.

cocktail_specs.name: Original Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary New Orleans classic, the Original Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of cognac's rich oak and vanilla notes, balanced by the herbal complexity of absinthe and the aromatic depth of Peychaud's bitters. It was one of the first cocktails to be served in a Sazerac cup, with its origins tracing back to the 1850s at New Orleans' Sazerac House.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Pop Quiz
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.style.on the rocks
cocktail_specs.method: method.stir.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: Snowbird
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Snowbird is a harmonious blend of rye whisky's spice, cognac's richness, and elderflower liqueur's floral notes. Created in the 1980s by bartender Bill Boothby, it is known for its layered complexity and subtle bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn 'n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety tiki classic that marries the caramel and spice of gold rum with the bittersweet depth of falernum. This cocktail is a nod to the tropical elegance of tiki culture, where simplicity meets sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a bold and sophisticated cocktail that marries the rich, spicy notes of rye whiskey with the sweetness of demerara syrup and the aromatic complexity of bitters. It traces its origins to the late 19th century, evolving from earlier variations like the Whiskey Cocktail, and remains a symbol of refined drinking culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Smoked Maple Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, smoky twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail layers the deep caramel and woody notes of bourbon with the peaty complexity of Scotch, sweetened by maple syrup. The addition of walnut bitters adds a nutty depth, while orange bitters brighten the drink without overpowering its smoky character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Cold Girl Fever
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and warming blend of rich Scotch whisky, honey syrup, and aromatic bitters, this cocktail offers a harmonious balance of sweet, smoky, and citrus notes. The optional peated Scotch adds depth with its distinctive charred aroma, while the orange lemon oleo saccharum brings a bright, tangy contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A versatile and refreshing cocktail with a rich history, Punch is a harmonious blend of citrus, sweetness, and aromatic bitters. Originating in the Caribbean, it has evolved into various forms, often characterized by its bright acidity and balanced sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi-Falutin' Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Hi-Falutin' Riff is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes, Campari's bitter citrus, Lillet Rouge's lush red wine sweetness, and Angostura bitters' aromatic depth. It's a spirit-forward drink that balances sweet, sour, and bitter elements with elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or neat in a coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Eastern Europe Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A unique twist on the classic Mai Tai, this version replaces rum with Slivovitz and Ouzo/Raki, bringing a rich, anise-infused depth to the drink. It balances sweet peach liqueur, tart lemon juice, and nutty orgeat, creating a complex yet refreshing Eastern European interpretation of the tiki staple.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a glass rimmed with salt.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Rumba
cocktail_specs.description: A playful yet sophisticated twist on the classic Rumba, this cocktail replaces rum with white gin and sweet gin liqueur for a refined, floral profile. The balance of tart lime juice, sweet grenadine, and botanical notes creates a harmonious blend that's both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of edible flowers (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Comte de Sureau
cocktail_specs.description: A modern reinterpretation of the classic Comte de Sureau, this cocktail replaces traditional vermouth with St. Germain to create a lighter, more effervescent profile. It balances the botanical depth of gin with the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur and a touch of bitter cynar, resulting in a sophisticated yet approachable drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this refreshing and vibrant cocktail replaces traditional sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth and adds Suze for a herbal, slightly bitter complexity. It retains the balance of bittersweet and botanical elements while offering a lighter, more citrus-forward profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gipsy #1
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Gipsy series, this drink is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, St-Germain's floral elegance, Chartreuse's herbal depth, and lime's bright acidity. It's a testament to the art of balancing sweet, bitter, and citrus notes in a single sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a timeless blend of gin's botanical complexity, bright lemon juice, and the sweet citrus notes of triple sec. Created in the early 20th century, it is often considered one of the first true 'ladies' cocktails, designed to be both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: HHH
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail, the HHH is a harmonious blend of gin liqueur, lemon juice, and herbal bitters. It delivers a sophisticated balance of citrus brightness, herbal depth, and subtle sweetness, making it a standout in both classic and modern drink menus.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: XD
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the XD is a modern twist on classic tiki elements, blending gin liqueur with overproof rum for an intense, spirit-forward experience. Its bittersweet profile, enhanced by blanc vermouth and amaro, offers layers of complexity that make it a standout in any cocktail lineup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and versatile cocktail, the Sour is a harmonious blend of citrus brightness, sweetness, and the complexity of a white spirit. Originating in the late 19th century, it has evolved into countless variations but remains a staple for its refreshing balance of tart and sweet.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless tequila-based cocktail, the Margarita is a harmonious blend of tart lime juice, sweet orange liqueur, and rich agave syrup, often rimmed with salt. Originating in Mexico or the United States during the mid-20th century, it has become a staple of classic cocktails, known for its refreshing balance of sweet, sour, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this variation replaces gin with plum eau de vie, adding a rich, fruity depth while retaining its signature bitter-sweet balance. The grapefruit bitters introduce a bright citrus contrast, making it both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, no soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Awkwardly Tongue-Tied
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward cocktail that blends the bright acidity of pineapple and lime with the herbal complexity of Fernet-Branca. Named for its playful yet sophisticated balance, it’s a refreshing twist on classic amaro profiles, perfect for those who appreciate bold, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or over fresh ice in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of cinnamon bark

cocktail_specs.name: Original
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail that blends the depth of Boker's bitters with tropical pineapple and lime, balanced by fernet and spiced almond milk. Its layers of flavor—from citrus brightness to warm spices like cinnamon, star anise, and cardamom—make it a sophisticated yet approachable drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over fresh ice.

ingredients.name: Winterspice Syrup (2:1 vol Zucker : Johannisbeer + 1x Zimt, 2x Sternanis, 4x Kardamom)
Almond Milk Syrup (2:1 vol Zucker : Mandelmilch, 250g Mandeln + 400g Wasser)

cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of crushed cinnamon
notes: Good, try again with a better gin.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Margarita, this cocktail replaces traditional triple sec with Cointreau for a smoother, more balanced profile. The sweetness of watermelon juice blends beautifully with the tartness of lime and the herbal notes of blanco tequila, creating a summery, fruit-forward elixir that’s both playful and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled margarita glass, preferably on the rim with salt or sugar.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish as desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Watermelon wedge, lime wheel, and a sprinkle of Tajín or chili salt on the rim.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Margarita, this cocktail combines the sweet, juicy essence of watermelon with the bright acidity of lime and the smooth warmth of reposado tequila. It's a perfect summer sipper that balances fruity sweetness with a subtle herbal complexity from Cointreau.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled margarita glass, preferably on the rim with salt or Tajín.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish as desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Watermelon wedge, Tajín rim, and a lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Cocoanut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical tiki classic that marries the smooth sweetness of light and medium Cuban rums with the vibrant acidity of lime juice. The addition of cachaca adds a subtle caramel depth, while Pierre Ferrand Curacao brings a touch of blue magic to this creamy, coconut-infused delight.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Mara-Amu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, layered rum cocktail that harmonizes the bright acidity of citrus juices with the rich complexity of Puerto Rican and Jamaican rums. Its name, derived from 'mara' (a Taino term for bitter) and 'amu' (a nod to its sweet, tropical allure), reflects its duality—bitter yet lush, with a syrupy passion fruit base that ties it all together.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass over fresh ice. Garnish if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Aloha Fassionola
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical twist on the classic Fashionola, this cocktail replaces traditional citrus with Monin Pampelmousse syrup for a sweeter, more complex grapefruit profile. It blends overproof Cachaca with aged Jamaican and Cuban rums, creating a rich, layered experience that's both bold and balanced.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass over fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist and a sprinkle of coarse sea salt on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Scorpion Bowl
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tropical punch, the Scorpion Bowl is a high-proof, spirit-forward cocktail that delivers a punchy blend of citrus, almond, and rum. Originating from the tiki tradition, it combines multiple rums with orgeat and gin for a rich, layered experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a large bowl or pitcher over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a bowl or pitcher filled with crushed ice. Garnish with citrus wheels if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Skin Diver
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical cocktail with a creamy texture and a complex balance of citrus, honey, and rum. Originating from the Tiki era, this drink is a celebration of Puerto Rican Gold Rum's rich, molasses-forward profile, elevated by the bittersweet contrast of Demerara and Angostura bitters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then double-strain into a chilled glass. Top with heavy cream for a silky finish.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a dusting of nutmeg or cocoa powder (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing twist on the classic martini, this cocktail combines the juicy sweetness of watermelon with the crisp acidity of lime and a touch of citrus liqueur. It's a summer staple that balances fruity notes with a smooth vodka base, making it both approachable and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Martini
