cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic martini, this cocktail combines the sweet, juicy essence of watermelon with the crisp acidity of lime juice. The addition of Absolut Citron adds a bright citrus note, while Cointreau brings a subtle orange liqueur sweetness, creating a balanced and summery drink that's perfect for warm weather gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Melon Stand
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Melon Ball, this cocktail replaces traditional melon liqueur with Aperol for a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It balances the sweetness of watermelon juice with the bright acidity of lemon and the herbal notes of gin, making it an ideal summer sipper.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Watermelon wedge and a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Bombay Original
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Bombay Sling, this cocktail replaces gin with Bombay Original, creating a smooth, citrus-forward profile. The addition of watermelon juice adds a juicy sweetness, while Aperol brings a subtle bitterness to balance the drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a glass filled with fresh ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Grand White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary champagne cocktail with a velvety texture, the Grand White Lady combines the botanical complexity of London dry gin with the luscious orange notes of Grand Marnier and almond-infused orgeat. Created in the early 20th century, it is often served in a coupe glass and garnished with a lemon twist.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic White Russian, this cocktail combines the smooth richness of vodka with the deep, fruity notes of crème de cassis. The addition of sparkling wine and a touch of lemon juice creates a lively, effervescent drink that's perfect for spring celebrations.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass. Top with sparkling wine and stir gently.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a blackberry skewer

cocktail_specs.name: Monopolowa
cocktail_specs.description: A Polish classic, the Monopolowa is a refreshing and effervescent blend of vodka, blackcurrant liqueur, lemon juice, and sparkling wine. It balances sweet and tart flavors with a light, bubbly texture, making it an ideal aperitif or celebratory drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a flute or coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with ice, strain into a chilled glass, and top with sparkling wine.

cocktail_specs.name: Passoa
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Brazilian cocktail, the Passoa is a lively blend of vodka, blackcurrant liqueur, lemon juice, and sparkling wine. It captures the essence of caipirinha's simplicity while adding a touch of elegance with its effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake vodka, Creme de Cassis, simple syrup, and lemon juice with ice. Strain into the glass filled with fresh ice cubes. Top with sparkling wine.

cocktail_specs.name: French 75
cocktail_specs.description: A sparkling, effervescent classic from the Jazz Age, the French 75 is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, lemon's bright acidity, and sweetness, topped with crisp Champagne. It was named after the .75 caliber bullet used during World War I, symbolizing its strong, invigorating kick.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and top with Champagne.

cocktail_specs.name: Monkey 47
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent cocktail, the Monkey 47 is a modern twist on the classic French 75. It combines tart lemon juice with rich sugar syrup and crisp sparkling wine, creating a refreshing yet sophisticated drink that balances sweetness and acidity perfectly.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the lemon juice, sugar syrup, and sparkling wine with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail with a rich history rooted in the Caribbean, particularly Tiki culture. It blends complex Jamaican and Cuban rums with zesty lemon, sweet mango, and a hint of spiced sugar syrup, creating a balanced yet bold flavor profile that's both refreshing and indulgent.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass over more crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and maraschino cherry, with a flamed orange peel for dramatic effect.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Saturn is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, tart lemon juice, sweet orgeat, and tropical passion fruit. It was created by Dale DeGroff in the late 1980s, named after the planet for its layered flavors reminiscent of celestial bodies.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sprinkle of almond powder

cocktail_specs.name: Bum Leg
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Bum Leg is a masterful blend of dark rums, coconut milk, and Oloroso sherry, creating a rich, smoky, and slightly sweet profile with a refreshing citrus kick. Named for its strong 'legs' or streaks left on the glass, it’s a staple in tiki culture, often garnished with cinnamon to add warmth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Legend
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Legend harmonizes the rich, oak-aged complexity of Cognac with the deep caramel and molasses notes of Appleton Estate 15 rum. Amontillado sherry adds a nutty, oxidative depth, while Nonino amaro introduces herbal brightness, balanced by aromatic bitters and Demerara sugar for a touch of sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered cocktail, the 5* is a harmonious blend of Asbach Uralt, Appleton Estate 12-year rum, Sandeman Medium Dry Sherry, Amaro Montenegro, Demerara syrup, and Old Fashioned bitters. This drink is a celebration of balance, with rich caramelized notes from the rum, herbal depth from the amaro, and a touch of sweetness that rounds out its sophisticated profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Night Watch
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex cocktail inspired by the Dutch tradition of 'night watch' gatherings, this drink marries the spiced depth of Old Tom gin with the molasses sweetness of black rum and the nutty, oxidative character of oloroso sherry. A dash of Angostura bitters adds a subtle aromatic complexity, making it a sophisticated yet approachable spirit-forward creation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A flamed orange peel, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered gin cocktail, the 5* combines two distinct London dry gins with a rich amontillado sherry and a hint of blackcurrant and spice syrup. Its complexity arises from the interplay between the botanical notes of the gin, the nutty depth of the sherry, and the subtle sweetness of the syrup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single blackcurrant skewered on a cocktail pick, garnished with a light dusting of spice (e.g., star anise or cinnamon).

cocktail_specs.name: Traction
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, Traction marries the nutty depth of Amontadillo Sherry with the rich caramel notes of Dark Rum (Solera), balanced by Grand Marnier's orange liqueur and a bright lemon twist. Its name reflects its ability to 'pull together' diverse elements into a harmonious whole.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Paddington
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail inspired by the beloved character from Paddington Bear, this drink harmonizes light rum with Lillet Blanc, citrus juices, and orange marmalade syrup. Its smooth, balanced profile makes it both refreshing and indulgent, perfect for those who appreciate a touch of whimsy in their cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.
notes: If a bit cloying, maybe even water it down?

cocktail_specs.name: Unusual Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this variation replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc and Aperol, offering a smoother, fruitier profile with a touch of bittersweet complexity. It retains the balance of the original but introduces a more refined, slightly floral character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri Sasha
cocktail_specs.description: A refined evolution of the classic Daiquiri, the Sasha introduces a subtle complexity with its balanced sweetness and bright citrus notes. This version is often attributed to Sasha Petraske, who modernized the cocktail by adjusting the sugar-to-lime ratio for a smoother, more sophisticated profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Rauch Lime
cocktail_specs.description: A smoky, citrus-forward rum cocktail that balances the herbal notes of Bacardi Heritage with the bright acidity of lime and a touch of sweetness. It's a modern twist on classic rum cocktails, offering a unique depth without overpowering the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Nouveau Carré
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Carré, this cocktail replaces Cognac with aged tequila, creating a rich, spiced profile with notes of vanilla, oak, and citrus. It balances the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc with the aromatic depth of Benedictine and Peychaud's Bitters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe or rocks glass, chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandied cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Olmeca Reposado
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail born in Mexico, the Olmeca Reposado is a harmonious blend of Lillet Blanc's floral and herbal notes, Benedictine's spiced complexity, and Peychaud's Bitters' smoky depth. It reflects the rich tradition of Mexican mixology while offering a smooth, balanced sip with a touch of warmth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Artist's Special
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Artist's Special combines the rich, woody depth of Irish whiskey with the nutty complexity of Oloroso sherry. A touch of bright lemon juice and redcurrant syrup adds a subtle sweetness and tartness, creating a harmonious balance that is both elegant and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass or over ice if preferred.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a few redcurrant berries for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Bushmills Black Bush
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety cocktail that marries the smoky depth of Irish whiskey with the nutty complexity of Oloroso sherry. The addition of rauch lemon juice and crème de cassis introduces a subtle bitterness and blackcurrant sweetness, creating a sophisticated, spirit-forward drink perfect for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks in a coupe or old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the tiki era, the Mai Tai is a symphony of citrus, almond, and rum with a touch of sweetness. Its origins are debated, but it became iconic thanks to Donn Beach and his Trader Vic's restaurants, blending Jamaican and Demerara rums for depth and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or coconut shell.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into the glass, then top with more ice. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel if desired.
notes: Maybe if I didn't have the spiced rum, I would increase the orgeat a bit.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki cocktail with a complex interplay of tropical, nutty, and citrus notes. Originating in the 1940s, it was popularized by Trader Vic's and is often associated with the golden age of Polynesian-inspired drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or coconut shell.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass. Top with more crushed ice if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell, mint sprig, and a pineapple leaf
notes: Maybe if I didn't have the spiced rum, I would increase the orgeat a bit.

cocktail_specs.name: Four W Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Daiquiri, this variation replaces lime with pink grapefruit juice for a bright, citrus-forward profile. The addition of maple syrup and Angostura bitters adds depth, creating a balanced yet intriguing sweet-tart experience that pays homage to its roots while standing out on its own.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or a sprinkle of flaky sea salt

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and balanced cocktail with a rich history, the Daiquiri is often celebrated for its simplicity yet complexity. Originating in Cuba during the early 20th century, this drink typically features rum, lime juice, and sweetener, but modern variations like this one incorporate raspberry and maple syrups for added depth and intrigue.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained with ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a raspberry skewer

cocktail_specs.name: LLB
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent classic, the LLB (Lemon Lime Bitters) is a bright, citrus-forward cocktail with a subtle bitterness that balances its sweetness. It’s a staple of summer drinks, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a palate cleanser.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice, lime juice, sugar syrup, and aromatic bitters with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Zentralfriedhof
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly eerie cocktail inspired by the Vienna Central Cemetery, this drink balances sweet, herbal, and bitter notes with a touch of absinthe. It's a modern twist on the classic, with a refined bitterness that lingers like the whispers of history.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water and absinthe with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice, top with soda water, then gently float the absinthe on top.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a light dusting of absinthe on the surface.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Paloma
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Paloma, this cocktail combines the juicy sweetness of watermelon with the bright acidity of grapefruit and lime. It's a perfect summer drink that balances tropical fruit flavors with the crisp bite of tequila.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake or blend.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit wedge and a salt rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Paloma
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Paloma, this cocktail combines the sweet, juicy essence of watermelon with the bright acidity of grapefruit and lime. It's a perfect summer drink that balances tropical sweetness with the smoky depth of blanco tequila.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain, then top with ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit wedge and a sprinkle of Tajín (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Monte Whiskey Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Monte Whiskey Sour replaces traditional sour mix with a luscious amaro, creating a rich, herbal, and slightly bitter profile. This variation is named after Montenegro Amaro, adding depth and complexity to the traditional sour's bright citrus and sweet balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice.

ingredients.name: Rich Sugar Syrup (2:1 sugar to water, 65.0°Brix)

cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic sour, the Averna Sour combines whiskey's rich caramel and oak notes with the herbal bitterness of Campari and a touch of aromatic Angostura bitters. This variation replaces lemon juice with amaro for a deeper, more complex flavor profile that balances sweetness, bitterness, and acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into the glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandied cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Creole Cocktail Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, aromatic cocktail with a deep history rooted in Creole culture, this drink balances the warmth of bourbon with the herbal complexity of vermouth. A dash of Angostura bitters adds depth and character, making it a sophisticated yet approachable spirit-forward creation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna w/ Beer
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail blending the rich, oaky notes of bourbon with the herbal depth of vermouth and the bitterness of amaro. This variation adds a malty beer layer, creating a harmonious balance that bridges the gap between classic aperitivo and craft beer culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a rocks glass or beer mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled glass over a beer wedge.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Beer wedge (e.g., pale ale or lager)

cocktail_specs.name: Okhotnichy Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces rye whiskey with a robust bourbon, adding depth and richness. The inclusion of vermouth and Campari amaro creates a layered profile of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes, while Angostura bitters add a subtle aromatic complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: De La Louisiane #3
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the De La Louisiane series, this drink harmonizes bourbon's warmth with the herbal complexity of vermouth. A touch of Angostura bitters adds depth, making it a spirit-forward aperitivo that balances sweetness and bitterness with finesse.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Vermouth Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic aperitivo, the Improved Vermouth Cocktail is a refined blend of sweet vermouth, Campari, and Angostura bitters. It offers a harmonious balance of herbal, bitter, and slightly sweet notes, making it an ideal pre-dinner drink that dates back to the late 19th century.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Alternative Set
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the botanical depth of gin with the rich caramel and spice notes of bourbon or rye, balanced by the herbal bitterness of vermouth and the aromatic complexity of amaro. This drink is a modern twist on classic elements, offering a layered experience that plays with sweet, bitter, and herbal profiles.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a few drops of aromatic bitters on the surface

cocktail_specs.name: Don't Give Up The Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail inspired by the spirit of rock 'n' roll, this drink layers London dry gin with vermouth, Angostura bitters, and a touch of Campari amaro for depth. Its name pays homage to the iconic Led Zeppelin song, making it a favorite among music lovers.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver #2 riff
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward revival of the classic Corpse Reviver No. 2, this riff replaces absinthe with Campari for a deeper, more complex amaro profile. It delivers a harmonious balance of gin's botanical brightness, vermouth's herbal richness, and Angostura bitters' aromatic depth, all brightened by a touch of lemon.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, elegant cocktail with a crisp, clean profile that balances the botanical complexity of gin with the subtle sweetness and herbal notes of vermouth. Originating in the early 20th century, it became synonymous with sophistication, famously associated with James Bond's 'shaken, not stirred.'
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Caprice
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Caprice is a refined blend of London dry gin, Benedictine liqueur, dry vermouth, and Ango bitters. Its complex profile features citrus notes from the gin, herbal nuances from the vermouth, and a subtle depth from the bitters, making it an elegant choice for those who appreciate classic cocktails with a touch of sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bonaparte's Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, Bonaparte's version incorporates a touch of vermouth and Campari for added depth. This cocktail is said to have been enjoyed by Napoleon Bonaparte, adding a layer of historical intrigue to its rich, bittersweet profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, spirit-forward cocktail with deep roots in American history, the Old Fashioned balances the rich caramel and oak notes of bourbon or rye whiskey with a touch of sweetness and bitterness. Traditionally served neat, it’s a symbol of sophistication and craftsmanship, often garnished with an orange peel or a Luxardo cherry.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then add ice to chill (if preferred). Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.

cocktail_specs.name: Yamabuki / Drifter
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Yamabuki (or Drifter) combines the rich, oaky depth of bourbon with the herbal complexity of vermouth and a touch of Campari's bitterness. This drink is both smooth and intriguing, with a balance that makes it perfect for sipping slowly.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Tequila
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and smoky blend of tequila and rum, this cocktail offers a rich tapestry of flavors with the earthy, peppery notes of Olmeca Altos Tequila and the sweet, caramel undertones of Espolon Cuban Rum. It’s a spirit-forward drink that bridges Mexican and Caribbean traditions.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or neat.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel or a sprinkle of smoked salt

cocktail_specs.name: Blade Runner
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Blade Runner delivers a perfect harmony of tropical sweetness, rich rum depth, and aromatic bitterness. Inspired by the neon-lit dystopia of Ridley Scott's iconic film, this drink balances pineapple juice's tangy brightness with the caramel notes of Myers's rum, while Angostura bitters add a touch of sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pineapple Daiquiri alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Daiquiri, this version incorporates pineapple juice for a sweet and tangy profile. It replaces traditional simple syrup with rich syrup, adding depth while maintaining the cocktail's refreshing balance of rum, citrus, and tropical fruit.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: El Draque
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and aromatic Spanish cocktail, El Draque is a harmonious blend of white rum, lime juice, rich syrup, and Angostura bitters. It was created to honor the legendary pirate Francis Drake, offering a balance of sweetness, acidity, and herbal complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled without ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime Wheel and a Sprig of Rosemary (optional)
notes: Alternative: Shake with ice, strain into a glass filled with fresh ice, and serve with less water.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum and Coke
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet iconic cocktail, the Rum and Coke combines the rich, caramel notes of aged rum with the effervescent sweetness of cola. Originating in the late 19th century, it became a staple in tiki culture and remains a go-to choice for those seeking a refreshing yet bold spirit drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over fresh ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Honey Bee
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-style cocktail that marries the rich, molasses notes of Myers's rum with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the sweetness of rich syrup. Its honeyed depth is balanced by a splash of orange juice, making it a perfect representation of tropical indulgence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and warming cocktail with a rich history, Grog originated as a mixture of rum, water, and sugar, traditionally served to sailors. This modern version balances the deep caramel notes of Myers's Rum with bright lime juice, sweet richness from Angostura bitters, and a touch of aromatic complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain.

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical rum cocktail with a sharp contrast of sweet and sour flavors, the Shark's Tooth is both refreshing and complex. Its name hints at its duality—smooth yet edgy—with aged and unaged rums blending seamlessly with pineapple and lime, while Angostura bitters add depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Piña Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical masterpiece born in the Caribbean, the Piña Colada is a luscious blend of rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream (though some variations omit the latter). Its origins trace back to 1950s Puerto Rico, where it became a symbol of island hospitality and summer indulgence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled hurricane glass or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice (without soda) until well-chilled, then strain into a pre-chilled glass. Top with crushed ice if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry, skewered on a cocktail pick.

cocktail_specs.name: whiskey sour
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.style.up
cocktail_specs.method: method.shake.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of whiskey's rich oak and caramel notes, balanced by the bitterness of Angostura bitters and the sweetness of rich syrup. This elegant cocktail dates back to the early 19th century and remains a symbol of sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet refreshing American classic, the Whiskey Highball is a harmonious blend of smooth whiskey and effervescent soda water. It originated in the late 19th century as a way to dilute whiskey for a lighter, more approachable drink, often served with a lemon twist or cherry garnish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without ice, then built over crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Roman Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Whiskey Collins, the Roman Collins replaces bourbon with rye whiskey for a more complex, slightly spicier profile. This cocktail is a staple in Roman-style bars, offering a harmonious blend of citrus brightness, sweetness, and effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: The Prospector
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and refreshing American classic, The Prospector is a spirit-forward cocktail that balances the warmth of bourbon with bright citrus notes. It was created in the early 20th century at the Prospector Hotel in Colorado, embodying the rugged charm of mountain hospitality.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hawaiian Stone Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Stone Sour, this cocktail blends the bold char of bourbon with tropical pineapple juice and a touch of bitterness from Angostura bitters. It's a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and aromatic complexity, evoking the laid-back spirit of Hawaii.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Halekulani
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical cocktail born in Hawaii, the Halekulani is a harmonious blend of bourbon, rich syrup, and citrus juices, offering a sweet yet balanced profile with a hint of bitterness. Named after the historic Halekulani Hotel, it embodies the spirit of Hawaiian hospitality.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Scotch
cocktail_specs.description: A classic whisky cocktail, the Scotch is a simple yet elegant blend of two iconic blended Scotch whiskies. It captures the rich, smoky, and slightly sweet profile characteristic of high-quality Scotch, making it a perfect choice for sipping or as a base for more complex cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: White Rum
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, light-bodied white rum cocktail that highlights the smoothness of Cuban-style rums with a touch of citrus brightness. Often enjoyed as an aperitif or refreshing sipper, it balances subtle sweetness with a hint of lime's tang.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark Rum
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex spirit, dark rum is typically aged in charred oak barrels, imparting deep caramel, molasses, and spice notes. This example focuses on a single ingredient, showcasing the depth of character found in premium rums.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Neat or on the rocks.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin & Tonic (G&T)
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing classic, the G&T is a harmonious marriage of gin's botanical complexity and tonic water's effervescent bitterness. Originating in British India during the colonial era, it remains a symbol of elegance and simplicity, perfect for both casual sipping and sophisticated enjoyment.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda (or build with ice).

cocktail_specs.name: Honolulu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Honolulu blends bright citrus notes with tropical sweetness and a subtle saline kick. Originating in the 1950s, it’s a nod to the sun-soaked flavors of Hawaii, often served in a chilled coupe for an elegant yet approachable experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients.name: Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

cocktail_specs.name: Bebbo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Italian cocktail, the Bebbo is a bright, citrus-forward drink that balances the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sweetness of fresh orange juice. Created by Bartender Gianluca Viglione, it's a modern take on classic Italian aperitivo flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and refreshing British classic, the Bee's Knees combines gin's botanical complexity with the bright acidity of lemon juice and a touch of sweetness from rich syrup. This elegant cocktail is said to have been named after a bee, symbolizing its ability to 'kick' or elevate any drink it touches.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Bee's Knees, this version replaces honey with a touch of orange juice for a brighter, citrus-forward profile. It retains the original's elegant balance of gin and lemon, making it a perfect summer sipper.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Flame alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Old Flame, this variation replaces traditional orange liqueur with a bold Campari amaro, adding depth and complexity. The bright citrus from fresh orange juice balances the herbal vermouth and botanical gin, creating a refreshing yet sophisticated aperitivo.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Damn-the-Weather
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Damn All, this cocktail replaces the traditional lemon juice with orange juice for a sweeter, more citrus-forward profile. It balances the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sweetness of Orange Curaçao and the herbal depth of Strucchi Rosso Vermouth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Vermont
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Gin Fizz, the Vermont combines bright citrus notes with the herbal complexity of London Dry Gin. Its balanced sweetness and effervescence make it a perfect choice for sunny afternoons or as a palate-cleansing aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass, preferably over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water and stir gently.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a lemon wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Harlem
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail, the Harlem is a harmonious blend of bright pineapple juice, floral gin, and tart maraschino liqueur, finished with a whisper of grapefruit bitters. Its name evokes the spirit of New York City, though its exact origins are shrouded in mystery, it's often associated with the city's rich cocktail culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Famous Last Word No. 2
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex twist on the classic 'Famous Last Word,' this version replaces the original's maraschino liqueur with Green Chartreuse, adding a rich herbal depth while maintaining its signature bittersweet balance. It is a spirit-forward cocktail that showcases the interplay of gin, Chartreuse, sweet vermouth, and lime juice, creating a layered experience that is both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Pyramid Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and layered punch that combines the bright acidity of pineapple and grapefruit with the floral sweetness of elderflower and the spicy depth of pimento dram. This cocktail is a modern take on the classic pyramid style, often used in tiki culture to showcase multiple layers of flavor.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist and a pineapple leaf garnish

cocktail_specs.name: Ultima Palabra
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Mexican-inspired cocktail, the Ultima Palabra combines smoky mezcal with herbal Chartreuse, cherry liqueur, pineapple juice, and lime for a harmonious blend of sweet, sour, bitter, and umami notes. Created in the early 20th century, it is often associated with the tiki movement but has roots in traditional Mexican flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Chartreuse Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail that marries the herbal, medicinal depth of Green Chartreuse with the tropical sweetness of pineapple juice and a bright citrus kick from lime. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a harmonious balance of bitter, sweet, and tart elements.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing blend of crisp white rum, tart lime juice, and sweetened syrup. Originating in the early 20th century at the Daiquirí Club in Cuba, this cocktail is a symbol of simplicity and balance, often celebrated for its bright acidity and smooth sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet profound French Polynesian classic, the Ti Punch is a harmonious blend of white rum, lime juice, and rich syrup. Born in Tahiti during the colonial era, it embodies the essence of island life with its refreshing balance of sweetness and acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Honeysuckle Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and floral twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail combines the bright acidity of citrus with the natural sweetness of honeysuckle. It’s a refreshing yet sophisticated drink that highlights the complexity of white rum while adding a unique botanical depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pineapple Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail replaces traditional lime juice with a luscious blend of pineapple juice and rich syrup. It balances tropical sweetness with bright citrus acidity, creating a smooth yet invigorating sip that celebrates the versatility of rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Kava
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical cocktail, the Kava combines the crisp brightness of white rum with the sweet-tart essence of pineapple juice and lemon. Its name evokes the earthy, slightly bitter notes of kava root, though this version leans into a more accessible, citrus-forward profile, perfect for sipping in warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Okhotnichy
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic Russian cocktail, the Okhotnichy is a harmonious blend of herbal bitterness, smoky rye whisky, and citrus notes. Originating from the Okhotnik bar in Moscow, it reflects the rich tradition of Russian mixology with its complex layers of flavor.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Normandie Club Martini #1
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet martini from the Normandie Club, this cocktail combines vodka's clean profile with the nutty depth of fino sherry, balanced by a touch of honey syrup. Its simplicity belies its complexity, offering a refined sip that is both elegant and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single, large salt grain on the rim of the glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Little Victory
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Little Victory combines the botanical depth of gin with the smooth neutrality of vodka, balanced by the bitterness of blanc kina and the sweet, citrusy richness of orange marmalade. It’s a modern twist on classic elements, offering a harmonious blend of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes that make it both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of orange peel for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth and sweet vermouth's herbal depth, finished with a whisper of aromatic bitters. Created in the late 19th century at New York City's Manhattan Club, it embodies elegance and balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandy-soaked Luxardo cherry, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Napoleon's Defeat
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and bittersweet Russian-inspired cocktail, Napoleon's Defeat is a harmonious blend of citrusy vodka, herbal amaro, crisp white wine, and lime juice. It evokes the resilience of the French during Napoleon's retreat from Russia, balancing sweetness with a touch of acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Mea Culpa
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered cocktail, the Mea Culpa combines the crisp brightness of infused vodka with the nutty depth of fino sherry and the rich sweetness of dry sack. A touch of apricot liqueur and Picon Amer adds a subtle bitterness and complexity, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate nuanced flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a pinch of salt on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Brooklyn
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet Manhattan variant, the Brooklyn replaces traditional sweet vermouth with Picon Amer, adding a touch of cherry liqueur for depth. This cocktail is a nod to New York's craft spirit scene, balancing rye whiskey's spice with herbal vermouth and a hint of maraschino.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Poet's Dream
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on the classic Martini, the Poet's Dream layers the elegance of London Dry Gin with the herbal depth of dry vermouth and the rich complexity of Benedictine liqueur. A whisper of orange bitters adds a subtle citrus brightness, making it both refined and invigorating.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a single drop of orange bitters on the surface.

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail infuses the traditional bitter-sweet balance with the sweetness of strawberries and a hint of chocolate. It replaces sweet vermouth with red vermouth for a slightly fruitier profile while maintaining the original's bold character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces Campari with Suze and sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth. It offers a lighter, more herbal profile with a touch of artichoke bitterness, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for those who prefer a less bitter experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Lillet Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant French-inspired cocktail, the Strawberry Lillet Cooler combines the fruity sweetness of strawberry liqueur with the smooth, nutty depth of Lillet Rouge. Its balance of tart lime juice makes it a perfect summer sipper, evoking the charm of Provençal aperitivo culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or highball glass filled with ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Strawberry slice and a twist of lime peel

cocktail_specs.name: The Hunter Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, aromatic twist on the classic Hunter, this variation replaces Aperol with Jägermeister, adding deep herbal and spiced notes to the bright citrus and rye whiskey. It's a spirit-forward cocktail that balances sweetness, bitterness, and complexity, perfect for those who enjoy a more robust flavor profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bobby Burns Respec
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces rye whiskey with rich Scotch and Benedictine for a deeper, more complex profile. It’s a nod to Scottish heritage, balancing sweet vermouth, herbal notes from Rosso, and the liqueur’s signature caramelized depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandy-soaked cherry (optional) or a twist of orange peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Chancellor
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.style.up
cocktail_specs.method: method.stir.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: À la Louisiane
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the heart of New Orleans, the À la Louisiane is a harmonious blend of rye whiskey, Benedictine, sweet vermouth, absinthe, and Peychaud's bitters. Its name pays homage to the Louisiana Purchase, symbolizing the spirit of exploration and refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Alpine Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, the Alpine Negroni replaces traditional Campari and sweet vermouth with Cocchi Americano and Suze, adding a unique Alpine herbal complexity. The addition of Genepi des Alpes and white crème de menthe introduces a distinct mountain botanical character, while saline solution enhances its depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente (htd)
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety tiki classic that layers the tropical sweetness of rum with the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc and a whisper of citrus from dry curaçao. Originally created for President Franklin D. Roosevelt during his time in the White House, this cocktail embodies the elegance and sophistication of its era.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of red vermouth's rich herbal notes, gin's botanical complexity, and Green Chartreuse's distinctive herbal liqueur. It was created by mixologist Jeff Berry at the Bitter End in New York City, offering a refined balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou (Punch)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, red vermouth's rich herbal notes, Green Chartreuse's herbal liqueur depth, and a touch of sweetness from maraschino. It's a refined aperitivo that balances bitterness and sweetness with an elegant finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Double Grape
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Sidecar, the Double Grape replaces Cognac with Pisco, infusing it with bright citrus notes from grapefruit bitters. This South American-inspired variation balances sweetness, herbal complexity, and a subtle tartness, making it a standout aperitif or digestif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or a lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Downhill Daring
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that plays with the balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes, the Downhill Daring is a modern twist on the classic Americano. It combines the richness of bourbon whiskey with the depth of Punt E Mes vermouth amaro and the smoothness of Americano bianco, finished with a touch of Bénédictine liqueur for an elegant complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gustin Gang
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Gustin Gang is a harmonious blend of floral, fruity, and bitter elements. It combines the delicate notes of sloe gin with the herbal complexity of vermouth and Cynar, creating a drink that is both elegant and deeply flavorful.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Black Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, the Black Manhattan replaces sweet vermouth with Averna, adding a herbal depth that complements rye whiskey's spice and cherry liqueur's fruity richness. This variation is often served up, emphasizing its bold, spirit-forward character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Epiphany 2
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail, Epiphany 2 is a harmonious marriage of Lucano amaro's rich, herbal depth with Punt E Mes vermouth's bright, bitter notes. The addition of pimento dram and gomme syrup introduces subtle sweetness and spice, creating a layered, sophisticated drink that is both invigorating and comforting.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Kings County
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of peated Highland whisky with the bright, cherry notes of Maraschino liqueur. This drink is a celebration of Scotland's diverse whisky traditions, offering layers of flavor from unpeated malt to rich, herbal vermouth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Big Chief
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic tiki classic, the Big Chief is a rich blend of bourbon whiskey, amaro, and vermouth, offering layers of caramel, herbal, and slightly bitter notes. It’s said to have been created by Donn Beach in the 1940s or 50s as part of his tiki menu, embodying the adventurous spirit of Polynesian-inspired cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, preferably chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice (or with a large cube) and strain into a chilled coupe or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell garnish or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Lakeshore
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly bitter Cuban-inspired cocktail, the Lakeshore combines rich Havana Club rum with the herbal complexity of Dubonnet and Fernet Branca. Its balance of sweet, bitter, and umami notes makes it a standout in the world of spirit-forward cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Demosthenes Club
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Demosthenes Club is a harmonious marriage of rich Cognac, light Dubonnet, and a delicate touch of rose petal liqueur. Named after the famous orator, this drink is known for its refined balance of sweetness, bitterness, and floral notes, making it a staple in classic cocktail menus.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: DuBois
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail, the DuBois is a harmonious marriage of bourbon's rich oakiness with the delicate bitterness of Dubonnet and the herbal depth of Montenegro amaro. It's a classic aperitivo that balances warmth and complexity, often associated with the elegance of Parisian cafés.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Boadas
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Spanish cocktail, the Boadas is a harmonious blend of aged Havana Club rum, Dubonnet's quinquina-infused sweetness, and a touch of Grand Marnier or cognac liqueur. Its name pays homage to the late Barcelona bartender Joan Boada, who crafted this elegant drink in the 1980s, balancing bitterness with subtle citrus notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

ingredients.name: Grand Marnier or Cognac Orange Liqueur

cocktail_specs.name: Don't Give Up the Ship
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex American cocktail with a rich history, 'Don't Give Up the Ship' blends the botanical brightness of gin with the sweet, herbal depth of Dubonnet and the bitter, aromatic punch of Fernet Branca. Originally created during Prohibition as a way to disguise the taste of bootleg alcohol, this drink is both invigorating and deeply satisfying.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or orange peel, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Spiced Rum Curacao Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic twist on the classic sour, this cocktail combines the warm spices of Cuban-style rum with the bright, citrusy essence of orange curaçao. Its balanced acidity and sweetness make it a refreshing yet complex drink, perfect for sipping slowly or enjoying as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Queens Park Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Australian classic, the Queens Park Swizzle is a harmonious blend of aged rum, citrus, and aromatic bitters, swizzled to perfection. Originating from Sydney's Queens Park Hotel in 1953, it captures the essence of tropical flavors with a touch of herbal complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Swizzle.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic twist on the classic Whiskey Cocktail, this drink elevates its predecessors with a delicate dose of absinthe and maraschino liqueur. It balances the spicy notes of rye whiskey with floral, herbal, and fruity complexities, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile that is both nostalgic and innovative.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Mai Tai, the Jungle Bird blends rich rum with Campari's bitter orange notes and pineapple juice for a refreshing yet complex flavor. Originating in tiki culture, it’s a celebration of bold, layered tastes that dance between sweet, sour, and herbal.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Nui Nui
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic tiki classic, the Nui Nui is a symphony of tropical citrus, warm spice, and smoky rum. Originating from the Polynesian-inspired cocktails of the mid-20th century, it balances sweet and tart flavors with a subtle heat from pimento dram.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: By Their Bootstraps
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the rustic depth of rhum agricole with the creamy richness of white crème de cacao, balanced by bright lime juice and aromatic bitters. Its name evokes resilience and determination, much like its layered flavor profile—sweet, tangy, and subtly bitter.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Tropical Standard Soggy Dollar Painkiller
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, overproof twist on the classic Painkiller, this cocktail combines unaged Jamaican rum with a splash of overproof Fassionola for an intense, tropical punch. It's a spirit-forward, citrusy elixir that delivers a potent kick while maintaining a refreshing balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the early 20th century, the Mai Tai is a harmonious blend of rum, citrus, and nutty orgeat syrup. It was popularized by Donn Beach at his Trader Vic's restaurants, though its exact origins remain debated, with some crediting Victor Bergeron of the Mai Tai bar in Papeete, Tahiti.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Rusty Anchor
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic gin cocktail with a rich, herbal profile, the Rusty Anchor combines the botanical complexity of London dry gin with the honeyed depth of Drambuie. Its name is said to derive from the 'anchor' shape of the glass it's traditionally served in, while its bittersweet balance makes it a favorite for those who appreciate spirit-forward drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled anchor-shaped glass or a double old-fashioned glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn 'n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety tiki classic that marries the caramel and vanilla notes of aged rum with the spiced sweetness of falernum. Originating from the tropical cocktail tradition, it’s a luscious blend that balances depth and smoothness, often garnished with a flamed orange peel for dramatic flair.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail born in the West Indies, the Rum Swizzle is a lively blend of gold rum, falernum, citrus juices, and bitters. Its effervescent texture and complex flavor profile—sweet, tart, and subtly aromatic—make it a standout among tiki classics.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Swizzled.

cocktail_specs.name: Bar GPT
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail blending the depth of aged rum with the brightness of white rum, creating a harmonious balance. The addition of amaro and orgeat syrup introduces rich, nutty, and herbal notes, while lime juice adds a sharp citrus contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain.

cocktail_specs.name: Bar GPT Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on a classic rum cocktail, this drink harmoniously blends the rich, molasses-forward profile of Jamaican dark rum with the bright acidity and floral notes of rhum agricole. The addition of orange amaro introduces a subtle bitterness that bridges the sweet almond orgeat syrup and zesty lime juice, creating a complex, layered experience perfect for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Between the Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly boozy twist on a classic, this cocktail combines bright lemon juice with rich cognac and honey syrup for a balanced, elegant sip. Its name is said to reference the area between a woman's knees, adding a playful historical note.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Across the Pacific
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex rum cocktail that bridges the rich, aged depth of Appleton Reserve with the bright, unaged spirit of Smith & Cross Jamaican Rum. Balanced with herbal Averna amaro, tart lime juice, and nutty orgeat, it offers a journey from the lush landscapes of Barbados to the sun-drenched shores of Jamaica.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Mary Pickford
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and slightly tart cocktail named after the silent film icon, the Mary Pickford is a delightful blend of white rum, pineapple juice, grenadine, and maraschino liqueur. Its bright, fruity profile with a touch of sweetness makes it a perfect choice for those who appreciate balanced, refreshing cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Hibiscus Rum Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical punch, the Hibiscus Rum Punch combines the deep, floral notes of hibiscus liqueur with the smooth warmth of aged Jamaican rum. It's a modern twist on classic rum punches, offering a balance of tart, sweet, and herbal flavors that make it perfect for warm-weather sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda (strain into a chilled highball glass), then top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and fresh hibiscus flower (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Runner
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Rum Runner is a harmonious blend of unaged rum, blackberry liqueur, lime juice, and grenadine. It was created in the 1930s at the Don the Beachcomber's restaurant in Hollywood, Florida, and is known for its rich, fruity, and slightly boozy profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Twelve Mile Limit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Twelve Mile Limit is a harmonious blend of light rum, rye whiskey, brandy, lemon juice, and grenadine. It evokes the spirit of tropical exploration with its rich, layered flavors—sweet, tart, and spiced—while paying homage to the nautical theme with its name, referencing the limit for coastal waters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Hawaiian
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical cocktail, the Blue Hawaiian is a lush blend of rum, pineapple juice, and blue curaçao, creating a refreshing yet slightly boozy drink. It originated in Hawaii and is often associated with tiki culture, offering a balance of sweet, fruity, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Maraschino cherry and pineapple leaf or slice

cocktail_specs.name: Isle of Martinique
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical elixir born from the sun-drenched shores of Martinique, this cocktail harmonizes the bright acidity of lime with the rich, caramelized depth of aged agricole rum. Orgeat syrup adds a nutty sweetness, while honey rounds out the flavors, creating a drink that is both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of almond flakes

cocktail_specs.name: Tour Le Carbet
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail from the Caribbean, the Tour Le Carbet is a harmonious blend of bright lime, spiced falernum, herbal Suze, and unaged agricole blanc rum. It captures the essence of tropical flavors with a touch of sophistication, making it both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Lei Lani Volcano 2.0
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, tiki-inspired twist on the classic Lei Lani, this cocktail layers creamy coconut with vibrant guava soda, sweet pineapple juice, and rich Barbados gold rum. Its lush, fruity profile is balanced by a bright lime zest garnish, evoking the flavors of a Hawaiian sunset.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime zest and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Alt 2
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic 'Bad Sneakers,' this variation replaces traditional rum with Appleton Estate 12 and adds a touch of cinnamon for warmth. It balances sweet grapefruit syrup, coconut-infused rum, and lime juice to create a refreshing yet complex profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of cinnamon bark

cocktail_specs.name: Widow's Kiss
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Widow's Kiss is a harmonious marriage of sweet and herbal elements. It combines the rich, spiced notes of Applejack with the depth of Cognac, balanced by the aromatic complexity of Benedictine and Yellow Chartreuse, creating a drink that is both elegant and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Boukman Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail blends Cuban white rum with cognac for depth, balanced by tart lime juice and a touch of cinnamon syrup. Named after Boukman, a leader in the Haitian Revolution, it embodies both rebellion and refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of ground cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing and balanced blend of white rum, lime juice, and rich syrup. Originating in the early 20th century at the Daiquiri Club in Cuba, it is often celebrated as one of the first true cocktails, embodying simplicity with a crisp, tart-sweet profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Ideal Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and balanced classic, the Ideal Daiquiri is a harmonious blend of white rum, agricole blanc, lime juice, and rich syrup. It embodies the essence of the daiquiri family while incorporating the unique complexity of Rhum Agricole, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile that has stood the test of time.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail is a tribute to Ernest Hemingway's love for grapefruit. It combines Cuban white rum with maraschino liqueur, fresh lime juice, grapefruit juice, and a touch of simple syrup, creating a harmonious blend of tart, sweet, and herbal notes that is both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass over crushed ice or in a coupe for a smoother texture.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice, or shake and double-strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or a maraschino cherry, optional lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Hemingway Daiquiri alt
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Hemingway Daiquiri, this version replaces traditional grapefruit juice with Monin's grapefruit syrup for a smoother, more balanced sweetness. It retains the signature bittersweet profile of Ernest Hemingway's original, blending Cuban white rum with maraschino liqueur and lime juice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or over crushed ice in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Luxardo maraschino cherry and a grapefruit twist

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical cocktail that marries the deep caramel and spice of aged rums with the vibrant sweetness of mango passionfruit nectar. Its layered complexity makes it a standout for rum enthusiasts, blending richness with refreshing acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Bad Sneakers, this variation replaces traditional rum with Appleton Estate 12 and adds a touch of cinnamon bark syrup for warmth. It balances sweet grapefruit and coconut with tart lime juice, creating a refreshing yet complex profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Variation 2
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Bad Sneakers, this variation replaces traditional rum with a blend of Bacardi and Malibu, creating a smoother, more approachable profile. The addition of grapefruit syrup and cinnamon bark syrup adds a subtle sweetness and warmth, balancing the tartness of lime juice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of cinnamon bark

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Punch-Up
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward twist on the classic rum punch, this version amps up the intensity with overproof white rum. It delivers a punchy balance of citrus brightness, rich sweetness, and aromatic bitterness, making it a standout choice for those who crave depth in their tropical drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Ciro's Special
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, Ciro's Special combines rich dark rum with the deep berry notes of mure cassis, bright lime juice, and a touch of orange curacao. Named after Ciro's Cocktail Bar in Tijuana, this drink is a staple in tiki culture, offering a perfect balance of sweet, tart, and herbal flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Nuclear Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Sidecar, the Nuclear Sidecar replaces traditional Cointreau with Green Chartreuse, adding a herbal depth that contrasts beautifully with the cognac's richness. This version is both refreshing and sophisticated, perfect for those who appreciate a balance of sweet, bitter, and citrus notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Summertime Punch (Original)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical punch, the Summertime is a timeless classic that balances sweet, tart, and aromatic elements. Created by Jerry Thomas in his 1862 bartender's guide, it embodies the essence of summer with its bright citrus notes, spiced richness, and effervescent charm.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain into a punch bowl or glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Goromo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward tiki cocktail that marries the bold, unaged intensity of Jamaican rum with the sweet-tart brightness of blackberry and lime. Named after a West African term for 'wild,' this drink is a celebration of raw, unfiltered flavors, often served in a chilled glass over crushed ice to highlight its lush, tropical character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: A Certain Romance
cocktail_specs.description: This sophisticated cocktail is a harmonious blend of tropical rum, citrus, and herbal bitters, creating a complex and refreshing experience. Its name evokes a sense of intrigue and romance, much like the carefully balanced flavors that dance on the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Pauline
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Pauline is a modern twist on the classic French 75. It combines Jamaican rum with absinthe, lemon juice, rich simple syrup, orange bitters, and a touch of saline solution for a harmonious blend of sweet, sour, bitter, and herbal notes. This drink is both refreshing and spirit-forward, offering a unique balance that makes it a standout in any cocktail repertoire.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Jungle Hunt
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spiced rum-based cocktail with a complex interplay of aromatic bitters, sweet falernum, and tropical pineapple juice. It delivers a warm, slightly smoky depth from Jägermeister, balanced by the bright acidity of lemon and the natural sweetness of falernum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a cinnamon stick

cocktail_specs.name: Hot Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery, tropical twist on the classic Zombie cocktail, this version replaces rum with Puerto Rican Gold Rum and incorporates hot water for a warming, spiced experience.
