It balances sweet pineapple juice, tart lime, and rich passionfruit syrup with a touch of brown sugar and butter, creating a complex, velvety drink that's both indulgent and invigorating.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a heatproof glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except hot water and butter with ice. Strain into a heatproof glass filled with hot water. Top with a small pat of butter. Garnish with a lemon heart float.

cocktail_specs.name: Xablaw
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and complex Brazilian twist on the classic Highball, the Xablaw combines the smooth sweetness of aged cachaça with the herbal depth of Averna liqueur. It’s a modern take on a traditional style, balancing citrus brightness with botanical complexity, perfect for sipping on warm days.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprig of rosemary (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Orange Juice Aperol Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly bitter-sweet twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, this highball version replaces prosecco with crisp beer. It balances the herbal notes of Aperol with the bright acidity of orange juice, creating a light yet complex aperitivo perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently and pour over ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Ramazotti Cola Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and refreshing twist on the classic highball, this cocktail combines the rich, herbal bitterness of Ramazotti with the effervescent sweetness of cola. It's a modern take on an Italian amaro, offering a perfect balance of complexity and simplicity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with cola.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a few drops of Angostura bitters on the surface for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Suze Mountain Dew Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and unexpected twist on the classic Suze, this highball combines the earthy, artichoke bitterness of Cynar with the sweet, citrusy effervescence of Mountain Dew. It's a playful yet sophisticated drink that bridges the gap between tiki experimentation and modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then top with Mountain Dew.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a sprig of rosemary for garnish (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Don Camillo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the Italian region, Don Camillo is a harmonious blend of Cognac, Campari, and rhubarb liqueur, with a touch of orange Curacao and bitters. It offers a rich, slightly tart profile with notes of dried fruit, citrus, and herbal bitterness, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate depth and balance in their drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Green Chartreuse Grape Soda Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing highball that marries the herbal complexity of Green Chartreuse with the effervescent sweetness of grape soda. This cocktail is a modern twist on the classic Chartreuse highball, offering a harmonious balance of botanical notes and fruity brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then top with grape soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Tequila Coke Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and spirit-forward highball that blends the smoky, agave-forward notes of blanco tequila with the effervescent sweetness of cola. Originating from Mexico, this cocktail is a staple in both classic bars and modern tiki menus, offering a perfect balance of citrus brightness and caramel undertones.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wedge and a pinch of coarse salt on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Jasmine's Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, Jasmine's Cooler replaces Prosecco with gin for a more complex, spirit-forward profile. The combination of bitter Aperol, sweet Triple Sec, and bright lemon juice creates a balanced, effervescent drink perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, Aperol, Triple Sec, and lemon juice with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie Tonga Room
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery, tropical twist on the classic Zombie cocktail, this version hails from the legendary Tonga Room in Las Vegas. It packs a punch with Don Q 151 rum, delivering a bold, spicy kick alongside sweet passion fruit and tart lime juice, all balanced by smooth white and dark Jamaican rums.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Grenadine Pineapple Winterspice
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, spiced rum cocktail that marries the smoky depth of dark rum with the bright tang of pineapple and the warm, aromatic complexity of winterspice bitters. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and spicy notes that evoke the spirit of winter sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Top Notch Volcano
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and layered tropical rum cocktail, the Top Notch Volcano combines rich Jamaican and Cuban rums with pineapple juice for a vibrant, slightly spicy profile. Its name hints at a fiery character, balanced by the sweetness of lime and maraschino liqueur.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie South Seas
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie South Seas is a vibrant, spirit-forward concoction that blends dark and light rums with tropical juices and citrus. Its complex flavor profile—sweet, smoky, and slightly bitter—makes it both refreshing and intriguing, embodying the adventurous spirit of 1930s Polynesian-inspired cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water (optional).
cocktail_specs.garnish: Flamed orange peel and maraschino cherries (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie is a fiery, multi-rum concoction that blends light and dark spirits with tropical juices, creating a complex, slightly smoky, and intensely flavorful experience. Originating in the 1930s at Donn Beach's Tiki Room, it was designed to 'kill' the drinker—hence its name—and remains a symbol of adventurous, spirit-forward cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled hurricane glass; flambé with a torch if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell and mint sprig (optional, for presentation).

cocktail_specs.name: Soother
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and velvety cocktail, the Soother blends rich dark Jamaican rum with cognac for depth, balanced by bright lemon juice and orange curaçao. A touch of apple juice and rich syrup adds a subtle sweetness, making it both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Krakatoa
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Krakatoa is a symphony of tropical fruit, spice, and coffee. It balances the sweetness of apricot nectar and citrus with the depth of aged rum and falernum, crowned by a float of espresso for a striking finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except coffee float with ice. Strain into the glass over fresh ice and top with coffee float.

cocktail_specs.name: 1860's improved whiskey cocktail
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.style.up
cocktail_specs.method: method.stir.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: Gin & Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing classic, the Gin & Tonic is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity and tonic water's effervescent bitterness. Originating in British India during the colonial era, it has since become a staple of global cocktail culture, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a light, thirst-quenching drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice and strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wedge and a sprig of rosemary or a grapefruit twist (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant highball cocktail, the Tom Collins is a staple of classic British mixology. Born in the mid-19th century at London's Tom Collins Bar, it combines crisp gin, tart lemon juice, sweet simplicity, and effervescent carbonation for a light yet sophisticated sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice; strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with carbonated water.

cocktail_specs.name: Hock Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Hock Martini is a harmonious blend of dry Riesling wine and gin, offering a crisp, slightly sweet profile with bright citrus notes. Originating in Germany, it traditionally uses Riesling from the Hock region (now part of Rheinhessen), creating a refined aperitif that bridges the worlds of wine and spirits.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve straight up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Wein mit Schuss
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and bold German twist on the classic wine cocktail, 'Wein mit Schuss' translates to 'wine with a shot.' It combines crisp white wine with the rich depth of cognac and the citrusy sweetness of Cointreau, creating a harmonious balance that is both sophisticated and approachable. Traditionally served in a tall glass, it's a staple for warm weather gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled wine glass or rocks glass filled with ice.
notes: Traditionally includes a splash of orange juice (Orangensaft).

cocktail_specs.name: Grapefruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic gin-based Collins, this cocktail replaces traditional citrus with grapefruit's bright, slightly bitter essence. It balances the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sharp tang of lemon juice and Monin Pampelmousse syrup, topped with soda water for a crisp, effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, grapefruit syrup, and lemon juice with ice; strain into a collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit wedge and a few drops of grapefruit bitters on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Cucumber Beast
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Cucumber Beast blends the herbal depth of Chartreuse with the crisp cucumber notes of Gurkenbitter, creating a refreshing yet intricately layered drink. Its name reflects its intensity, balancing sweetness, bitterness, and botanical complexity in a single sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Balsamic Soda
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that marries the sweet, fruity essence of strawberry liqueur with the bold, tangy depth of balsamic vinegar. This modern twist on a classic soda-based drink offers a harmonious balance of sweetness, acidity, and subtle bitterness, making it a perfect choice for summer gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the strawberry liqueur with balsamic vinegar and ice, then strain into the glass filled with soda. Stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Fresh strawberry slice and a few drops of balsamic reduction drizzle on the rim or garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Air Mail
cocktail_specs.description: A tiki classic with a playful name, the Air Mail is a refreshing blend of aged rum and champagne, brightened by lime juice and sweetened with honey syrup. It evokes the adventurous spirit of tropical travel, often associated with the tiki culture of the mid-20th century.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice (dry shake) and strain into a chilled coupe or champagne flute.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell or a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Old Cuban
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent cocktail, the Old Cuban is a celebration of aged rum's depth and complexity, balanced by the crisp acidity of lime juice and sweetened with rich syrup. It was a staple in pre-revolutionary Cuba, often served as a refreshing yet sophisticated drink for afternoon gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or champagne flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except champagne with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice. Top with champagne.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a twist of lemon peel, garnished with a small flag or fan if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Champagne Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent blend of aged rum, champagne, and demerara syrup, this cocktail is a celebration in a glass. Its rich, caramel-infused sweetness from the rum and syrup contrasts beautifully with the crisp acidity of the champagne, creating a harmonious balance that's both refreshing and indulgent.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a champagne flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently without ice to preserve the bubbles.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a sugar-rimmed edge (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Sharks Tooth
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical rum cocktail that blends the rich, caramel notes of Barbados Gold with the deep, molasses character of Appleton Estate 8-year-old rum. Balanced with lime, pineapple, and cherry syrup, it delivers a smooth yet complex flavor profile, perfect for sipping on a warm day.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into the glass over fresh ice. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and cherry, or a pineapple leaf for a tiki touch.

cocktail_specs.name: Blackbeard's Ghost
cocktail_specs.description: A hauntingly complex tiki classic, Blackbeard's Ghost weaves together the tropical sweetness of apricot brandy and falernum with the bright acidity of citrus juices, balanced by the deep caramel notes of Demerara rum. This drink is a tribute to the pirate legends of the Caribbean, evoking the spirit of adventure with its layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a flamed orange wheel if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Flamed orange wheel (optional), mint sprig, and a cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Modern Old-Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Old-Fashioned, this cocktail replaces traditional sugar syrup with rich demerara syrup, enhancing its caramel and molasses notes while maintaining the spirit-forward depth of bourbon. It’s a sophisticated yet approachable drink that bridges old-world tradition with modern innovation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: QB Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, rum-forward tiki classic that marries the complexity of multiple rums with bright citrus, floral honey, and a touch of spice. Originating from the legendary Quadrant Bar in New Orleans, this drink is a celebration of layered flavors—sweet, tart, and subtly herbal—perfect for sipping over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake ingredients (except soda) with ice, strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice, then top with soda. Stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange wheel and lime wedge, garnished with a mint sprig (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Formidable Dragon
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Formidable Dragon is a masterful fusion of citrus, sweetness, and depth. It combines the richness of aged rum with the smoky intensity of Scotch whisky, balanced by honey syrup and Angostura bitters, creating a drink that is both invigorating and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish if desired.

ingredients.name: Pot Still Light Overproof Rum (Wray & Nephew)

cocktail_specs.name: Don's Own Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, layered tiki classic that harmonizes black blended whisky, white and dark rums, with a touch of blackberry liqueur and grenadine. This drink is a nod to Donn Beach's legendary grog recipe, blending sweet, fruity, and slightly boozy elements for a complex yet approachable sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Demerara Dry Float
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail balances bright citrus and passion fruit with a delicate float of Demerara rum. It’s a refreshing yet sophisticated drink, perfect for those who appreciate layered flavors without excessive sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except the Maraschino and Bacardi 4 with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Float the Demerara rum on top.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a cherry skewered on a cocktail pick

cocktail_specs.name: Merciless Virgin
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, non-alcoholic twist on the classic Merciless, this version replaces cherry brandy with a moderate Spanish fortified wine while retaining its signature bittersweet balance. It delivers a complex interplay of citrus, spice, and herbal notes, making it a sophisticated choice for those seeking depth without alcohol.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a rocks glass or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass over fresh ice. Top with soda and stir gently.

ingredients.name: Cherry Brandy (or Moderate Spanish Fortified Wine)
Moderate Spanish Fortified Wine (e.g., Pedro Ximénez)

cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a Luxardo cherry, skewered with a cocktail pick.

cocktail_specs.name: Kikuya Lapu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-inspired cocktail that harmonizes tropical juices, aged Jamaican rum, and a touch of absinthe. Its name, derived from 'kikuya' (a type of bamboo) and 'lapu' (meaning 'fish'), reflects its island heritage while delivering a rich blend of sweet, tart, and herbal notes with a subtle smokiness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice. Top with a splash of soda water if desired (optional).
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of crushed pineapple or passion fruit pulp

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie Punch is a fiery, complex blend of rums, citrus, and aromatic liqueurs. Originating in the 1930s at Don the Beachcomber's Tiki Room, it combines overproof rum with sweetened falernum and lime for a punch that's both bold and refreshing, often served in a flaming presentation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except crushed ice and absinthe with ice. Strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Float absinthe on top if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and mint sprig, flamed if desired

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, Planter's Punch is a harmonious blend of aged rums, citrus juices, pineapple syrup, and a touch of absinthe. Originating from the 19th-century Caribbean, this cocktail embodies the spirit of tropical hospitality with its rich, layered flavors—sweet, tart, herbal, and slightly anise-like.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Berry Honey Jäger
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, aromatic twist on the classic Jägerbomb, this cocktail replaces soda with a luscious blend of raspberry and cherry liqueurs, sweetened honey, and bright lemon juice. The result is a velvety, fruit-forward elixir that balances the herbal depth of Jägermeister with a touch of natural sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe or over a large cube for an on-the-rocks version.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A few fresh raspberries and a lemon twist.

cocktail_specs.name: Jägerita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward twist on the Margarita, the Jägerita replaces tequila with Jägermeister, delivering a complex blend of herbal bitterness, orange liqueur sweetness, and bright lime acidity. This refreshing yet robust cocktail is a staple in German-Mexican fusion bars, offering a unique balance of spice, citrus, and herbal depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless French classic, the Sidecar is a harmonious marriage of rich cognac, tart lemon juice, and sweet orange liqueur. Created in the 1920s during Prohibition, it was one of the first cocktails to feature Curaçao, offering a bright, citrus-forward profile with a sophisticated balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: La Vie En Rouge
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that marries the citrusy depth of Grand Marnier with the tart brightness of cranberry juice, creating a harmonious blend of sweet, sour, and berry notes. This drink is a modern twist on classic French flavors, perfect for those who appreciate a balance of richness and acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces Aperol with Averna, a complex Italian amaro known for its herbal and slightly bitter profile. The addition of mineral water gives it a refreshing lift, while lemon and orange juices provide a bright, citrus-forward balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic sour, this cocktail replaces traditional citrus liqueurs with Averna, a bitter-sweet Italian amaro, creating a complex, balanced drink that dances between herbal bitterness and bright citrus. It’s a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for those who appreciate depth in their sours.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic sour takes Averna, a rich, herbal amaro, and pairs it with bright lemon juice for a harmonious balance of bitterness and acidity. It’s a refreshing yet complex cocktail that highlights the depth of Averna while maintaining the elegance of a traditional sour.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced sour cocktail, the Averna Sour combines the herbal complexity of Averna with bright citrus notes. It's a modern twist on the classic whiskey sour, replacing bourbon with this Italian amaro for a unique, slightly bitter-sweet profile that's both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic sour cocktail replaces traditional liqueurs with Averna, a rich, herbal amaro that brings deep bitter and citrus notes. It's a refreshing yet complex drink, balancing sweetness, acidity, and bitterness in a single shake.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces the bitter orange liqueur with Averna, a Roman amaro known for its herbal complexity and subtle sweetness. The addition of soda water lightens the drink while maintaining its refreshing yet sophisticated character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda (double-strain).

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt 7
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces Aperol with Averna, a rich, herbal amaro from Sicily, creating a more complex and bitter-sweet profile. The lemon and orange juices provide bright acidity and citrus notes, while simple syrup balances the bitterness, resulting in a sophisticated yet approachable cocktail.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly bitter Italian twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail replaces gin with Averna, a complex herbal liqueur infused with gentian root. It offers a harmonious balance of citrus brightness, herbal depth, and effervescence, making it an ideal choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall Collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the Averna, lemon juice, and ice, then strain into a glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon wheel and a sprig of rosemary or mint (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious and balanced cocktail, the Amaretto Sour combines the nutty sweetness of amaretto with the bright acidity of lemon juice and a touch of rich syrup. It’s a classic that’s both comforting and refreshing, often garnished with an egg white for texture, though it can also be enjoyed without.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon Twist and a Luxardo Cherry (optional: egg white for froth)

cocktail_specs.name: Scofflaw
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward cocktail born during Prohibition, the Scofflaw replaces gin with rye whiskey in a classic Manhattan formula. It delivers a harmonious blend of rich, spiced rye, bright citrus, and herbal vermouth, topped with a touch of raspberry sweetness for balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A quintessential British highball, the Tom Collins is a refreshing and effervescent blend of gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup, topped with soda water. Originating in the 19th century, it is said to have been named after Tom Collins, an English actor known for his flamboyant style.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall, chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Grapefruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail replaces lemon with grapefruit juice for a bright, citrus-forward profile. Its effervescent charm and balanced sweetness make it a perfect choice for warm weather or as a sophisticated daytime pick-me-up.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with soda water and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Parachute
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp and invigorating cocktail, the Parachute is a modern twist on the classic Gin Fizz, offering a refreshing balance of gin's botanical complexity with bright lemon juice and sweet simplicity. It’s a perfect choice for those who appreciate a light, effervescent drink without the added sugar or complexity of traditional syrups.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Moscow Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and invigorating cocktail, the Moscow Mule is a classic combination of vodka and ginger beer, served in a copper mug. It originated in the mid-20th century at the famed New York City restaurant, the Metropol, and its spicy, citrusy profile has made it a staple for both summer sipping and year-round enjoyment.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a copper mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a copper mug.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark and Stormy
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless British classic, the Dark and Stormy is a bold and refreshing blend of rich dark rum and spicy ginger beer. Originating from the Bahama Mama cocktail in the 1970s, it was later rebranded by the Hurricane Bar in London, becoming a staple of tiki culture with its striking color and invigorating kick.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda (build in glass).

cocktail_specs.name: Silver Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A bright and effervescent cocktail, the Silver Fizz is a refined twist on the classic Gin Fizz. It combines the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the zesty tang of fresh lemon juice and a touch of sweetness from simple syrup, topped off with soda water for a light, bubbly finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice; strain into a chilled coupe glass and top with soda water. Garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent classic, the Ramos Gin Fizz is a Texas twist on the original Gin Fizz, elevated with a touch of egg white for texture. Created by bartender Anson 'Ramos' Call in 1934, it's known for its bright citrus notes, creamy mouthfeel, and refreshing effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or fizz glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled coupe or fizz glass, then top with club soda. Top with egg white foam if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Presbyterian
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet deeply satisfying cocktail, the Presbyterian is a bourbon and sweet vermouth blend that embodies the spirit of American whiskey culture. Hailing from the 1920s, it was reportedly created as an alternative to the Manhattan for those who preferred bourbon over rye.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Cuban
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Daiquiri, the Old Cuban replaces lime juice with grapefruit for a bright, citrus-forward profile. It’s a staple of Cuban cocktail culture, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a pre-dinner drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and elegant cocktail, the Champagne Cocktail is a sophisticated blend of effervescent champagne, sweet syrup, and aromatic bitters. It dates back to the late 19th century and is often attributed to Jerry Thomas, a renowned bartender from the Old West, who included it in his seminal cocktail book published in 1862.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a champagne flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently without ice (or with a single large cube) to preserve effervescence.

cocktail_specs.name: Bernice
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bernice combines the clean, crisp profile of infused vodka with the bright acidity of lime and the rich, herbal notes of Galliano. It is a modern twist on classic tiki elements, offering a harmonious balance of sweetness, bitterness, and citrus.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Bernice Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly herbal twist on the classic Alt, this cocktail combines smooth vodka with bright lime juice, a touch of Galliano's aromatic depth, and a hint of sweetness. It’s a refined, spirit-forward drink that balances citrus acidity with herbal complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Dandy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Dandy is a harmonious blend of rye whisky's spicy warmth, Dubonnet's rich, sweet depth, and Triple Sec's citrus brightness. It was created in the early 20th century as an elegant alternative to the Martinez, offering a smoother, more refined profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Cubanada
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly sweet Cuban classic, the Cubanada is a harmonious blend of white rum, lime juice, and maple syrup. It’s often considered a lighter, more approachable cousin to the Daiquiri, with a smooth, balanced profile that highlights the natural sweetness of Cuban rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Diplomat
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Diplomat is a refined blend of dry and sweet vermouth, with a delicate touch of maraschino liqueur and orange bitters. It is said to have been created in the early 20th century for U.S. diplomats stationed in Italy, hence its name.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Casino
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail, the Casino is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, Maraschino liqueur's sweet cherry notes, and lemon juice's bright acidity. It was created in the early 20th century at the Hotel Metropole in Monte Carlo, hence its name, and remains a timeless favorite for its refreshing yet sophisticated profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Twelve Mile Limit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Twelve Mile Limit combines the richness of cognac and rye with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the deep sweetness of grenadine. It evokes the spirit of Polynesian exploration, where the 'twelve-mile limit' marked the boundary of a ship's influence.

cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or tiki mug.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail layers the deep, fruity notes of ruby port with the caramel sweetness of bourbon and maple syrup. The addition of walnut bitters introduces a subtle nutty depth, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Smash
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing cocktail that captures the essence of summer with its bright citrus notes and smooth bourbon. Originating in the American South, this drink is a celebration of simplicity, blending bold whiskey with zesty lemon and sweet syrup for a balanced, invigorating sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Dempsey
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the Dempsey is a harmonious marriage of gin's botanical brightness, Calvados' rich apple depth, and absinthe's herbal complexity. It was created by David Embury in honor of boxer Jack Dempsey, embodying strength with its layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bentley
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic French cocktail, the Bentley is a harmonious marriage of Calvados' rich apple essence with Dubonnet's sweet, fortified depth. A dash of Peychaud's bitters adds complexity, making it a refined choice for those who appreciate balanced, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice or soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Dublin Minstrel
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and aromatic Irish whiskey cocktail, the Dublin Minstrel combines the smooth warmth of pot-still whiskey with the herbal complexity of Chartreuse and the sweet-tart brightness of maraschino. This classic tiki-inspired drink is a celebration of Irish heritage, often garnished with a cherry for a touch of elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Affinity
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing blend of Lillet Blanc, Aperol, and gin, the Affinity offers a harmonious balance of floral, citrus, and botanical notes. Its origins trace back to modern interpretations of classic aperitivo cocktails, making it both elegant and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Angel Face
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and sophisticated cocktail, the Angel Face is a harmonious blend of sweet apricot liqueur, crisp gin, and a whisper of Calvados. Its name evokes a sense of ethereal beauty, much like its balanced, floral, and slightly nutty profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single apricot slice or a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Champs-Élysées
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Champs-Élysées combines the rich, nutty depth of Cognac with the herbal complexity of Green Chartreuse. This elegant drink is a celebration of French heritage, balancing sweet, sour, and bitter elements in a harmonious symphony.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and citrus-forward cocktail, the Sidecar is a timeless blend of brandy, orange liqueur, and lemon juice. Originating in Paris during the 1920s, it earned its name from being served to American pilots stationed at a nearby airfield, symbolizing their 'side carriage' of spirits.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Godfather
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and velvety cocktail, the Godfather is a harmonious marriage of smoky Scotch whisky and sweet, nutty amaretto. Created in the 1970s, it gained fame as the signature drink of the film 'The Godfather,' embodying sophistication with its deep, caramelized flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Grenadine Tequila
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Tequila Sunrise, this cocktail layers rich grenadine with reposado tequila for a smooth, slightly smoky depth. The blend of mango liqueur, pineapple juice, and maraschino cherry creates a luscious, fruity profile that’s both refreshing and indulgent.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Blazer
cocktail_specs.description: A dramatic and smoky cocktail, the Blue Blazer is a flaming twist on the classic Whisky Sour. It features Scotch whisky infused with a touch of sweetness, then ignited for a brief but spectacular display, leaving behind a smooth, slightly charred flavor.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build the cocktail, then carefully ignite using a long match or torch. Serve immediately to capture the flame's effect.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a flamed orange peel (optional)
notes: Set whisky on fire for a brief, controlled flame.

cocktail_specs.name: Bananerac
cocktail_specs.description: A playful yet sophisticated twist on the classic Banana Daiquiri, the Bananerac replaces rum with a mix of cognac and rye, adding depth and complexity. The absinthe introduces an herbal, slightly bitter dimension, while banana liqueur and demerara syrup bring sweet, tropical richness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice (stirred).

cocktail_specs.name: Vieux Carré
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex New Orleans classic, the Vieux Carré is a harmonious marriage of Cognac, rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and aromatic bitters. It was created in the early 20th century at the Carousel Bar in New Orleans, offering a sophisticated blend of oak, spice, and herbal notes with a touch of anise from Benedictine.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: improved whiskey cocktail alt

cocktail_specs.method: method.stir.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces bourbon with rich, aged cognac, adding layers of oak, dried fruit, and spice. The Maraschino liqueur introduces a subtle cherry sweetness, while Angostura bitters provide depth and complexity.

cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex cocktail that marries the oak-aged depth of cognac with the herbal bitterness of fernet and the velvety sweetness of crème de cacao. This modern twist on a classic combination delivers a harmonious balance of warmth, spice, and bitterness, making it both intriguing and indulgent.

cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Sidecar, this variation incorporates a touch of salt to enhance its citrus-forward profile. The cognac provides depth and warmth, while the triple sec and lemon juice create a bright, balanced contrast, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Three of a Kind
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Three of a Kind combines the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sweetness of Americano and the fruity depth of Maraschino liqueur. It's a harmonious blend that showcases the interplay between citrus, cherry, and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and slightly sweet cocktail that blends the smooth, spiced notes of Southern Comfort with the herbal complexity of Ramazotti and Benedictine, balanced by tart cranberry juice. This drink is a staple in tiki culture, offering a refreshing yet robust flavor profile that bridges the gap between classic and tropical cocktails.

cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Rob Roy, this cocktail replaces traditional sweet vermouth with Strucchi Bianco, a delicate white vermouth that adds a subtle herbal brightness. It retains the spirit-forward richness of blended Scotch whisky while offering a lighter, more elegant profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of Plymouth Gin's juniper-forward profile, the floral complexity of red vermouth, and the herbal depth of Green Chartreuse. Its name, meaning 'jewel' in French, reflects its intricate balance of sweet, bitter, and aromatic elements.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou (Difford's)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious marriage of vermouth, gin, and Green Chartreuse. Created by Difford's Guide to London, it offers a complex blend of herbal, citrus, and bittersweet notes, making it an ideal aperitivo or digestif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Fig Rum Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious, fruit-forward cocktail that marries the rich, jammy sweetness of fig-infused rum with the citrusy brightness of dry curaçao and the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc. It's a sophisticated yet approachable drink, perfect for sipping on warm evenings or as an elegant aperitif.

cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet twist on the classic Manhattan, the Sir Winston replaces rye whiskey with rich Scotch, creating a velvety texture with notes of caramel, dried fruit, and citrus. Its origins trace back to the 1930s, named after Sir Winston Churchill, who reportedly enjoyed a similar variation.

It's a spirit-forward cocktail that balances the richness of Jamaican rum and Cognac with herbal complexity.

It combines the richness of Jameson Black Barrel with the citrusy brightness of lemon juice, the herbal depth of Green Chartreuse, and the aromatic complexity of Bianco Vermouth, creating a harmonious and invigorating experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Romero Said So
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, Romero Said So blends the bright acidity of lime juice with the floral complexity of gin and vermouth. A touch of absinthe adds depth, while vanilla syrup introduces a subtle sweetness, creating a harmonious balance that is both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Metaxa
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the rich, caramel notes of Metaxa with the herbal depth of Jägermeister and the nutty sweetness of Frangelico. Topped with tart cranberry juice and soda, it offers a harmonious balance of flavors, making it a standout choice for those who appreciate layered, spirit-forward drinks.

cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Scottish classic, the Bobby Burns Original is a harmonious blend of Scotch whisky's smoky depth, the herbal bitterness of Rosso vermouth, and the aromatic complexity of Benedictine. Named after Robert Burns, Scotland's national poet, this cocktail embodies the spirit of Scottish tradition with its balanced, layered profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver #1
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, complex cocktail known for its ability to revive the senses with a harmonious blend of sweet, herbal, and apple notes. Created in the 1930s by Harry Craddock at the London club 21, it features Calvados and brandy layered over sweet vermouth, offering a rich, warming experience that is both sophisticated and invigorating.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Lillet Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic aperitif, the Averna Lillet Spritz combines the herbal depth of Averna liqueur with the smooth elegance of Lillet Blanc. This Italian classic is a refreshing yet complex drink, often enjoyed as a pre-dinner sipper or a light cocktail.

cocktail_specs.name: Bourbon Lillet
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Bourbon Lillet is a harmonious marriage of rich bourbon and the delicate, floral notes of Lillet Blanc. This classic French-inspired drink is known for its smooth, balanced profile with a touch of herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Havana Club 7

It balances herbal liqueurs like Averna and Benedictine with tart cranberry juice and absinthe, creating a complex yet refreshing highball.

The addition of Fernet Branca introduces a subtle herbal complexity, while cranberry juice and soda provide a refreshing contrast.

cocktail_specs.name: Rusty Nail
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and smooth cocktail, the Rusty Nail is a harmonious blend of smoky Scotch whisky and the herbal, honeyed notes of Drambuie. Created in the 1970s, it's a classic choice for those who appreciate a spirit-forward drink with depth and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Alt 1

cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward cocktail that harmoniously blends the smoky depth of peated Scotch with the tropical sweetness of coconut liqueurs and grapefruit juice. Its name is a playful nod to its contrasting elements—like the clash of textures in ill-fitting footwear.

cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail replaces gin with smoky mezcal, bringing a deep, earthy richness that contrasts beautifully with the tart passionfruit and bright lime. It’s a refreshing yet sophisticated drink, perfect for sipping in warm weather or as an evening aperitivo.

It balances the sweetness of passionfruit with the bright acidity of lime and the rich depth of reposado tequila.

cocktail_specs.name: Jack Rose
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate yet robust cocktail, the Jack Rose is a harmonious blend of Calvados' apple essence, tart lime juice, and sweet grenadine. It originated in the 1940s at the Jack Rose Bar in Los Angeles, where it was created to showcase the versatility of Calvados in cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Whiskey Sour is a harmonious marriage of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with bright lemon juice and a touch of sweetness. Its origins trace back to the late 19th century, evolving from earlier sour variants like the Pisco Sour.

The absinthe adds an emerald hue and a touch of anise, while lime juice and rich syrup balance the intensity with brightness and sweetness.

The addition of Green Chartreuse adds a touch of herbal bitterness, balancing the sweetness of lime and syrup.

cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant French cocktail, the Pompadour is a harmonious blend of rich Rhum VSOP, fruity Pineau des Charentes, bright lemon juice, and a touch of vanilla lactic syrup. Named after Madame de Pompadour, the mistress of King Louis XV, this drink embodies the opulence and refinement of 18th-century French courtly life.

cocktail_specs.name: Brown Derby

It embodies the spirit of Old Hollywood with its bright citrus flavors and smooth, balanced profile.

cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, The Stig harmoniously blends the rich apple notes of Calvados with the citrusy brightness of Pisco, balanced by the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur. Complemented by a crisp Sauvignon Blanc, it offers a refined, multi-dimensional experience that bridges European and South American influences.

cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a small sprig of fresh thyme.

cocktail_specs.name: In-Seine
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the In-Seine combines the rich oakiness of bourbon with the refined elegance of cognac, balanced by the floral notes of St Germain elderflower liqueur. A touch of absinthe adds a subtle herbal complexity, making it a versatile drink for both sipping and socializing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a single flower (e.g., edible violet)

cocktail_specs.description: Inspired by the resilient protagonist of Albert Camus' 'The Plague,' this cocktail embodies strength and endurance with a harmonious blend of Calvados, white rum, and Swedish Punsch. Its layers of apple, citrus, and spice create a complex, spirit-forward elixir that balances sweetness and acidity.

cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a flamed orange peel for aroma and presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Wordsmith
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Wordsmith is a harmonious blend of Jamaican-style overproof rum's smoky depth, Green Chartreuse's herbal complexity, Luxardo Maraschino's sweet cherry essence, and lime juice's bright acidity. It’s a spirit-forward creation that rewards both the palate and the imagination.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients.name: Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum

cocktail_specs.name: Cognac St. Germain Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant sour cocktail that harmoniously blends the rich, oaky depth of Cognac with the vibrant sweetness of strawberry liqueur and bright lemon juice. This twist on a classic sour is both sophisticated and approachable, making it a standout choice for those who appreciate complexity in their cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn 'n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety tiki classic with a luxurious blend of dark rum and falernum, creating a smooth, slightly spiced profile. Often garnished with a flamed orange peel for an aromatic finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Amaro Rumhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, aromatic twist on the classic Amaro Sour, this cocktail replaces citrus with a deep, molasses-forward dark rum and Angostura amaro. It delivers a velvety texture with notes of caramel, vanilla, and spice, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate complex, spirit-driven drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Japanese Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that bridges French refinement with Japanese precision, this drink features the rich, oaky depth of cognac balanced by the nutty sweetness of orgeat syrup. Its subtle bitterness from Ango bitters adds complexity, making it a versatile choice for both sipping and socializing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice (stirred).

cocktail_specs.name: East India Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic cocktail with roots in colonial America, the East India Cocktail combines rich cognac, tart lemon juice, sweet pineapple juice, and a touch of maraschino liqueur for a balanced, tropical twist. It is often garnished with a cherry, reflecting its historical ties to trade routes from the East Indies.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Barnum Was Right
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly salty cocktail that plays on the contrast of sweet, tart, and herbal notes. Named after P.T. Barnum's famous quote, it combines dry gin with apricot liqueur, lemon juice, Angostura bitters, and a touch of saline solution for a unique, layered experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: 1934 Cosmo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Cosmopolitan, this cocktail replaces cranberry with raspberries for a bright, berry-forward profile. It's a nod to the 1930s Hollywood era, where cocktails like this were all the rage in speakeasies.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a few fresh raspberries

cocktail_specs.name: The Word Is Love
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the tropical sweetness of pineapple with the herbal complexity of Chartreuse and absinthe. This modern creation plays on the contrast between bright citrus and earthy amaro notes, offering a refreshing yet sophisticated sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: The Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and refreshing pre-Prohibition cocktail, The Bee's Knees combines the bright acidity of lemon with the smooth sweetness of honey syrup, all balanced by the botanical complexity of London dry gin. It was a favorite among jazz-age revelers and remains a timeless classic.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Monkey Gland
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a mysterious history, the Monkey Gland is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical depth, absinthe's herbal complexity, and grenadine's sweet-tart richness. Named after an infamous 1920s elixir believed to boost virility, this drink delivers a sophisticated balance of flavors that dance between bitter, sweet, and citrusy notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Cranberry Rosemary Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic twist on the classic Gin Fizz, this cocktail combines tart cranberry and earthy rosemary with bright citrus notes. The addition of a homemade cranberry-rosemary syrup adds depth and complexity, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass or highball glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice, then top with soda water. Stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Fresh rosemary sprig and a few cranberries, skewered on a cocktail pick.

cocktail_specs.name: Moskva Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the Moscow Mule, this cocktail replaces vodka with gin for a more complex, botanically rich profile. It balances bright lemon juice, sweet maraschino liqueur, and the earthy bitterness of Cynar, creating a harmonious blend that is both refreshing and spirit-forward.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a copper mug or highball glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled copper mug or highball glass filled with ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon wheel and a sprig of rosemary or thyme

cocktail_specs.name: Moskva Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the Moscow Mule, this cocktail replaces vodka with gin for a more complex, botanical profile. Its bright citrus notes from lemon juice and maraschino liqueur are balanced by the herbal depth of dry curaçao, creating a lively, slightly sweet, and effervescent drink perfect for summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a copper mug filled with ice, garnished with a lemon twist or lime wheel if desired.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a copper mug filled with ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Yellow Belly
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and zesty cocktail, the Yellow Belly is a harmonious blend of vodka's crisp neutrality, limoncello's sweet orange essence, and lemon juice's bright acidity. It's a refreshing choice for those who appreciate a balanced citrus-forward drink with a touch of richness from the syrup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Cosmic Coral
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing highball cocktail, the Cosmic Coral combines the crispness of vodka and tonic with the sweet-tart allure of blue curaçao and lime juice. A touch of grenadine adds a subtle depth, creating a visually striking drink that's perfect for summer gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of edible glitter or luster dust for a cosmic touch.

cocktail_specs.name: Ding a Ling
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Ding a Ling is a harmonious blend of tropical passion fruit, citrusy lime, and herbal Galliano, balanced with vodka. It’s a staple in tiki culture, often served in a coconut shell or a tall glass, evoking the spirit of Polynesian paradise.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Lagoon Original
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki classic, the Blue Lagoon is a harmonious blend of vodka, gin, and blue curaçao, balanced with lime juice and rich syrup. Its bright turquoise hue and sweet-tart profile make it a staple in tropical cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Water Lily
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and floral cocktail, the Water Lily combines the bright acidity of lemon with the deep, earthy notes of hibiscus liqueur and the botanical complexity of gin. Its balanced sweetness and herbal undertones make it a sophisticated yet approachable choice for spring or summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Edible flower (e.g., pansy or borage) and a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Corpse Reviver Variation is a refined twist on the original, featuring pink gin for a subtle sloe berry note alongside classic elements like Cointreau and Lillet Blanc. It's a spirit-forward elixir that balances sweetness with herbal complexity, often associated with the golden age of cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a refined twist on the classic Martini, featuring Kin No Bi Gin's delicate sloe berry notes, Bols Triple Sec's citrusy sweetness, and a bright, zesty lemon juice. It was popularized in the 1920s during the Prohibition era as a stylish alternative to the Martini.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail that packs a punch with its equal parts vodka, tequila, rum, and gin. Born in the 1970s at the Long Island Lounge in New York, it's a refreshing yet potent blend of citrus, sweetness, and effervescence, often served tall and topped with cola for a deceptive simplicity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except cola with ice, then strain into a glass filled with fresh ice. Top with cola.

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Lagoon Modern
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Blue Lagoon, this modern version replaces gin with infused vodka while retaining its signature blue hue and effervescent charm. It balances sweet, citrusy notes with a subtle herbal undertone, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with Sprite.

cocktail_specs.name: Scarlet Knight
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Scarlet Knight combines the bright acidity of cranberry with the herbal depth of Ramazotti and the spiced richness of Benedictine. Its deep red hue and layered flavors make it a standout choice for those who appreciate bold, spirit-forward creations.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Alexander
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and indulgent cocktail, the Alexander is a modern twist on the classic White Lady, featuring a blend of two gins and a luscious chocolate syrup, topped with sweetened coconut cream. Its creamy texture and rich, slightly bitter-sweet profile make it a decadent choice for those who enjoy a balance of complexity and smoothness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Gimlet
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, refreshing classic with a bright citrus profile and a touch of sweetness. Originating in the British Empire during the early 20th century, it was traditionally served as a remedy for scurvy among sailors due to its lime content.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pisco Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent Peruvian classic, the Pisco Sour is a harmonious marriage of citrus brightness, floral Pisco, and a touch of sweetness. Born in Lima's early 20th-century bars, it gained global fame after being introduced to the U.S. by American soldiers during World War II.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass; top with egg white foam.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and refreshing classic cocktail, the Bee's Knees combines the botanical complexity of gin with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the smooth sweetness of honey syrup. Originating in the early 20th century, it is a perfect representation of the elegance and simplicity found in vintage cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pink Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Pink Lady is a luxurious blend of gin, Calvados, lemon juice, grenadine, and simple syrup, topped with a frothy egg white. Originating in the 1920s, it's known for its delicate balance of sweet, tart, and creamy elements, making it a timeless choice for special occasions.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled coupe glass, then top with egg white and gently float the froth on top.

cocktail_specs.name: High Five
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail, the High Five is a modern twist on classic gin-based drinks. It balances the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sweet-tart bite of grapefruit juice and a touch of citrus brightness from lime, creating a lively aperitivo that's both invigorating and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into the glass over fresh ice. Top with soda water (optional).

cocktail_specs.name: Jack Frost
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and complex cocktail, the Jack Frost is a harmonious blend of crisp blanco tequila, sweet pear brandy, and dry vermouth, balanced by bright lime juice and a touch of mint. It's a modern twist on classic elements, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile that bridges the gap between traditional and contemporary cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Monkey Gland
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Monkey Gland is a vibrant blend of gin's botanical depth, tart orange juice, and a whisper of absinthe's herbal complexity. Created in the mid-20th century for its striking color and layered flavors, it balances sweetness with an unexpected bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on King's Jubilee
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered riff on the classic King's Jubilee, this cocktail replaces the traditional gin with mezcal for a smoky depth, while cognac and Lillet add richness. Maraschino liqueur introduces a subtle cherry sweetness, balanced by the herbal complexity of Averna and the bitter notes of Suze and Peychaud's bitters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or over a large cube for on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist and a flamed cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that plays with the layers of mezcal, floral St-Germain, and herbal liqueurs. This riff on the classic 'Maximilian Affair' introduces Averna and Suze to deepen its aromatic profile, creating a drink that is both earthy and refined.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small sprig of rosemary for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Last Word
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic 'Last Word,' this cocktail replaces the traditional maraschino with Averna, adding a rich herbal depth to its already complex profile. It's a harmonious blend of citrus brightness, floral sweetness, and bitter amaro notes, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime Twist and a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Apricot Mango Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing blend of gin, apricot liqueur, and mango-passionfruit nectar, this cocktail offers a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and botanical notes. The addition of lemon juice brightens the drink, while orange bitters add a subtle complexity, making it a delightful choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass or over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Mango slice and a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Gimlet Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Gimlet, this highball version replaces traditional lime cordial with rich syrup for a smoother, more balanced profile. It retains the bright citrus and botanical notes of gin while offering a lighter, effervescent finish—ideal for sipping or pairing with light bites.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda (for the base), then top with soda water and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Yukiguni
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant Japanese-inspired cocktail, the Yukiguni combines the crisp cleanliness of infused vodka with the sweet citrus notes of Cointreau and a bright lime finish. Its name translates to 'snow country,' evoking the serene landscapes of Hokkaido.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice (dry shake) and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Aviation
cocktail_specs.description: The Aviation is a sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that pays homage to early aviation pioneers. It combines the bright acidity of lemon with the floral sweetness of crème de violette, creating a harmonious balance of citrus, cherry, and violet notes. First introduced in 1915 at the Boston Cocktail Club, it remains a timeless classic.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A lively and effervescent classic, the Gin Fizz is a refreshing blend of gin's botanical notes with bright lemon juice and sweet simplicity. Originating in the late 19th century, it’s a staple for those who appreciate a crisp, bubbly drink that dances on the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled glass, and top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Star Daisy
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Star Daisy is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, applejack's sweetness, and dry curaçao's citrusy depth. Its name reflects its star-like presentation when poured into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a star-shaped garnish (traditionally, a star anise or a lemon wheel cut into a star shape)

cocktail_specs.name: Between the Sheets
cocktail_specs.description: A seductive and versatile cocktail, Between the Sheets is a harmonious blend of cognac, light rum, triple sec, and lemon juice. Its name comes from the practice of serving it between two slices of lemon, which adds both visual appeal and a subtle citrus aroma.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: The Harlem
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail, The Harlem blends the bright acidity of pineapple juice with the botanical complexity of Hayman's London Dry Gin. A touch of Luxardo Maraschino liqueur adds a subtle cherry sweetness, while grapefruit bitters introduce a sharp, citrusy bite, creating a harmonious balance of flavors that is both vibrant and elegant.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Gin Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant twist on the classic Gin Cocktail, this variation replaces traditional Angostura bitters with absinthe for a more complex, herbal depth. It balances sweetness from rich syrup with the bright acidity of maraschino, creating a sophisticated, spirit-forward experience that is both nostalgic and innovative.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, elegant cocktail with a crisp, clean profile that balances the botanical complexity of gin with the subtle sweetness and citrus notes of Lillet Blanc. Traditionally served in a chilled coupe or martini glass, this drink is often associated with sophistication and refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda for 20-30 seconds over ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Olive or Lemon Twist (Saline Solution is unconventional for a Martini; corrected to traditional options)

cocktail_specs.name: Bourbon Amaro Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, this cocktail replaces bourbon with amaro di Angostura, creating a rich, aromatic balance of citrus, spice, and herbal complexity. The addition of cardamom bitters adds a subtle warmth, making it a versatile drink for both sipping and mixing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and iconic cocktail, the Vesper is a masterful blend of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc, with grapefruit bitters adding a bright, citrusy complexity. Created by Ian Fleming for James Bond in his novel 'Casino Royale,' it embodies elegance and refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Garnish with a saline solution (optional, typically lemon twist or grapefruit twist)

cocktail_specs.name: Alaska
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Alaska is a harmonious blend of dry gin, Chartreuse, sherry, and Suze, creating a complex symphony of herbal, citrus, and nutty notes. This classic drink, often associated with the golden age of cocktails, offers a refined balance that makes it both versatile and deeply satisfying.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Lillet
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant French-inspired cocktail, the Gin Lillet is a harmonious blend of dry gin's botanical complexity, Lillet Blanc's delicate herbal notes, and a touch of bright lemon juice. It's a refined aperitif that bridges the gap between classic and modern mixology, often associated with Parisian sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Zentralfriedhof
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic highball cocktail, the Zentralfriedhof is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, Lillet's wine-like richness, and absinthe's herbal depth. It was created by the renowned mixologist David Wondrich, evoking the spirit of Vienna with its layered flavors and effervescent texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir all ingredients without ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon Twist and a Sprig of Rosemary

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver No. 2
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, spirit-forward cocktail known for its complex layers of gin, absinthe, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice. Created in the 1930s by Harry MacElhone at the London branch of the Ritz, it is a masterclass in balancing sweet, herbal, and citrus notes with a touch of anise from the absinthe.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
