cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces traditional Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc and Suze, delivering a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It balances the herbal notes of gin with the subtle bitterness of grapefruit bitters, creating a sophisticated yet approachable drink perfect for daytime sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of grapefruit peel or a lemon wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Great Gatsby
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail inspired by the opulence of the Roaring Twenties, the Great Gatsby combines smooth vodka with the floral notes of Lillet Blanc, a touch of pink grapefruit syrup, and bright lemon juice. Its name evokes the glamour and excess of F. Scott Fitzgerald's iconic novel, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate both classic literature and refined libations.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Twist of lemon peel and a grapefruit wedge

cocktail_specs.name: Ideal Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and versatile cocktail, the Ideal Martini is a harmonious marriage of London dry gin's botanical complexity and the subtle sweetness of dry vermouth. It was popularized in the early 20th century as a sophisticated alternative to the classic Martini, offering a more balanced and approachable profile while retaining elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up, chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Vodka Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant twist on the classic Martini, this version replaces gin with smooth vodka to create a lighter, more approachable yet equally refined drink. It maintains the timeless allure of the Martini while offering a cleaner, more neutral base that allows the dry vermouth's herbal and citrus notes to shine.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass, preferably on the rocks or up, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice until well-chilled, then strain into a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Olive or a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and iconic cocktail, the Vesper is a masterful blend of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc, known for its smooth, slightly sweet, and subtly herbal profile. Popularized by Ian Fleming in his James Bond novels, it embodies elegance and sophistication, often referred to as 'the martini's more interesting cousin.'
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Crusta
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Brandy Crusta is a refined blend of rich cognac, citrus, and floral notes. Created in the early 20th century, it is known for its delicate balance of sweetness and acidity, often served with a sugar-coated rim that adds a subtle crunch.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda, then strain into a chilled coupe glass previously dipped in sugar syrup to create a sugar-coated rim.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical cocktail, the Hurricane is a refreshing blend of Jamaican rum, citrus, and passion fruit syrup. Originating from the Tiki era, it's known for its bright orange hue and balanced sweet-tart profile, often served in a tall, hurricane glass to showcase its layered presentation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon wheel and maraschino cherry on a long skewer, with a pineapple leaf garnish around the rim.

cocktail_specs.name: Summer Daze
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical-inspired cocktail that balances the bright acidity of lime and lemon with the herbal depth of Suze and the sweetness of pineapple syrup. Its layered flavors—earthy, citrusy, and subtly floral—make it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients (excluding soda) with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Pacific Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-inspired cocktail, the Pacific Swizzle combines the bold, unaged Jamaican rum with the earthy depth of thyme syrup, bright lime juice, and the tropical sweetness of passion fruit purée. It’s a celebration of island flavors, often associated with the tiki movement's love for exotic and layered profiles.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Champs-Élysées
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on the classic Sidecar, the Champs-Élysées elevates its profile with a whisper of Green Chartreuse. This cocktail balances the richness of Cognac with the citrusy brightness of lemon juice and Triple Sec, creating a harmonious blend that is both complex and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Martinez
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on the classic Vesper, the Martinez is a harmonious blend of London dry gin, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and Angostura bitters. Created in the late 19th century at the Knickerbocker Hotel in San Francisco, it predates the Vesper by decades and offers a delightful balance of citrus, herbal, and bitter notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Flatiron Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic martini, the Flatiron Martini replaces gin with vodka and adds a touch of citrus brightness from Stoli Oranj or Eristoff Lime. Its name comes from the iconic Manhattan skyscraper, symbolizing its modern, urban appeal.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

ingredients.name: Stoli Oranj or Eristoff Lime Vodka

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Blossom
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and aromatic cocktail that marries the floral notes of gin with the sweet, fruity essence of apricot eau-de-vie and the herbal depth of bianco vermouth. It's a sophisticated twist on the classic Martinez, offering a refined balance of sweetness, bitterness, and botanical complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single apricot blossom or a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Juniperotivo
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Juniperito, this cocktail replaces traditional vermouth with a luscious grenadine and juniper syrup, creating a harmonious blend of sweet, tart, and piney notes. It's a refreshing yet complex drink that balances the herbal depth of gin with the fruity richness of raspberry.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Jam Cosmo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Cosmopolitan, the Jam Cosmo replaces cranberry with a luscious jam syrup, delivering a sweet-tart balance that dances between citrus brightness and fruity depth. It’s a modern take on a beloved cocktail, perfect for those who crave a playful yet sophisticated sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

ingredients.name: Rich Syrup (e.g., raspberry or blackberry jam syrup)

cocktail_specs.name: Suze Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Americano, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with blanco vermouth and adds Suze, a French liqueur infused with artichoke. It offers a refined balance of herbal bitterness, citrus notes, and effervescence, making it an elegant choice for aperitivo or pre-dinner sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Poet's Dream
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Poet's Dream is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, dry vermouth's herbal depth, and Benedictine's rich, spiced sweetness. This elegant creation is a modern twist on the classic Vesper, designed to evoke the imagination with its layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Poet's Dream
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Poet's Dream combines the floral notes of dry vermouth with the herbal complexity of gin and the spiced depth of Bénédictine. Its name evokes a sense of literary elegance, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate refined, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium
cocktail_specs.description: A refined blend of two Cuban rums, this cocktail offers a smooth, balanced profile with notes of vanilla, caramel, and subtle spice. It's a celebration of rum craftsmanship, combining the heritage richness of Bacardi Ron Superior Heritage with the clarity and elegance of Santa Teresa Ron Claro.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: English Harbor 5
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-inspired cocktail that marries the robust, gunpowder-spiced profile of Pusser's Navy Strength Gin with the rich, caramelized depth of El Dorado 12-year-old rum. This drink is a nod to naval tradition, blending maritime history with tropical warmth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled tiki mug or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled tiki mug or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Duppy Share Spiced
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the Duppy Share Spiced is a rich blend of spiced rum, gin, and pineapple juice. It captures the essence of Caribbean flavors with its warm spices, citrus notes, and tropical sweetness, making it a perfect choice for those who love layered, spirit-forward drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tiki mug or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into the glass over fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Pineapple leaf and a flamed orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: White
cocktail_specs.description: A versatile and adaptable spirit blend, this cocktail showcases a harmonious mix of light Cuban rums, Angostura bitters, and a touch of tequila. Its name suggests simplicity, but its complexity lies in the interplay of flavors—sweet, aromatic, with a hint of smokiness from the tequila.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium White
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail that highlights the smoothness of premium white rum, this drink is a study in balance with a touch of complexity from Banks 5. It’s a modern take on simplicity, where the crisp, clean notes of white rum shine without overpowering the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: English Medium
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of rums from Barbados and Jamaica, the English Medium offers a harmonious balance of rich, molasses-forward flavors with subtle spice notes. This cocktail is a nod to the complexity and depth that can be achieved by layering different rum styles, creating a smooth yet intriguing profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark Rum
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex blend of dark rums from various regions, this cocktail offers a deep, smoky, and slightly caramelized profile with hints of spice and molasses. It’s a celebration of rum’s diversity, combining Cuban, Jamaican, and Barbados expressions for a layered experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime twist or a sprinkle of flaky sea salt

cocktail_specs.name: Demerara
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and robust rum cocktail that celebrates the caramelized depth of Demerara syrup, often paired with aged rums for a complex, molasses-forward profile. This drink is deeply rooted in Caribbean tradition, where Demerara sugar has been a prized commodity since colonial times.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a flamed orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: OP Jamaican Unaged
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, unaged rum cocktail that captures the bright, fruity essence of Jamaican rums. This drink is a celebration of freshness and complexity, blending the crisp notes of Hampden Estate's rum with the rich, spiced character of Worthy Park and Appleton Estate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass or over crushed ice for a refreshing twist.
cocktail_specs.method: Build directly in the serving glass with ice, then stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprig of fresh mint

cocktail_specs.name: OP Jamaican Aged
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum cocktail that layers the rich, molasses-forward profile of aged Jamaican and Cuban rums with the deep, charred notes of a black barrel-aged Barbados rum. This drink is a celebration of rum's diversity, blending sweet, spicy, and smoky elements into a spirit-forward experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice for 30 seconds.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Flamed orange peel or a sprinkle of smoked salt.

cocktail_specs.name: OP demerara
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the OP demerara is a harmonious blend of overproof rum and rich Scotch whisky, sweetened with Demerara syrup. It embodies the adventurous spirit of tiki culture while delivering deep, molasses-rich flavors with a touch of smokiness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a double old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a few drops of Angostura bitters on the surface.

cocktail_specs.name: OP Allround
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and versatile rum cocktail designed to showcase the unique characteristics of overproof rums. This drink is a celebration of rum's diversity, blending the rich, unaged depth of Plantation OFTD with the fiery intensity of Cruzan 151 Proof and the smooth, light profile of Takamaka 69%. It's a spirit-forward experience that highlights the complexity and range of rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Sipping English
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant sipper, the Sipping English is a harmonious blend of two esteemed Barbados rums, Doorly's and Mount Gay Black Barrel. It showcases the rich, molasses-forward character of aged rum with a smooth, balanced finish, perfect for savoring slowly.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred gently with no ice, then strained into the serving vessel.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium English
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of premium rums, the Premium English is a spirit-forward cocktail that showcases the depth and complexity of aged and unaged Jamaican and Barbados expressions. It's a modern take on the classic 'English' cocktail, often associated with the Royal Navy, but elevated with carefully selected, high-quality rums.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Sipping Spanish
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic Spanish sipping rum cocktail, the Sipping Spanish is a harmonious blend of premium Cuban rums, Angostura bitters, and a touch of Flor de Cana. It offers a rich tapestry of caramel, vanilla, and spice notes, with a smooth, lingering finish that makes it perfect for savoring slowly.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over one large ice cube or straight up in a snifter.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice until well-chilled, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single expresso bean or a twist of lemon peel for aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium Spanish
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of Cuban rums, this cocktail combines the smoothness of Havana Seleccion de Maestros with the rich depth of Brugal 1888. It's a spirit-forward drink that captures the essence of premium aging and craftsmanship.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass, preferably over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime twist and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Pampero Aniversario
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Cuban-inspired cocktail, the Pampero Aniversario is a celebration of rum's diversity, blending light, medium, aged, and single malt whiskies with aromatic bitters. It pays homage to Cuba's rich distilling tradition while incorporating elements from other spirits, creating a layered experience that balances sweetness, spice, and depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed lime peel and a flamed orange wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Pampero Anniversario
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Cuban-inspired cocktail celebrating the anniversary of Flor de Caña, this drink layers three distinct Cuban rums—Angostura bitters, Flor de Caña, Santiago de Cuba, and Ron Cubay—into a velvety, aromatic experience. Its deep caramel, spice, and molasses notes reflect the island's rum-making tradition.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Havana Seleccion de Maestros
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of two Cuban rums, this cocktail showcases the depth and complexity of Brugal 1888's rich, aged profile alongside the crisp brightness of Bacardi. It reflects the essence of Havana's rum tradition, offering a harmonious balance of caramel, vanilla, and citrus notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or straight up in a coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into the glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Aged Agricole
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that celebrates the depth of aged rum agricole, this drink harmonizes the smoky, volcanic notes of Rhum J.M Fuméé Volcanique with the rich, caramelized sweetness of St James VSOP and Barbancourt Rhum 4 Years. It’s a testament to the versatility of Martinique and Cuban rums, offering layers of flavor that dance between earthy, fruity, and spiced profiles.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or straight up in a coupe, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with no ice (if served straight up) or with one large ice cube (if served on the rocks).
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a small piece of fresh pineapple, optional.

cocktail_specs.name: Aged Jamaican
cocktail_specs.description: A refined rum cocktail that marries the rich, caramelized notes of Plantation Xaymaca with the deep, molasses-forward profile of Worthy Park Select. This drink is a celebration of aged Jamaican and Barbados rums, offering layers of complexity with hints of vanilla, spice, and dried fruit.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Highball 1:4
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet elegant highball, the 1:4 ratio of whiskey to soda water creates a crisp, refreshing drink with a smooth, mellow finish. It's a staple in American cocktail culture, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a light meal accompaniment.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently and strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of rich bourbon or rye whiskey, sweet demerara syrup, and aromatic bitters. It embodies simplicity and sophistication, with its deep caramel, vanilla, and citrus notes, often garnished with an orange peel for a burst of citrus aroma.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled rocks glass over a large ice cube.

cocktail_specs.name: Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and versatile cocktail, the Sour is a harmonious blend of whiskey's warmth, lemon juice's bright acidity, sweet syrup's smoothness, and egg white's silky texture. Originating in the early 20th century, it has evolved into countless variations but remains a staple for its balanced flavor profile and elegant presentation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or over ice in a rocks glass. Top with egg white foam if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small foam of egg white on top.
notes: Note: 'Lemon ango' likely refers to lemon angostura, which is not a standard ingredient in this cocktail. It may be a misinterpretation or typo.

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated Scottish cousin to the Manhattan, the Rob Roy replaces rye whiskey with Scotch, creating a smoother yet equally complex cocktail. Named after the 18th-century outlaw Robert MacGregor, it embodies elegance and depth with its rich blend of sweet vermouth, bitters, and premium Scotch.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or cherry, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch (60-5-8 rum-sugar-lime)
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary and potent French Polynesian cocktail, the Ti Punch is a simple yet profound blend of Naga Arrack, sugar, and lime juice. Originating from Tahiti, it embodies the essence of island life with its bold, unadulterated flavors—intense sweetness, tart citrus, and the deep, smoky character of aged rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a small glass, preferably with a lime wedge for garnish.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice until chilled, then strain into a small glass without additional ice. Traditionally served with a lime wedge on the rim or floating in the drink.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wedge (traditionally served with or without it)

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver No. 2
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail born in the golden age of mixology, Corpse Reviver No. 2 is a masterful blend of gin, amaro, and citrus, known for its complex balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes. Created by Harry MacElhone at the American Bar in London, it was famously enjoyed by Ernest Hemingway as a cure for hangovers.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up, chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1 (45-8-1)
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant classic, the Martini 6:1 is a perfect marriage of dry gin and vermouth, offering a crisp, clean palate with subtle herbal and citrus notes. This ratio emphasizes the gin's botanical complexity while maintaining the vermouth's delicate sweetness, making it a timeless choice for both cocktail enthusiasts and connoisseurs.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass, ideally with an olive or lemon twist garnish.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant classic, the Tom Collins is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, tart lemon juice, sweet simple syrup, and effervescent soda water. Originating in the late 19th century, it is said to have been named after the English actor Tom Collins, though its exact origins remain debated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tall, chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice; strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni 45-30-23-1 (Grapefruit)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this variation replaces sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc, adding a delicate floral and citrus complexity. The grapefruit garnish enhances its bright, bitter-sweet profile while maintaining the original's spirit-forward balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless British naval cocktail, the Dark 'n' Stormy is a bold and refreshing blend of dark rum and ginger beer. Created in Bermuda, it captures the essence of island life with its spicy, effervescent character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a highball glass with ice, then top with ginger beer.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1 (45-8-1)
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant classic, the Martini 6:1 is a harmonious blend of dry gin and vermouth, offering a crisp, clean profile with a subtle herbal complexity. This ratio, often associated with James Bond's 'shaken, not stirred,' delivers a sophisticated balance of botanical notes and bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni 45-30-23-1 (Grapefruit)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, citrus-forward twist on the classic Negroni, this variation replaces sweet vermouth with grapefruit juice, delivering a vibrant, refreshing balance of bitter Campari and botanical gin. It retains the spirit-forward intensity of its predecessor while introducing bright, zesty complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins (60-30-15-1-60 lemon)
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent classic, the Tom Collins is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, tart lemon juice, and sweet simple syrup, topped with soda water. Originating in England in the early 19th century, it remains a symbol of summer cocktails, balancing crisp acidity with a light, bubbly texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tall Collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice; strain into a chilled Collins glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn 45-15-15-8-8
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered gin cocktail, the Saturn 45-15-15-8-8 is a modern twist on the classic Vesper, incorporating additional elements to create a harmonious balance of botanical, citrus, and herbal notes. It's a sophisticated drink that showcases the versatility of gin while maintaining an elegant simplicity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet refreshing American classic, the Whiskey Highball is a harmonious blend of smooth bourbon and effervescent soda water. It originated in the early 20th century as a way to dilute whiskey for those who preferred it less potent, often garnished with lemon or lime.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing and balanced blend of white rum, lime juice, and sweetened syrup. Originating in the early 20th century at the Daiquirí Club in Cuba, it became one of the most iconic cocktails worldwide, known for its crisp acidity and smooth sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki cocktail born in the 1940s, the Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors with a rich, nutty depth. It blends aged Jamaican rum with dry curaçao, lime juice, orgeat, and rich syrup, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and herbal notes that evoke the spirit of Polynesia.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of rich bourbon or rye whiskey, sweet demerara syrup, and aromatic bitters. Its origins trace back to the early 19th century, evolving from a simple mix of whiskey and sugar to include Angostura bitters, which add depth and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then add ice and stir again before straining into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange peel twist, expressed over the drink

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant classic, the Martini 6:1 is a harmonious blend of dry gin and a whisper of sweet vermouth, creating a crisp, clean, and sophisticated profile. The precise ratio of 6 parts gin to 1 part vermouth ensures a balanced drink that is both strong and subtly nuanced, often garnished with a twist of lemon or olive for added flair.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail marries smoky mezcal with bright tequila and a touch of grapefruit bitters. Hailing from Oaxaca, Mexico, it embodies the region's rich mezcal tradition while offering a complex, aromatic experience that balances sweetness, smokiness, and citrus.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Cognac Cocktail (Sazerac)
cocktail_specs.description: A pre-Prohibition classic, the Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of cognac, bittersweet syrup, and aromatic bitters, with a touch of absinthe for complexity. It was one of the earliest cocktails in America, predating even the Manhattan, and its name may derive from the Sazerac de Forge et Fils brandy or the Creole word 'sazerac,' meaning 'wildcat.'
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and three Luxardo cherries (or a single cherry for garnish)

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet profound tiki classic, the Ti Punch is a harmonious blend of white rum, lime juice, and rich syrup. Originating from French Polynesia, it embodies the essence of island hospitality with its refreshing balance of sweetness and acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell or a small piece of fresh pineapple

cocktail_specs.name: Corn n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, molasses-forward tiki classic that marries dark rum with the caramel and spice of velvet falernum. This cocktail is a nod to the tropical, yet sophisticated, flavors of Polynesian-inspired drinks, offering a smooth, slightly syrupy sweetness balanced by warm spices.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a harmonious marriage of rich Scotch whisky, sweet vermouth, and aromatic bitters. Its deep amber hue and velvety texture make it a staple in cocktail culture since its creation at the Manhattan Club in New York City around 1874.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandied cherry (traditionally a Luxardo Maraschino cherry)

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the Whiskey Sour, the Rob Roy replaces bourbon with Scotch whisky, offering a richer, more complex profile. Named after the 18th-century Scottish outlaw Robert MacGregor (or 'Rob Roy'), this cocktail is a smooth blend of sweet, bitter, and herbal elements, perfect for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth and adds Suze for a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It retains the bittersweet balance of its predecessor while offering a refreshing, effervescent character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless colonial classic, the Gin and Tonic is a refreshing blend of botanical gin and tonic water, with its signature bitterness balanced by subtle citrus notes. Originating in British India as a medicinal tonic, it has since become a symbol of summer sipping and global adventure.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda (though traditionally built with ice).
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wedge or twist, and a sprig of rosemary (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: New York Minute
cocktail_specs.description: A fast-paced, spirit-forward cocktail that delivers a complex blend of smoky tequila, herbal amaro, and sweet maraschino, all balanced by the depth of barrel bitters. This drink is a modern twist on the classic, designed to be enjoyed in under a minute—just like its name suggests.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Le General
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant French cocktail, Le General is a harmonious blend of rich Cognac, herbal Lillet Blanc, and the complex flavors of Benedictine liqueur. It was created in the early 20th century at the Hotel du Palais in Biarritz, named after a general who frequented the establishment.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and sophisticated Cuban classic, the El Presidente is a harmonious blend of aged rum's caramel and spice notes, Lillet Blanc's herbal complexity, and Dry Curacao's citrus brightness. It was created in the early 20th century at the Hotel Nacional de Cuba in Havana, named after the hotel's president, and has since become a staple of Cuban cocktail culture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandy-soaked cherry, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Highball 1:4
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant highball, the 1:4 ratio balances rich, smooth Scotch whisky with a delicate splash of Monkey Shoulder, creating a sophisticated yet approachable spirit-forward drink. This variation emphasizes the whisky's depth while maintaining the classic highball's simplicity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water (not listed but implied for a proper highball).
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a single ice cube

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned 60-7-2-1
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this variation incorporates a precise ratio of four whiskies—Chivas Regal, Monkey Shoulder, Woodford Reserve, and an unspecified fourth spirit—to create a complex, layered profile with rich caramel, vanilla, and oak notes. It’s a celebration of balance and craftsmanship, paying homage to the original while pushing boundaries.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 20-30 seconds, then strain into a chilled rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist and a Luxardo cherry if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Sour 60-23-15-1 (lemon ango)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic sour, this cocktail balances the smoky depth of naked malt whisky and the caramel richness of Jack Daniels Rye with a bright, citrusy lemon component. It's a spirit-forward, layered drink that showcases both whiskies while maintaining a refreshing acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small skewer of lemon and ango (a type of Japanese sour citrus)

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy 60-30-5-1-1
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Rob Roy, this version incorporates Japanese whisky and corn whisky to create a complex, layered cocktail with notes of caramel, vanilla, and subtle grain sweetness. The 60-30-5-1-1 ratio suggests a balanced approach, blending equal parts Suntory Toki and Platte Valley Corn with other ingredients not listed here.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Tonic 1:4
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet elegant cocktail, the Tonic 1:4 is a refined twist on the classic gin and tonic. It replaces the traditional tonic water with a light Cuban rum, creating a harmonious blend of citrusy, herbal, and slightly sweet notes that dance on the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Top with a splash of soda water if desired, though it is traditionally served without.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprig of rosemary or mint, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1 (45-8-1)
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant variation of the classic Martini, this version incorporates a unique blend of Sardinian citrus-infused gin and Tarquins Grapefruit Elderflower liqueur. It embodies the sophistication of a traditional Martini while adding a subtle floral and fruity complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or olive on a toothpick

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins 60-30-15-1-60 Lemon
cocktail_specs.description: A refined variation of the classic Tom Collins, this version elevates the traditional recipe with a touch of White Negroni and Kartoff Gin, adding depth to its bright citrus and herbal profile. It retains the signature effervescence while introducing a more complex, layered flavor experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tall Collins glass filled with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a tall Collins glass filled with ice, top with soda water, and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum and Coke
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the rich caramel and vanilla notes of Jamaican rum with the effervescent sweetness of cola. Often considered a gateway to more complex rum-based drinks, its simplicity belies its depth, making it both a casual staple and a refined choice for those who appreciate bold flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda (though traditionally built in a glass with ice).

cocktail_specs.name: Tequila and Beer
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the smoky agave notes of tequila with the crisp maltiness of beer. This simple yet powerful drink is a staple in Mexican cantinas and has become a popular choice for those seeking a refreshing yet robust libation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda, then strain into a rocks glass over ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Hot Toddy
cocktail_specs.description: A comforting and warming cocktail, the Hot Toddy is a classic remedy with roots in 18th-century England. It combines the rich, oaky notes of cognac with bright lemon juice and sweet syrup, often served with a touch of heat from spices or bitters to soothe winter chills.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve hot.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: whiskey sour
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.style.up
cocktail_specs.method: method.shake.without.soda

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent classic, the Tom Collins is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, bright lemon juice, and sweet syrup, topped with soda water. Originating in London in the early 19th century, it is said to have been named after Tom Collins, an English actor, and remains a quintessential example of the highball style.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon Wheel and Cherry or Cocktail Onion

cocktail_specs.name: Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Mexican classic, the Margarita is a harmonious blend of tequila's agave sweetness, citrus brightness from lime juice and Triple Sec, and a touch of rich syrup for balance. Originating in the 1930s or 1940s, it became a symbol of Mexico's cocktail culture and remains a staple on menus worldwide.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda and strain into a salt-rimmed glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Salt rim and lime wheel or wedge.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and timeless French cocktail, the Sidecar is a harmonious blend of rich cognac, citrusy Curacao, and bright lemon juice. It was created during World War I by American expatriates in Paris, who sought to recreate the flavors of brandy-based cocktails using available ingredients.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Jet Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Jet Pilot is a layered cocktail that balances rich rums with citrus, spice, and herbal elements. Created in the 1940s by Donn Beach at the Trader Vic's chain, it's known for its deep, aromatic profile and the unique addition of falernum and absinthe.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and grapefruit wedge, flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Nicaraguan Jet Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Nicaraguan Jet Pilot is a layered blend of Flor de Caña rum expressions, citrus, spice, and aromatic bitters. Created in Nicaragua, it showcases the depth and character of Central American rum while delivering a refreshing yet intricate flavor profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a double old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Bali Bali
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical tiki classic with a complex blend of rums, citrus juices, and aromatic syrups. Created by Donn Beach in the 1950s, it balances sweet, tart, and herbal notes, often served over crushed ice for a refreshing, party-friendly experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktail_specs.name: Bolo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-inspired cocktail, the Bolo harmonizes the rich caramel notes of Puerto Rican rum with the earthy complexity of aged rhum agricole. Balanced by sweet pineapple juice, tart lime, and floral passion fruit syrup, it's a tropical escape that invites both adventure and comfort.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a tiki mug or highball glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Pineapple leaf and a lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Cobra's Fang
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Cobra's Fang delivers a potent punch of overproof demerara rum, balanced by the sweet, spiced depth of falernum and the bright acidity of citrus. Its name hints at its dangerous allure, with absinthe adding an emerald hue and a subtle herbal complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled tiki mug or double old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange wheel and a flamed lime shell (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Cocoanut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, creamy delight with a vibrant citrus twist, the Cocoanut Grove is a refreshing blend of light rum, lime juice, and orange curaçao, topped off with coconut cream. It evokes the lush, sun-drenched groves of the Caribbean, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, tangy, and nutty flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Doga Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Caribbean-inspired punch that harmonizes the rich, aged depth of Martinique rhum with the bright acidity of grapefruit and lime. The addition of cinnamon syrup lends a subtle warmth, making it a perfect balance of tropical sweetness and spice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a large punch bowl or glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit wheel and lime wheel, optional mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Eastern Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic sour, the Eastern Sour blends bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with bright citrus, almond orgeat, and a touch of sweetness. It hails from the modern cocktail renaissance, offering a harmonious balance between traditional techniques and innovative ingredients.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then double-strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Fog Cutter
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and warming cocktail born in the tropical climates of Puerto Rico, the Fog Cutter is a harmonious marriage of Puerto Rican rum's molasses depth, brandy's richness, and gin's botanical brightness. It was traditionally served to cut through the dense fog enveloping the island, offering a balance of sweet, nutty, and citrus notes with a silky sherry float.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice until well-chilled, then strain into the prepared glass. Float the Amontillado sherry on top.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a sprinkle of nutmeg (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical cocktail, the Hurricane is a bold blend of dark Jamaican rum, tart lemon juice, and sweet passion fruit syrup. It originated in the 1970s at the Hurricane Bar in Miami, known for its signature presentation in a tall, hurricane glass with a flaming orange peel garnish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Flaming orange peel and maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Chief Lapu Lapu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that pays homage to the legendary Filipino warrior, Chief Lapu-Lapu. This drink harmoniously blends dark Jamaican rum's rich molasses notes with light Puerto Rican rum's crisp brightness, balanced by tart citrus juices and sweet passion fruit syrup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a flaming orange wheel (optional).

cocktail_specs.name: El Diablo
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and vibrant Mexican cocktail, the El Diablo combines the smoky depth of tequila with the rich, jammy sweetness of crème de cassis and a sharp citrus kick. It was popularized in the 1930s at the Hotel El Moro in Mexico City, where it became a staple for its fiery character and refreshing balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, shake well, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger beer.

cocktail_specs.name: Painkiller (Beachbum Berry)
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Painkiller, this version infuses the creamy, fruity harmony with the rich, berry-forward notes of Beachbum Berry. It's a lush, indulgent cocktail that balances rum's depth with pineapple and orange juices' brightness, topped with a dusting of spices for warmth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lightly and pour over crushed ice.

ingredients.name: Pusser's Navy Strength Rum (or split dark Jamaican rum and dark Barbados rum)

cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange wheel, cinnamon stick, and nutmeg dusting

cocktail_specs.name: Polynesian Paralysis
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail born in the 1950s at Trader Vic's, this drink is a playful yet balanced mix of bourbon or rye, citrus juices, and almond syrup. Its name comes from its potent yet refreshing nature, often described as a 'paralyzing' combination of sweet and sour flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the heart of Polynesia, the Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai is a symphony of rum, citrus, and nutty sweetness. It was popularized by Trader Vic Berghoff in the 1940s, blending light and dark rums with Curacao, pineapple juice, orange juice, and orgeat to create a drink that's both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with lime wheel and cherry.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the rich, molasses notes of dark Jamaican rum with the fiery intensity of Cuban overproof rum. The tropical juices and passion fruit purée create a lush, fruity base, while lime juice adds a sharp contrast, making it a perfect summer sipper.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or in a tiki mug for a more festive presentation.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Scorpion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Caribbean cocktail, the Scorpion is a lively blend of light Puerto Rican rum, brandy, citrus juices, and almond syrup. Its name comes from its striking red hue, achieved by muddling the ingredients with crushed ice, creating a visually appealing and palate-cleansing drink perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tall cocktail glass or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that marries the botanical depth of London dry gin with the rich warmth of brandy, balanced by tart lime juice and sweet demerara syrup. Its effervescent ginger beer base adds a spicy kick, while Angostura bitters contribute aromatic complexity, making it both refreshing and deeply satisfying.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, brandy, lime juice, demerara syrup, and Angostura bitters with ice; strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger beer and gently stir. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic with a complex interplay of sweet, citrusy, and nutty flavors, the Mai Tai is often credited to Donn Beach in the 1940s. Its layered profile—balancing rum's smoky depth, lime's bright acidity, and orgeat's almond richness—makes it both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken, then strained into a tiki mug.

ingredients.name: Appleton Estate Extra or Coruba Dark

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane Caesar
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical twist on the classic Hurricane, this cocktail replaces traditional rum with Clement VSOP, a refined Martinique aged rum. The addition of passion fruit syrup and orgeat brings a luscious, nutty sweetness that contrasts beautifully with the bright acidity of lime juice, creating a complex yet refreshing tropical experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Painkiller (Eastern Standard)
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical twist on the classic Painkiller, this version elevates the original with a sophisticated blend of aged and overproof rums. It balances creamy coconut, bright citrus, and pineapple, offering a velvety texture and complex depth that makes it a standout in any tiki lineup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and cherry, skewered with a pineapple leaf.

cocktail_specs.name: Montego Bay
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Montego Bay is a symphony of sweet, tart, and aromatic flavors. It combines rich dark Jamaican rum with grapefruit juice, lime, honey syrup, allspice dram, absinthe, and Angostura bitters, creating a refreshing yet deeply layered experience that captures the essence of Caribbean hospitality.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light (Smuggler's Cove)
cocktail_specs.description: A sun-kissed, smuggler-inspired cocktail that balances the rich caramel and vanilla notes of bourbon with bright citrus and tropical passion fruit. Its honey syrup adds a smooth sweetness, making it both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice cube or on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Mr. Bali Hai
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical twist on the classic Mai Tai, this cocktail replaces traditional tiki elements with a sophisticated blend of Cuban and Jamaican rums, coffee liqueur, and vibrant citrus and pineapple juices. Its name evokes the exotic allure of Tiki culture, though it leans more toward modern mixology with its layered flavors—sweet, smoky, and slightly bitter—balanced by bright acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple leaf and cherry if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai 1956
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors with deep roots in Polynesian culture. This 1956 version, crafted by Victor Bergeron at Trader Vic's, balances rich Puerto Rican and Jamaican rums with citrus, nutty orgeat, and a touch of Curacao, creating a harmonious blend that’s both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or coconut shell.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai 1990
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and modern interpretation of the classic Mai Tai, this version balances rich Jamaican rums with bright citrus, floral orgeat, and a touch of bitterness. It reflects the evolution of the cocktail from its tiki roots into a more sophisticated, layered experience while retaining its tropical allure.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Saturn is a harmonious blend of dry gin's botanical notes, falernum's spiced sweetness, passion fruit syrup's tropical tang, and orgeat's nutty depth. It was crafted to evoke the celestial body it represents, balancing earthy and fruity elements with a touch of citrus brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled tiki mug or highball glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Passion fruit shell and a sprinkle of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Test Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that marries the rich, molasses-forward profile of dark Jamaican rum with the crisp brightness of light Puerto Rican rum. Layered with falernum's spiced sweetness, Cointreau's citrusy depth, and a whisper of absinthe, it delivers a sophisticated balance of tropical, herbal, and bittersweet notes—perfect for adventurous drinkers.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Thee Dots and a Dash
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, aromatic tiki classic that marries the deep caramel notes of Gold Martinique Rhum with the bright acidity of citrus and the spicy warmth of allspice dram. Its layered complexity—honeyed sweetness, molasses depth, and a whisper of bitterness—makes it a standout in the tiki repertoire.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a double old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Navy Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and refreshing rum-based cocktail with a rich history, the Navy Grog is a modern twist on the classic grog, traditionally served to sailors. It combines the depth of gold demerara, dark Jamaican, and Cuban rums with bright citrus notes from lime and grapefruit juice, balanced by the sweetness of honey syrup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Don's Beach Planter
cocktail_specs.serve: serve.temperature.cold.ice.crushed

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light (Beachbum Berry)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Port & Lemonade, this cocktail brings the essence of beachside indulgence with its bright passion fruit and tart lemon notes. It's a refreshing blend that balances sweetness and acidity, perfect for warm-weather sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai 1972
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical masterpiece with a complex interplay of rums, citrus, and nutty orgeat. This 1972 iteration by Donn Beach is a refined version of the classic Mai Tai, balancing sweet pineapple, tart lime, and the deep caramel notes of Jamaican rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or coconut shell.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into glass, then top with more crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki cocktail with a fiery, complex profile, the Zombie is a symphony of rums—gold Puerto Rican and Jamaican, balanced by overproof Demerara—infused with tropical citrus, spice, and a whisper of absinthe. Legend has it that Donn Beach invented this drink in 1934 at his Trader Vic's restaurant, serving it in a hollowed-out pineapple to guests who dared to 'zombie' their way through the potent concoction.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and lime wheel.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Crushed ice, mint sprig, lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Shrunken Skull
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Shrunken Skull is a harmonious blend of rich Puerto Rican rum, tangy lime juice, and sweet grenadine, layered with spicy cinnamon syrup. Its deep amber hue and aromatic mint garnish evoke the spirit of tropical adventure.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: QB Cooler (Beachbum Berry)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic QB Cooler, this version incorporates black rum and passion fruit syrup for a tropical, berry-forward profile. It's a perfect blend of citrus brightness, herbal complexity, and sweetness, ideal for warm weather sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a few berries (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: QB Cooler (Don the Beachcomber)
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, rum-forward elixir born from the tiki revolution of the mid-20th century, the QB Cooler is a symphony of Caribbean rums, sweetened with falernum and citrus, and spiced with ginger and honey. Its name pays homage to Don the Beachcomber, a legendary figure in tiki culture known for his love of rum and exotic flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Fog Cutter

cocktail_specs.name: Trader Vic
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Trader Vic is a complex and vibrant cocktail that embodies the spirit of Polynesian hospitality. It layers multiple rums, citrus juices, and fortified wines with a touch of orgeat and bitters, creating a rich, balanced, and slightly sweet profile that's both refreshing and deeply satisfying.

cocktail_specs.name: Fogg Cutter

cocktail_specs.name: Beachbum Berry

cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Jet Pilot is a masterful blend of dark Jamaican rum, overproof Demerara, and Puerto Rican gold, layered with citrus, spice, and herbal elements. cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Barbados 5 is a symphony of tropical rum, citrus, and aromatic bitters. Created in the 1940s by Donn Beach, it layers Flor de Caña rum, lime, grapefruit, cinnamon syrup, falernum, Angostura bitters, and absinthe for a balanced yet intricately layered profile.

cocktail_specs.name: OFTD

Its name reflects its earthy depth, while the absinthe adds a subtle herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors—sweet, nutty, and slightly bitter—with layers of aged Jamaican rum, citrus, and aromatic bitters. Its name evokes the tropical allure of Jamaica, where Coruba Dark rum is crafted, while the addition of absinthe adds a subtle herbal depth.

cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail with a smooth yet potent kick, the Polynesian Paralysis blends bourbon or rye whiskey with juicy orange and pineapple nectars, balanced by tart lemon and almond orgeat. Its name hints at its ability to both invigorate and relax, making it a perfect choice for warm-weather sipping.

Its name reflects its luminous hue, achieved by layering the ingredients to create a gradient from amber to deep red.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki-style cocktail, the Rum Barrel is a symphony of dark Jamaican rum, tropical juices, and aromatic bitters. It balances sweetness with subtle spice, creating a rich, barrel-aged experience reminiscent of rum's deep history in Caribbean culture.

The addition of Rauch lemon juice adds a smoky, citrusy brightness, while Aloha Fassionola brings a bold, overproof rum character to the drink.

cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki-style cocktail, the Scorpion is a harmonious blend of citrus, rum, and almond syrup. Its name comes from the striking contrast between its bright orange hue and the 'stinger' of brandy, making it both visually appealing and deliciously complex.

cocktail_specs.description: A refined and versatile cocktail, the SC is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin, white rum, brandy, and citrus juices, sweetened with demerara syrup. It was created at the South Carolina Bar in New York City and has become a staple for its balanced sweetness, bright citrus notes, and smooth complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Shrunken Skull
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Shrunken Skull is a harmonious fusion of overproof Demerara rum, rich Cuban gold rum, tart lime juice, and lush grenadine. Its deep amber hue and layered flavors—caramelized molasses, tropical fruit, and citrus brightness—make it a standout in any tiki menu.

cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Suffering Bastard delivers a punchy blend of London dry gin's botanical depth, brandy's warmth, and ginger beer's effervescent spice. It was created by bartender Jeff 'Bearded' Berry in the early 2010s, embodying the spirit of modern tiki with its layered flavors—citrus brightness, molasses richness, and aromatic bitters.

cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie is a fiery, complex concoction that layers rich rums with tropical, citrusy, and spicy elements. cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tropical cocktail, the Pussers is a celebration of Caribbean flavors with its blend of overproof rum, naval-strength gins, and lush juices. It balances sweet, tart, and herbal notes, creating a drink that's both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum cocktail that celebrates the rich, molasses-forward character of Jamaican rum. This drink combines Flor de Caña 7, a Cuban aged rum with caramel notes, with an unaged Jamaican rum to create a smooth yet robust flavor profile, perfect for sipping slowly.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or straight up in a coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into the glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A flamed orange peel or a light dusting of nutmeg for aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Orange Juice
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant twist on a classic, this modern take combines the bright acidity of passion fruit syrup with the rich caramel notes of Demerara rum. It's a playful yet balanced drink that bridges the gap between traditional orange juice and tropical cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and a sprig of mint

cocktail_specs.name: Cobra's Fang
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Cobra's Fang combines the tropical sweetness of passion fruit syrup with the rich depth of falernum and overproof demerara rum. Its name reflects its potent kick, balancing citrus brightness with a hint of spice, making it both refreshing and spirit-forward.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Cocoanut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, creamy delight that hails from the golden age of Tiki cocktails, the Cocoanut Grove is a lush blend of light rum, citrus, and coconut cream. Its vibrant orange hue and sweet yet tangy profile make it a staple for those seeking a taste of paradise.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a Tiki mug or hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Maraschino cherry and a pineapple leaf or umbrella

cocktail_specs.name: Medium Cuban Rum
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly sweet rum cocktail, the Medium Cuban Rum is a harmonious blend of unaged cachaca and tart lime juice. It captures the essence of Cuban rum's smoothness while offering a bright citrus contrast, making it an ideal choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: El Dorado 3
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki classic, the El Dorado 3 is a bright blue elixir that balances tart lime juice with the sweet, floral notes of Pierre Ferrand Curacao. It's a staple in tropical cocktails, offering a burst of citrusy sweetness with a smooth, slightly herbal finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Dr Funk
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the funky complexity of rhum agricole with the herbal intrigue of absinthe. Created by Dr. Funk himself, this drink is a celebration of bold flavors, blending tart citrus, sweet raspberry, and the distinctive anise notes of absinthe.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sprinkle of absinthe essence on top

cocktail_specs.name: Donga Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-style cocktail, the Donga Punch is a tropical twist on classic punch, blending aged rhum agricole with grapefruit juice for a bright citrus profile. Its hint of cinnamon syrup adds warmth without overpowering the zesty flavors, making it a perfect summer drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist and a cinnamon stick

cocktail_specs.name: Eastern Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic sour, the Eastern Sour combines bourbon or rye with a generous splash of orange juice and lemon juice, sweetened with orgeat syrup for a nutty depth. Its name reflects its origins in the American South, where it was embraced as a refined alternative to traditional sours.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a sprinkle of almond slivers for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: El Diablo
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery and refreshing Mexican classic, the El Diablo combines smoky Tequila Reposado with the deep, luscious sweetness of Crème de Cassis and a bright lime twist. Topped with ginger ale, it delivers a perfect balance of heat, fruitiness, and effervescence, making it a beloved choice for those who crave both complexity and a touch of spice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake Tequila Reposado, Crème de Cassis, lime juice with ice. Strain into the glass filled with fresh ice and top with Ginger Ale.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Old Etonian
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic British cocktail, the Old Etonian is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity, Lillet Blanc's herbal sweetness, and the nutty depth of Crème de Noyau. It was created at Eton College in the early 20th century, embodying the elegance of British mixology with a touch of French refinement.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: S'n'Emm
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the S'n'Emm is a modern twist on the classic Negroni, featuring mezcal for its smoky depth and a reduced dose of Campari. It delivers a harmonious balance of herbal bitterness, sweetness, and smokiness, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Ampersand
cocktail_specs.description: The Ampersand is a sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail that harmonizes the richness of Cognac and Old Tom Gin with the herbal complexity of vermouth and the sweet, citrusy brightness of Orange Curacao. Its name reflects its layered character, blending two distinct spirits in equal measure, creating a drink that is both nostalgic and modern.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist or a flamed orange peel for aroma and decoration.

cocktail_specs.name: Less is more Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version reduces the Campari and doubles down on sweet vermouth, creating a smoother, more vermouth-forward profile with a lingering herbal bitterness. It’s a playful yet sophisticated take on an Italian staple.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a single orange peel for expression, garnished over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Nymph
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Nymph is a harmonious blend of Canadian whisky's rich, oaky notes with the floral and citrusy essence of Lillet Blanc. The touch of apricot brandy liqueur adds a subtle sweetness, while Ango bitters introduce a hint of aromatic complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A small apricot twist or a flamed orange wheel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Pied-à-terre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Pied-à-terre is a harmonious blend of Cognac, Jägermeister, Lillet Blanc, and Peychaud's Bitters. It offers a rich tapestry of flavors, with notes of caramel, herbs, citrus, and a hint of spice, making it an ideal drink for those who appreciate depth and balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Ocean Cable
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Ocean Cable is a harmonious blend of smoky Canadian whisky, nutty Cognac, and herbal Lillet Blanc, finished with a whisper of aromatic bitters. It evokes the depth and complexity of coastal landscapes, offering a smooth yet intricately balanced experience that bridges traditional French and modern Canadian spirits.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for 20-30 seconds, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange peel, then a twist to express oils.

cocktail_specs.name: La Fontaine
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail, La Fontaine is a harmonious marriage of Calvados's rich apple brandy with the delicate herbal notes of Lillet Blanc, balanced by the subtle sweetness of apricot liqueur and a whisper of absinthe. This drink is a celebration of French craftsmanship, often associated with the sophisticated art of mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single drop of absinthe on the surface, optionally garnished with a small apple slice or twist.

cocktail_specs.name: History & Nobility
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail that embodies the essence of French nobility, this drink harmoniously blends the rich, oak-aged complexity of Cognac with the delicate floral notes of Lillet Blanc. A touch of apricot liqueur adds a subtle sweetness, while orange bitters introduce a bright, aromatic finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Clockwork
