cocktail_specs.description: A meticulously crafted cocktail with a layered profile of rich bourbon, herbal Lillet Blanc, and the bittersweet depth of Amaro Montenegro. Its name reflects its precise balance, offering a harmonious blend of sweet, bitter, and aromatic notes that dance on the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or up in a coupe, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 20-30 seconds, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single Luxardo cherry or a twist of lemon peel, optional.

cocktail_specs.name: Unusual Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc and Aperol, creating a smoother, more aromatic profile. It retains the balance of bittersweet complexity while introducing floral and citrus notes that elevate its sophistication.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Nouveau Carre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Carré, this cocktail replaces Cognac with aged tequila, creating a rich, layered experience with notes of caramelized oak, herbal complexity, and a hint of spice. It’s a modern take on a 19th-century French original, blending the depth of anejo tequila with the elegance of Lillet Blanc and the aromatic warmth of Benedictine.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: St. Columbus Rill
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the St. Columbus Rill is a harmonious blend of Irish whiskey's rich, malty depth and Lillet Blanc's herbal elegance, with a touch of Green Chartreuse's complex botanical notes and Maraschino liqueur's sweet cherry undertones. It's a perfect example of how different spirits and liqueurs can come together to create a truly unique and memorable drinking experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Blossom
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and aromatic cocktail that harmonizes the floral notes of London Dry Gin with the apricot sweetness of Lillet Blanc and a touch of peach eau de vie. The Orange Bitters add a subtle citrus brightness, making it a sophisticated yet approachable drink perfect for spring or summer evenings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice and strain into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single edible flower, such as a rose or violet, for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Les Verts Monts
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered French cocktail, Les Verts Monts is a harmonious blend of Armagnac, Cognac, and Calvados, balanced with Lillet Blanc and Cream Sherry. It's sweet yet complex, with hints of apple, maple, and citrus, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate the depth of French spirits.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Eeyore's Requiem
cocktail_specs.description: A melancholic yet invigorating cocktail, Eeyore's Requiem is a complex blend of bitter amaro, herbal liqueurs, and a whisper of gin. Its dark, introspective profile reflects the somber charm of its namesake, balancing sweetness with deep, earthy bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single, expressive twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Bitter Stripper
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Americano, the Bitter Stripper replaces sweet vermouth with Salers Gentiane and Cointreau, creating a complex, bitter-sweet profile with notes of orange blossom and herbal depth. It's a sophisticated aperitivo that balances gin's botanicals with the earthy bitterness of gentian.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of orange peel for expression.

cocktail_specs.name: Kentucky Corpse Reviver
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Kentucky Corpse Reviver is a masterful blend of bourbon's rich caramel notes with Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, Cointreau's orange sweetness, and lemon juice's bright acidity. Created in the mid-20th century by bartenders at the Caribbean Club in New Orleans, it is often credited to Harry MacElhone or Jerry Thomas, though its exact origins remain debated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Necromancer
cocktail_specs.description: A hauntingly complex cocktail, the Necromancer marries the emerald allure of absinthe with the delicate floral notes of elderflower liqueur and the nutty depth of Lillet Blanc. A whisper of lemon juice brightens the mix, while a mere touch of London Dry Gin adds structure, creating a drink that is both mysterious and exquisitely balanced.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single lemon twist, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Corpse Reviver Variation is a refined twist on the original Corpse Reviver No. 2. It combines gin's botanical depth with the citrusy sweetness of Cointreau and Lillet Blanc, balanced by lemon juice and a whisper of absinthe for an intriguing herbal bite.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pearl Button
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant Brazilian-inspired cocktail, the Pearl Button combines the smooth sweetness of cachaça with the herbal depth of Lillet, balanced by bright lime and a touch of sugar. Its name reflects its delicate yet complex character, reminiscent of a pearl's lustrous surface.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: First Emperor
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail inspired by the grandeur of ancient China, this drink harmonizes the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc with the rich, grassy notes of Rhum Agricole Blanc. Yellow Chartreuse adds a touch of bitterness and depth, while pineapple juice and simple syrup bring a subtle tropical sweetness, creating a balance that is both elegant and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A small pineapple leaf or a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Bastille
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bastille is a harmonious blend of Armagnac's rich oak notes, Lillet Blanc's herbal complexity, and Benedictine's spiced depth. Created in honor of the fall of the Bastille during the French Revolution, it embodies both historical significance and refined elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: South Slope
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, the South Slope replaces Prosecco with Lillet Blanc for a smoother, more complex profile. Its bright citrus notes from Orange Curacao and Lemon Juice are balanced by the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc, creating a sophisticated yet approachable aperitivo.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a large wine glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and a sprig of rosemary or thyme

cocktail_specs.name: 49th Parallel
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the 49th Parallel is a harmonious blend of Cognac, rye whiskey, and Lillet Blanc, with a touch of citrus and sweetness. Named after the border between Canada and the United States, it reflects the elegance and complexity often found in Canadian spirits.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or straight up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandied cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: The Saint
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail, The Saint is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc. Brightened by pink grapefruit and lemon juice, it offers a subtle sweetness from simple syrup and a gentle ginger kick, making it a versatile drink for any occasion.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Great Gatsby
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail inspired by the opulence of the Roaring Twenties, the Great Gatsby combines the crisp bite of pink grapefruit juice with the botanical complexity of gin or vodka. Its name evokes the grandeur of F. Scott Fitzgerald's iconic novel, capturing the spirit of a bygone era with its bright hue and refined balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or a thin slice of grapefruit

cocktail_specs.name: Satan's Whiskers Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Satan's Whiskers, this variation replaces traditional vermouth with Lillet Blanc for a smoother, more complex profile. The balance of London Dry Gin, Grand Marnier, and orange juice creates a rich, citrus-forward cocktail with a touch of bitterness from the Orange Bitters.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Birthday Gentleman’s Health
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and celebratory twist on the classic Gentleman's Health, this cocktail replaces traditional Chartreuse with Green Chartreuse for a more vibrant, herbal-forward profile. It balances rich, smoky Scotch whisky with floral Lillet Blanc, bright lemon juice, and the distinctive bitterness of Green Chartreuse, creating a harmonious yet complex libation perfect for toasting special occasions.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a small skewer of rosemary or thyme

cocktail_specs.name: Paddington
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and sophisticated cocktail inspired by the beloved character Paddington Bear, this drink harmoniously blends light rum, orange marmalade, Lillet Blanc, and citrus notes. Its name pays homage to the iconic bear known for his love of marmalade, creating a uniquely charming and refreshing experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A thin strip of orange peel, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Culross
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail from Scotland, the Culross is a harmonious blend of white rum's smoothness, apricot liqueur's sweet fruitiness, Lillet Blanc's herbal complexity, and lemon juice's bright acidity. It reflects the sophistication of Scottish whisky culture while embracing the tropical allure of rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained.

cocktail_specs.name: Great Northern
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Great Northern combines the herbal complexity of aquavit with the smooth sweetness of Lillet Blanc and Cointreau. Its honeyed depth and bright lemon notes create a harmonious balance that is both refreshing and spirit-forward.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Chinquapin Parish Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced punch from Louisiana, this cocktail combines the rich, oaky notes of bourbon with the floral complexity of Lillet Blanc and the sweet, fruity essence of peach liqueur. It's a harmonious blend of citrus, honey, and bitters, offering a refreshing yet layered experience that reflects its Southern roots.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice. Strain into the glass filled with ice and top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a lemon wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Fix One's Flint
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly salty twist on the classic Fix One, this cocktail replaces Cynar with Oloroso Sherry, adding depth and complexity. Its rich, nutty sherry base is balanced by the herbal notes of Lillet Blanc and a touch of saline solution, creating a drink that's both elegant and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 20-30 seconds, then strain into the prepared glass. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a single orange peel for garnish, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Tunnel Vision
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward twist on a classic French aperitif, the Tunnel Vision balances the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc with the delicate sweetness of pear eau de vie and a whisper of absinthe. Its name reflects its layered depth, much like the layers of a Parisian tunnel, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass over one large ice cube or up with soda water.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water and absinthe with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass filled with one large ice cube. Top with soda water if serving up, then float the absinthe on top.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime twist or a pear leaf for garnish (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Straw Dog
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing Scottish classic, the Straw Dog combines rich blended Scotch with Lillet Blanc, lemon juice, simple syrup, and grapefruit bitters for a harmonious blend of citrus, herbal, and malty notes. Created in the early 20th century, it's a staple in whisky cocktail lore.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks with a strawberry garnish.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Pinche Chivo
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Pinche, this version replaces traditional vermouth with Lillet Blanc, adding a floral and slightly nutty depth while maintaining its signature sweetness. Originating from Mexico, it's a refreshing yet balanced cocktail that bridges the gap between classic and contemporary styles.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass over fresh ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Brics
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and balanced Brazilian classic, the Brics combines the smooth warmth of cachaça with the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc and a touch of vodka for a uniquely layered profile. Its name is derived from the initials of its creator, Bob Bricarello, who crafted this drink in the 1980s to showcase the versatility of cachaça.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sprig of rosemary.

cocktail_specs.name: Vieux Carré
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered New Orleans classic, the Vieux Carré is a harmonious blend of rye whiskey, Cognac, sweet vermouth, and aromatic bitters. Created in the early 20th century at the St. Charles Hotel, it embodies the spirit of French Quarter elegance with its rich, slightly herbal, and bittersweet profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandied cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Bobby Burns No. 1
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and aromatic cocktail inspired by the legendary Scottish poet, Bobby Burns No. 1 combines blended Scotch whisky with sweet vermouth and Benedictine liqueur, creating a velvety-smooth, slightly herbal, and subtly spiced libation. Its name pays homage to Robert Burns, while its balanced sweetness and depth make it a perfect after-dinner drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over one large ice cube or neat in a snifter if preferred.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 20-30 seconds, then strain into a chilled rocks glass over one large ice cube. Garnish optionally with an orange peel twist.

cocktail_specs.name: Emerson
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail, the Emerson is a harmonious blend of Old Tom Gin's malty richness, Martini Rosso's fruity depth, and bright lime juice. It was created in the early 20th century at the Emerson Hotel in Boston, named after the establishment itself.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a cherry, depending on preference.

cocktail_specs.name: Queens Park Hotel Super Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail that hails from the iconic Queens Park Hotel in Toronto, this drink harmonizes rich gold rum with sweet vermouth, bright lime juice, and a touch of grenadine for a layered, slightly sweet profile. It's a testament to the elegance of classic cocktails, often served as an aperitif or digestif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a twist, or a flamed orange peel for a dramatic touch.

cocktail_specs.name: Ghost Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, the Ghost Negroni replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet and Maraschino, creating a pale, elegant drink with layers of citrus, cherry, and herbal complexity. Its ghostly hue comes from omitting the traditional bitter elements while retaining their essence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a single grapefruit peel garnish, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: The Empire Strikes Back
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces gin with chilled coffee, creating a rich, aromatic balance of bitter, sweet, and herbal notes. It pays homage to the iconic film 'Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back,' blending the depth of Campari and Amaro Montenegro with the smoothness of coffee.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a sprinkle of coffee beans

cocktail_specs.name: DJ Flamethrower
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, smoky, and complex cocktail that marries the earthy depth of mezcal with the smoothness of reposado tequila. Its name reflects its fiery spirit, balanced by a touch of sweet vermouth and citrus brightness, while cinnamon bark syrup adds warmth and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice until well-chilled, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed grapefruit twist and a flamed cinnamon stick (optional, for presentation).

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth and sweet vermouth's herbal richness, finished with a whisper of aromatic bitters. It emerged in the late 19th century at New York City's Manhattan Club, embodying elegance and balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandy-soaked cherry (traditionally a Luxardo Maraschino), garnished on the side of the glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Martinez
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic cocktail, the Martinez is a precursor to the Gibson and a classic example of early American mixology. It combines Old Tom Gin's sweet, malty profile with Sweet Vermouth's herbal depth, balanced by the fruity notes of Maraschino Liqueur and Kirsch Eau de Vie, finished with a touch of Orange Bitters for complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Persephone
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Persephone combines the warmth of Applejack with the floral complexity of sweet vermouth, the tart richness of sloe gin, and a bright citrus finish. It evokes the essence of spring, balancing sweet, sour, and herbal elements in a harmonious dance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or straight up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a single sloe berry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Boulevardier Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Boulevardier, this variation replaces whiskey with Amaro Montenegro, adding a rich, herbal depth that complements Campari's signature bitterness. It’s a spirit-forward, bitter-sweet elixir perfect for sipping slowly.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or neat in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a single orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Burschik Red Vermouth
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic twist on the classic vermouth cocktail, the Burschik Red Vermouth combines the rich, herbal complexity of Rosso Vermouth with the deep, oaky warmth of whiskey. Originating from the Burschik Cocktail Bar in Berlin, this drink is a celebration of contrast—where the bitterness of vermouth meets the smooth, caramel undertones of whiskey.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of orange peel for expression.

cocktail_specs.name: Boulevardier
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex American classic, the Boulevardier is a refined twist on the Negroni, replacing gin with rye whiskey. It offers a harmonious blend of sweet vermouth's herbal richness, Campari's bitterness, and rye's spicy depth, creating a cocktail that is both elegant and deeply flavorful.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Fruit Cup
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail with a complex interplay of sweet, citrusy, and aromatic notes. Originating in the early 20th century, it combines Cognac's rich depth with the bright tang of Orange Curaçao and the effervescence of ginger ale and cola, creating a balanced yet bold drink that is both nostalgic and invigorating.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or Collins glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger ale and cola.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and cherry, or a cocktail umbrella for a retro touch.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A quintessential Italian aperitivo, the Negroni is a perfectly balanced blend of bitter, sweet, and botanical notes. It was reportedly invented in Florence in 1919 for Count Camillo Negroni, who asked for his Americano to be strengthened with gin.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Carre Nouveau
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic French cocktail, the Carre Nouveau is a harmonious blend of Cognac, Lillet Blanc, Benedictine, Suze, and Peychaud's Bitters. It offers a complex interplay of nutty, herbal, and slightly bitter notes, making it an elegant choice for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Ransom Note
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, layered cocktail with a complex interplay of rye whiskey's spice, brandy's depth, and sweet vermouth's herbal notes. The addition of amaro ramazotti and crème de cacao introduces a velvety smoothness, while orange bitters add a subtle citrus brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a dusting of cocoa powder.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni Western
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces gin with bourbon and sweet vermouth with Lillet Rouge, adding a rich, nutty depth from Frangelico. It retains the bittersweet balance of its Italian predecessor while introducing warm, caramelized notes characteristic of American whiskey.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Sade's Taboo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail inspired by the decadent world of Marquis de Sade, this drink balances rich Cognac with the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc and Sweet Vermouth. A touch of grapefruit bitters adds a subtle citrus brightness, making it both intriguing and refined.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of grapefruit peel or a single grapefruit seed.

cocktail_specs.name: LN Mattei Cap Corse
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic infusion of Lillet Blanc with cinchona bark, this cocktail captures the essence of Corsican terroir. It offers a complex blend of herbal, citrusy, and slightly bitter notes, evoking the rugged landscapes of Cap Corse.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a small wine glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Infused for several hours or overnight.

cocktail_specs.name: Frank Sullivan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Frank Sullivan is a nod to the classic Sidecar but with a refined twist using Lillet Blanc. Its harmonious blend of Cognac's richness, Triple Sec's citrus, and Lillet's herbal notes creates a smooth, slightly bitter-sweet profile that's both elegant and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Barney Barnato
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail named after Barney Barnato, a prominent figure in the diamond industry, this drink balances rich Cognac with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and a touch of sweet orange Curacao. Its bittersweet profile makes it an elegant choice for sipping, often associated with the golden age of cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass over ice or up, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small flamed orange peel for aroma and presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Self-Starter
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Self-Starter combines the botanical depth of London Dry Gin with the floral complexity of Lillet Blanc and a touch of apricot liqueur. The minimal absinthe adds a subtle herbal note, making it both elegant and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Vesper Martini is a refined blend of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc, known for its smooth, balanced profile. It gained fame as James Bond's signature drink in Ian Fleming's novels, embodying the sophistication and intrigue of espionage.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Sunray
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail, the Sunray combines the rich caramel notes of Bourbon with the citrusy sweetness of Grand Marnier and Lillet Blanc. Topped off with fresh orange juice, it offers a refreshing yet sophisticated profile that bridges the gap between classic and modern cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small flame-orbed orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Reverse Vesper Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Vesper Martini, this cocktail flips the script by leading with Lillet Blanc and a whisper of gin, followed by vodka. It offers a refined balance of herbal, floral, and neutral spirits notes, creating an elegant, versatile drink perfect for both sipping and savoring.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled martini glass with a lemon twist garnish.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled martini glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Tuxedo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Tuxedo is a modern twist on the classic Negroni, featuring two gins for depth and complexity. It balances sweet, bitter, and herbal notes with a touch of absinthe, creating an elegant, spirit-forward drink that's both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange Twist and a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry

cocktail_specs.name: 21st Century
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the 21st Century combines the smoky depth of reposado tequila with the rich, creamy sweetness of white crème de cacao. The addition of Lillet Blanc adds a subtle herbal complexity, while lemon juice brightens the drink without overpowering its indulgent profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Charlie Lindbergh
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail inspired by the legendary aviator, this drink harmonizes the botanical brightness of London Dry Gin with the floral sweetness of Lillet Blanc and a touch of apricot brandy. Its name pays homage to Charles Lindbergh, whose transatlantic flight in 1927 symbolized adventure and innovation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of orange peel for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Campden
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Campden Hill Cocktail Club, the Campden balances the citrus brightness of gin with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc. It's a modern twist on classic French and British traditions, offering a refined, slightly sweet profile that lingers on the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Depth Charge
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that delivers a layered experience of juniper-forward gin, herbal Lillet Blanc, and a whisper of absinthe's emerald essence. This drink is a modern take on the classic Depth Charge, originally created in the 1940s by Donn Beach at the original Trader Vic's in Ensenada, Mexico.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a sprig of thyme (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Atonement
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and sophisticated cocktail inspired by the novel 'Atonement' by Ian McEwan, this drink marries the spicy warmth of rye whiskey with the rich depth of dark rum. Blanc Kina and PX Sherry add layers of sweetness and fortification, while orgeat introduces a subtle almond nuance, balanced perfectly by Ango bitters for a refined, bittersweet finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: BVD Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Americano, this cocktail replaces Campari with Blanc Kina, adding a delicate floral and citrusy complexity. It's a refreshing yet spirit-forward drink that balances sweetness, bitterness, and botanical notes, perfect for sipping in warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver #2, Cocchi
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary and complex cocktail, the Corpse Reviver #2 is a masterful blend of gin's botanical depth, Cointreau's citrus brightness, Lillet Blanc's herbal sophistication, and absinthe's emerald allure. Created by Harry Craddock in the 1930s for the Cocchi family, it is renowned for its ability to revive the senses with a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled, preferably in a coupe or vintage glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Odd McIntyre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Odd McIntyre is a harmonious blend of Cognac's oakiness, lemon's bright acidity, Lillet Blanc's herbal notes, Cointreau's orange sweetness, and a whisper of absinthe's anise. Created in the early 20th century by American bartender Harry MacElhone at the Ritz Paris, it is celebrated for its intricate balance and refined character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Almost Perfect Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Almost Perfect blends tropical pineapple rum with rich herbal amaro, delicate vermouth, and a touch of maraschino liqueur. Its name hints at its near-perfect harmony of sweet, bitter, and fruity elements, making it both complex and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 30 seconds, then strain into the prepared glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A flamed orange peel, then a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Trembling Bell
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Trembling Bell combines rye whiskey's spice with Irish whiskey's smoothness, balanced by Lillet Blanc's herbal notes and a touch of peach liqueur. Its name reflects the delicate yet potent harmony of its ingredients, making it a standout in any whiskey lover's repertoire.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist and a light dusting of edible gold leaf (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Peat's Dragon
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that harmonizes the smoky depth of blended Scotch with the delicate floral notes of Speyside single malt, balanced by citrusy Grand Marnier and herbal Lillet Blanc. The addition of dry vermouth adds a subtle bitterness, while black pepper garnish introduces a spicy contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: The Gilsey
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, The Gilsey harmonizes the bright citrus notes of Lillet Blanc with the rich, nutty depth of Cream Sherry, balanced by a whisper of Kirsch and a touch of aromatic bitters. It’s a refined aperitivo that showcases the versatility of gin while embracing the complexity of fortified wines.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, strain into a chilled coupe or over a large cube, then garnish.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist or a small skewer of orange peel for aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Broken Spanish
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Broken Spanish is a harmonious blend of Fino Sherry's nutty depth, Lillet Blanc's floral sweetness, Verjus' tart citrus, and Benedictine's herbal complexity. It reflects the layered flavors of Spanish and French traditions, making it an elegant choice for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small orange peel for expression.

cocktail_specs.name: Clockmaker
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail that blends the spicy warmth of rye whiskey with the herbal depth of aquavit, Lillet Blanc, and Amaro Nardini. The addition of Madeira adds a rich, nutty sweetness, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a single rosemary sprig, lightly bruised.

cocktail_specs.name: Traction
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Traction combines the nutty depth of Amontillado sherry with the rich caramel notes of dark rum, balanced by the citrusy sweetness of Grand Marnier. Its smooth yet complex profile makes it a versatile choice for both sipping and mixing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe or old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a brandied cherry.

cocktail_specs.name: Jabberwocky
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Jabberwocky is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity, Manzanilla Sherry's briny sweetness, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and a whisper of Orange Bitters for balance. This drink is a nod to Lewis Carroll's whimsical poem, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile that is both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Mess-cal
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the Mess-cal harmonizes white rum, rhum agricole, mezcal, Cynar, and a touch of PX sherry for depth. It's topped with a London dry gin to balance its smoky and herbal notes, creating a drink that's both adventurous and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a tiki mug or double old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over fresh ice. Garnish with cinnamon tincture.

cocktail_specs.name: L'Heritage
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, L'Heritage is a harmonious blend of Cognac's rich oak notes, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, Gentian's bitter sweetness, and a touch of aromatic bitters. It embodies the elegance of classic French mixology, offering layers of flavor that evolve with each sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass chilled.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Dry V&T
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing twist on the classic Vesper, this cocktail replaces vodka with dry vermouth, creating a bright, citrus-forward drink with a subtle herbal complexity. It’s a modern take on the Vesper, emphasizing the vermouth's elegance while letting tonic water add a light effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled glass. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a skewer of cucumber and mint

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Dry V&T
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Vesper, this cocktail replaces vodka with gin and adds tonic water for a lighter, more refreshing profile. It retains the elegance of the original while introducing a subtle effervescence and botanical depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or Vesper glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a few drops of Angostura bitters on the surface for color.

cocktail_specs.name: Spectre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Spectre is a masterful blend of London Dry Gin, Strega, dry vermouth, Lillet Blanc, and a trio of bitters. It offers a harmonious balance of citrus, herbal, and aromatic notes, with a smooth, slightly sweet finish that lingers on the palate.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Cartagena Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail from Colombia, the Cartagena Sour blends the herbal depth of blanco vermouth with the sweet, citrusy allure of blood orange juice and licor 43. It’s a modern twist on the classic sour, offering a harmonious balance of bitterness, sweetness, and floral notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish as desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a light dusting of aromatic bitters.

cocktail_specs.name: Scaramanga
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail inspired by the enigmatic villain Scaramanga from Ian Fleming's James Bond novels. This drink layers Lillet Blanc, Galliano Vanilla, banana liqueur, orange juice, and a touch of Fernet-Branca to create a harmonious blend of floral, vanilla, citrus, and herbal notes with a subtle bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a sprinkle of cinnamon or nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Riff is a modern twist on vermouth-based drinks, blending the herbal complexity of blanco vermouth with the sweet, vanilla-infused Galliano. Its bright citrus notes from lemon juice and blood orange syrup create a harmonious balance that is both refreshing and deeply flavorful.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A lemon twist and a light dusting of Galliano foam, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Trigger Finger
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a smoky, herbal profile, the Trigger Finger is a modern twist on the classic Manhattan. It balances rich Scotch whisky with dry vermouth, sweetened by hibiscus liqueur and a touch of rich syrup, creating a drink that is both sophisticated and slightly tart.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Fugu Poison
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail inspired by the deadly pufferfish (fugu), this drink balances the herbal depth of blanco vermouth with the sweet, vanilla-forward Galliano. The citrus notes add a bright contrast, making it both intriguing and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a blood orange wheel.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin & Brexit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that plays with the intensity of overproof gin, the sweet-tart depth of Unicum Zwetschle, and a whisper of absinthe for an intriguing, slightly bitter finish. Its name reflects its layered character—like the complexities of modern politics.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed lemon twist or a single green absinthe leaf for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan Corpse Reviver
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex revival of the classic Manhattan, this cocktail is a masterclass in balance, combining rye whisky with multiple vermouths for depth. It was famously recommended by Harry Craddock to revive guests at a party, hence its name.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Luxardo Maraschino cherry and orange twist

cocktail_specs.name: Faithfulness
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, Faithfulness combines the bright acidity of Sauvignon Blanc with the herbal complexity of gin and vermouth, balanced by a touch of honey syrup. Its name reflects its harmonious blend of traditional and modern elements, making it both a classic in spirit and an innovative twist on aperitivo-style drinks.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a sprig of fresh thyme

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the Whiskey Sour, the Rob Roy replaces bourbon with Scotch whisky, adding a rich, smoky depth to its balanced sweet and bitter profile. Named after the 18th-century Scottish outlaw Robert MacGregor, this cocktail is a staple in classic American bar menus.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or old-fashioned glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Murano Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, the Murano Negroni incorporates Frangelico to add a rich, nutty depth while maintaining its signature bitter-sweet balance. This variation hails from Venice and is often associated with the island of Murano, known for its glassblowing tradition.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan Island
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces rye whiskey with cognac and adds a touch of maraschino liqueur for a richer, more complex profile. It retains the signature balance of sweet, sour, and bitter elements while introducing a subtle cherry note that elevates its elegance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Brandied cherry (luxury) or a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Chass5
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Chassol, this cocktail replaces traditional Cointreau with Aperol for a lighter, more bitter-sweet profile. It balances the bright citrus notes of grapefruit and lemon with the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur, creating a harmonious blend that's both complex and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a grapefruit wedge

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Collins, this cocktail combines the tropical sweetness of mango with the bright acidity of lime juice. The addition of gin adds a subtle botanical complexity, making it a perfect summer drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tall glass filled with ice and topped with soda water.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with soda water and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Painkiller
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Painkiller, this cocktail combines rich dark Jamaican rum with mango passionfruit nectar and coconut syrup for a luscious, fruity-sweet experience. It’s a refreshing yet indulgent drink that captures the essence of Caribbean flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Apricot Mango Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail that harmonizes the sweet, tropical notes of mango with the floral complexity of gin and the rich depth of apricot brandy liqueur. The addition of orange bitters introduces a subtle, aromatic brightness, making this drink both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass over fresh ice. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a mango slice

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical twist on the classic rum barrel cocktail, this drink layers rich dark rums with mango passionfruit nectar and lime juice. It’s a vibrant, slightly sweet, yet balanced elixir that captures the essence of Caribbean sunshine.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tiki mug or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of Tajín or chili salt rim

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Scorpion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical twist on the classic Scorpion, this cocktail combines the rich caramel notes of Demerara syrup with the sweet-tart punch of mango passionfruit nectar. It's a refreshing yet slightly boozy drink that balances rum's warmth with the creamy almond undertones of orgeat.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tall, chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of chili powder or Tajín for a spicy kick.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of rich bourbon or rye whiskey, sweet demerara syrup, and aromatic bitters. Its origins trace back to the early 19th century, evolving from a simple mix of whiskey and sugar to include Angostura bitters, which add depth and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a Luxardo cherry.

cocktail_specs.name: Demerara Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces traditional bourbon or rye with aged and overproof Demerara rum, delivering rich caramel, molasses, and spice notes balanced by bright pineapple syrup. Its name reflects its Caribbean roots while honoring the spirit of the original Old Fashioned.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on a large, chilled rocks glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice for about 20-30 seconds to chill without over-diluting. Strain into the prepared glass and express an orange peel over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Jamaica Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail infuses bourbon or rye with the rich, molasses-like depth of demerara syrup and a hint of Jamaican rum. It’s a bold, spirit-forward drink that balances sweetness with the warmth of aged whisky, often garnished with a flamed orange peel for an aromatic finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Express a flamed orange peel over the drink and garnish.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Flamed orange peel, optional: Luxardo cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Cognac Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces bourbon with rich, nutty Cognac, adding depth and complexity. The addition of Peychaud's bitters introduces a subtle spice note, while absinthe brings a touch of herbal intrigue, making it a sophisticated choice for sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a rocks glass over a large cube of ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a Luxardo cherry, or a brandied cherry if preferred.

cocktail_specs.name: Last Word
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary Tiki cocktail born in the 1950s, the Last Word is a harmonious marriage of herbal, floral, and citrus notes. Its balanced sweetness and tart acidity make it both refreshing and complex, with Green Chartreuse adding depth, maraschino providing fruitiness, and lime juice bringing brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a single cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Wordsmith
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Wordsmith is a harmonious blend of Jamaican-style overproof rum, herbal Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur, and lime juice. It offers a rich tapestry of smoky, herbal, and fruity notes with a balanced acidity that makes it both intriguing and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.

ingredients.name: Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum

cocktail_specs.name: Weird Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A deconstructed twist on the classic Mai Tai, this cocktail replaces traditional orgeat and falernum with a bold blend of light and dark rums, curacao, and lime juice. It offers a rich, tropical flavor profile with a hint of complexity, making it a unique and refreshing choice for rum enthusiasts.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Across the Pacific
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, 'Across the Pacific' combines dark Jamaican rum with overproof intensity, balanced by herbal amaro and almond orgeat. Its name evokes a journey across the ocean, blending tropical warmth with sophisticated bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled tiki mug or double old-fashioned glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a prepared glass. Garnish with a flamed orange wheel if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Flamed orange wheel (optional), mint sprig, and a pinch of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Cy Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the Cy Tai harmonizes the bold, spicy character of overproof Jamaican rum with the bright acidity of lime juice, the sweet citrus notes of orange curaçao, and the earthy depth of orgeat and Cynar. This drink is a celebration of tropical flavors, blending tradition with modern tiki creativity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled tiki mug or double old-fashioned glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Heirloom Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated reimagining of the classic Mai Tai, this heirloom version layers rich, nutty orgeat with overproof rum for depth, balanced by bright lime and aromatic orange bitters. It pays homage to the cocktail's tiki roots while elevating it with refined complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled tiki mug or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell, mint sprig, and a float of orgeat or nutmeg.

cocktail_specs.name: Reddit Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Mai Tai, this version incorporates a blend of rhums and an amaro for depth. It's a rich, nutty, and slightly bitter cocktail that balances tropical sweetness with herbal complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tiki mug or highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass over crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Appleton's
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and layered cocktail that showcases the rich, molasses-forward profile of Appleton Estate's Black Barrel rum alongside a crisp, unaged rhum blanc. The addition of orange curaçao and almond orgeat syrup adds a subtle nutty sweetness, while lime juice and Angostura bitters bring brightness and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Cy Tai #2
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki-style cocktail, Cy Tai #2 brings together the rich, molasses notes of Jamaican rums with the bright acidity of lime juice and the herbal bitterness of Cynar. It's a modern take on classic tiki flavors, balancing sweet, sour, and bitter elements in a harmonious way.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a tiki mug or double old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Across the Pacific #2
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki-inspired cocktail, 'Across the Pacific #2' harmonizes aged Jamaican rum, dark overproof rum, and aged rhum agricole with bright lime juice, nutty orgeat, and aromatic bitters. It evokes the rich flavors of tropical islands while maintaining a sophisticated balance.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell and a light dusting of almond powder

cocktail_specs.name: Hantig
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic French 75, the Hantig replaces champagne with Lillet Rosé, adding a delicate floral and fruity depth. This cocktail balances the botanical brightness of gin with the effervescent sweetness of Aperol and the rich, molasses notes of aged rum.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe or champagne flute.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass. Top with Lillet Rosé and stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small skewer of fresh berries (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Watery?
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and unconventional blend of floral, citrus, and rum notes, this cocktail challenges the notion of balance with its light, refreshing profile. It combines the delicate sweetness of Lillet Rosé with the botanical complexity of Roku Gin, a touch of fortified wine, and a hint of unaged Jamaican rum for depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a light dusting of edible flowers

cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward cocktail that exemplifies the elegance of gin with its precise ratio of 6 parts gin to 1 part Lillet Blanc. This drink is a study in balance, where the botanical complexity of gin shines alongside the smooth, nutty notes of Lillet Blanc, finished with a whisper of orange bitters for depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve straight up in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: The Vesper is a sophisticated and elegant cocktail, famously associated with James Bond's drink of choice in Ian Fleming's novels. It combines the botanical complexity of gin with the smooth neutrality of vodka and the nutty depth of Lillet Blanc, creating a harmonious balance that is both refreshing and spirit-forward.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a Vesper glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a thin lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: OG Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: The Original Vesper, a sophisticated and timeless cocktail, is a masterful blend of gin's botanical complexity, vodka's neutral elegance, and Lillet's smooth sweetness. Created by Ian Fleming for James Bond in his first novel, 'Casino Royale,' this drink embodies the essence of espionage with its refined balance and understated charm.
cocktail_specs.serve: Stirred and served in a Vesper glass or chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, spirit-forward cocktail that exemplifies the elegance of gin's botanical profile paired with the subtle sweetness and complexity of dry vermouth. The name '2:1' reflects its classic ratio, a staple in cocktail lore since the early 20th century.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice and strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: None, or a twist of lemon peel for expression.

cocktail_specs.name: Marguerite
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and sophisticated cocktail, the Marguerite is a harmonious blend of floral, herbal, and citrus notes, creating a refreshing yet complex experience. Named after the French word for daisy, it embodies elegance with its use of absinthe, maraschino, and Lillet Blanc.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single edible flower, such as a violet or a small daisy.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and timeless classic, the Martini is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity with Lillet Blanc's nutty elegance. This version incorporates Bogart bitters for depth and a touch of orange Curacao for subtle citrus brightness, creating a drink that is both refined and approachable.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a chilled coupe or martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled glass without soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A twist of lemon peel or a green olive, optional.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a timeless blend of gin's botanical complexity, the bright acidity of lemon juice, and the sweet, citrusy allure of triple sec. Created in the early 20th century, it is often associated with the glamour of the Roaring Twenties and remains a staple in classic cocktail menus.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: The Stig
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that harmoniously blends the rich, apple-forward notes of Calvados with the bright acidity and citrusy character of Pisco. Complemented by the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur and a crisp Sauvignon Blanc, it offers a complex interplay of textures and flavors, making it a standout in both summer and winter settings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or over rocks.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a small sprig of fresh thyme

cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and harmonious blend of French Calvados, Italian Grappa, London Dry Gin, and Lillet Blanc, this cocktail is a celebration of diverse spirits. Its layers of apple, citrus, and herbal notes create a complex yet balanced profile, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate refined, multi-dimensional sipping experiences.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into the glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single twist of lemon peel or a small skewer of apple.

cocktail_specs.name: Sunflower
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Sunflower combines the botanical depth of dry gin with the floral notes of St-Germain, balanced by citrus and a touch of absinthe's herbal complexity. Its name reflects its sunny, refreshing character, making it a standout choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Esmeralda
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the Esmeralda is a harmonious fusion of peated Scotch's smoky depth, cachaca's fruity richness, and St-Germain's floral elegance. It balances sweetness with acidity, creating a drink that is both sophisticated and invigorating.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass.

cocktail_specs.name: In-Seine
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the In-Seine is a harmonious blend of bourbon, cognac, St-Germain elderflower liqueur, and a whisper of absinthe. This drink pays homage to the Seine River in Paris, offering a balance of sweet floral notes, rich oak, and subtle herbal bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single drop of absinthe on the surface, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and smoky affair, the Maximilian Affair marries the rich, earthy notes of aged mezcal with the delicate floral essence of St-Germain elderflower liqueur. This cocktail is a modern twist on classic French-Italian influences, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, herbal, and slightly bitter elements.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single edible flower or a light dusting of edible gold leaf (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of mezcal with the floral elegance of St-Germain, balanced by the herbal richness of Lillet Blanc. Its name evokes intrigue, much like its layered flavor profile—smoldering, aromatic, and slightly bitter-sweet.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice cube or up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A single rosemary sprig, lightly bruised and garnished on the side.

cocktail_specs.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and intricately balanced cocktail, the Maximilian Affair combines the herbal complexity of Averna with the bitter-sweet depth of Suze. This drink is a modern twist on classic amaro pairings, offering a refined experience that is both elegant and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Elderflower Champagne Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and effervescent cocktail that marries the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur with the crisp acidity of champagne, balanced by a touch of gin and lemon. This sophisticated drink is perfect for celebrations or as an elegant aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a flute glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake gin, elderflower liqueur, and lemon juice with ice; strain into a chilled flute glass filled with champagne.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Hook
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the Red Hook Distillery in Brooklyn, this drink harmonizes rye whiskey with sweet fortified wine (Punt e Mes), maraschino liqueur, Averna amaro, and Angostura bitters. It delivers a rich blend of caramelized spice, cherry sweetness, herbal bitterness, and a subtle smokiness from the rye.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or neat.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist and a cherry skewered on a cocktail pick.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Hook
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Red Hook is a harmonious blend of rye whisky's spicy warmth with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and Maraschino. The addition of Suze and Ango bitters introduces a subtle bitterness that balances the sweetness, making it a versatile drink for both sipping and mixing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks or up in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex cocktail that bridges the worlds of mezcal and cognac, the 1910 is a masterclass in balancing smoky, caramelized notes with bright cherry and aromatic bitters. Named after the year of its creation, it’s a spirit-forward drink that rewards patience and quality ingredients.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat or over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Last Insult
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Last Insult is a harmonious marriage of gin's botanical depth, lime's bright acidity, maraschino's sweet cherry essence, and fernet branca's robust herbal bitterness. It harks back to the golden age of tiki, where layers of flavor were expertly balanced to create a drink that was both invigorating and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a chilled coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice for about 30 seconds, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Luxardo cherry and a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic cocktail, the 5* (also known as the Five Star) is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, lime's bright acidity, and Amaro Montenegro's deep herbal bitterness. It's a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile perfect for sipping or sharing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime twist or a light dusting of aromatic bitters

cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the 5+* combines gin's botanical depth with the tart brightness of lime, the sweet richness of maraschino liqueur, and the herbal complexity of Averna. It’s a celebration of contrast—bitter, sweet, sour, and umami—perfect for adventurous drinkers.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the 4.5 is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin, Maraschino liqueur, lime juice, and Absinthe Mata Hari. Its name reflects the precise balance of four ingredients at 23ml each, creating a drink that is both refreshing and deeply layered with herbal, cherry, citrus, and anise notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or cherry for garnish (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Suze
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and slightly tart French cocktail, the Suze is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, the bright acidity of lime juice, and the sweet, cherry-infused depth of maraschino liqueur. Created in the 1930s at the Bar de la Coupole in Paris, it’s a sophisticated aperitif that balances sweetness with a subtle herbal bite.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a single cherry, if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Nuclear Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Daiquiri, the Nuclear Daiquiri packs a punch with its overproof rum base, layered with the herbal depth of green Chartreuse and the aromatic sweetness of falernum. This modern interpretation balances tart lime juice with a touch of water to smooth out its intensity, creating a drink that is both refreshing and deeply flavorful.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled, then strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel or twist, optional flamed orange peel for theatrical flair.

cocktail_specs.name: Rumba
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and layered tiki-style cocktail, the Rumba is a harmonious blend of dry gin's botanical depth, white overproof rum's fiery character, and a touch of sweetness from grenadine. Its balanced acidity and richness make it a versatile drink, perfect for sipping or mixing further.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, Rum Punch is a celebration of rum's versatility, blending overproof jamaican rum with bright lime juice, rich syrup, and aromatic Angostura bitters. Its bold, spirit-forward profile makes it a staple for those who appreciate deep, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or tiki mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into the glass over fresh ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Punch-Up
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum-based cocktail, the Rum Punch-Up delivers a potent kick with its overproof white rum, balanced by the bright acidity of lime juice and the sweet, aromatic depth of rich syrup. It's a modern twist on the classic punch, elevated by Angostura bitters for a touch of spice and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth No1
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail with a sharp contrast of citrus and sweetness, balanced by the effervescence of soda water. This drink is a modern take on classic tiki flavors, featuring overproof rum for depth and complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Waters of Chaos
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and intriguing tiki-style cocktail, the Waters of Chaos combines the spiced depth of Genever with the fiery intensity of overproof rum. Its herbal notes from Green Chartreuse are balanced by tart lime juice and a touch of sweetness, creating a drink that is both bold and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled tiki mug or double old-fashioned glass with a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. Top with water and stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime shell and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Dr Rieux
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail inspired by the character Dr. Rieux from Albert Camus' 'The Plague,' this drink balances the rich, apple-forward notes of Calvados with the smoothness of white rum and Swedish Punsch. The addition of orange curaçao and demerara syrup lends a subtle sweetness, while lemon juice adds a bright, citrusy contrast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe or over rocks.

cocktail_specs.name: Drunk Uncle
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the richness of Scotch whisky with the smoky depth of peated single malt, balanced by the herbal bitterness of vermouth and Cynar. This drink is a celebration of contrasts—smooth yet smoky, sweet yet bitter—perfect for those who appreciate a spirit-forward experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over ice or neat, depending on preference.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice and strain into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small peated single malt dram for garnish (optional).

cocktail_specs.name: Fall Back
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex autumnal cocktail, 'Fall Back' harmonizes the robust spice of rye whisky with the fruity depth of Calvados, balanced by the herbal bitterness of Rosso vermouth and Amaro Nonino. A whisper of Peychaud's bitters adds a subtle aromatic finish, making it a perfect libation for cooler seasons.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a sprinkle of aromatic bitters on the surface.

cocktail_specs.name: Black Manhattan
