cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, the Black Manhattan replaces sweet vermouth with Averna, creating a deeper, more herbal profile. Its dark, complex flavors—chocolatey rye, bitter-sweet Averna, and aromatic bitters—make it a favorite among whiskey enthusiasts.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a brandied cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Peat's Dragon
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Scottish-inspired cocktail, Peat's Dragon marries the smoky depth of Scotch whisky with the citrusy sweetness of orange curaçao and the herbal sophistication of Lillet Blanc. Its name hints at the fiery character of peat-smoked whisky, balanced by a touch of spice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Lion's Tail
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic cocktail with a smoky, spicy kick, the Lion's Tail is a modern twist on classic bitters. It combines bourbon's rich caramel notes with the fiery heat of pimento dram and angostura bitters, balanced by bright lime juice and sweet syrup.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Sidecar is a harmonious blend of Cognac's rich oak notes, Triple Sec's citrusy sweetness, and lemon juice's bright acidity. Created in the 1920s at Paris' Ritz-Carlton, it was named for the sidecar of a race car, symbolizing its adventurous spirit.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Maple Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and velvety twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces traditional sugar with maple syrup, adding a deep, caramel-like sweetness that complements the bold flavors of bourbon and rye. It’s a perfect balance of warmth, spice, and bitterness, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate both tradition and innovation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Tokyo Drift
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, the Tokyo Drift replaces gin with rich Scotch whisky and adds a touch of Strega for depth. This spirit-forward cocktail balances sweet vermouths with bitter amaro notes, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile that bridges traditional Italian aperitivo and contemporary mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled rocks glass over a large cube.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a light dusting of aromatic bitters on the rim.

cocktail_specs.name: Midnight Stinger
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and bitter cocktail with a smoky, herbal backbone, the Midnight Stinger balances bourbon's warmth with fernet's complexity. Its origins trace back to the early 20th century, often served as a nightcap for its robust character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Smokestack Lightning
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and smoky twist on a classic margarita, this cocktail combines the rich, peated notes of Islay Scotch with the agave sweetness of reposado tequila. Its name evokes the dramatic, smoldering flames of a smokestack, perfectly capturing its complex, charred character.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Express the lime peel over the drink and drop it in as garnish.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Mullyzoo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki cocktail, the Mullyzoo combines reposado tequila with tart lime juice, sweet maraschino liqueur, and agave syrup. Its balanced blend of citrus, cherry, and herbal notes makes it a perfect choice for warm weather or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over crushed ice. Top with soda water if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Harvest Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail marries the spicy depth of rye whisky with the fruity richness of Calvados (apple brandy), creating a harmonious blend of autumnal flavors. It’s a celebration of seasonal ingredients, offering a smooth yet complex profile that bridges tradition and innovation.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist and a Luxardo cherry, or an apple slice for a seasonal touch.

cocktail_specs.name: Harvest Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, autumnal cocktail that harmonizes the fruity depth of Calvados with the herbal complexity of vermouth and a whisper of aromatic bitters. It evokes the essence of harvest season, balancing sweetness with subtle tannic notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A flamed orange peel wheel, expressed over the drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Nuclear Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic daiquiri, the Nuclear Daiquiri replaces traditional simple syrup with Chartreuse and falernum, creating a rich, herbal, and slightly bitter profile. This modern variation is both refreshing and sophisticated, perfect for adventurous drinkers.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken, then strained into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Mistaken for Strangers
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with Green Chartreuse and grappa, delivering a complex blend of herbal bitterness, citrus brightness, and Italian spirit depth. It's a sophisticated aperitivo that balances sweetness and bitterness with a touch of effervescence.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a rocks glass over a large ice cube or straight up in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir well with ice, then strain into the glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of rosemary for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Le Dernier Mot
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, Le Dernier Mot is a harmonious blend of unaged white rum, the herbal depth of Green Chartreuse, the sweet-tart essence of Maraschino liqueur, and a bright lemon juice finish. This French creation, often referred to as 'The Last Word,' is known for its intricate balance and layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.

cocktail_specs.name: Brazilian Nail
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the sweet, smoky depth of Scotch whisky with the fruity, slightly peppery notes of cachaça. Drambuie adds a touch of herbal honeyed complexity, making this a spirit-forward drink perfect for those who appreciate layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice then strain over fresh ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Churchillian
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail named after Winston Churchill, this drink is a harmonious blend of Scotch whisky, Cognac, and a medley of amaro liqueurs. It balances rich, smoky notes with herbal and fruity undertones, offering a refined experience that pays homage to one of history's most iconic figures.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up in a coupe or Nick & Nora glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir without ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Churchillian Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Churchillian Variation is a harmonious blend of Scotch whisky, Cognac, and bittersweet amaro, with a touch of absinthe for depth. It pays homage to Winston Churchill's love for strong spirits, offering a rich, aromatic experience that balances sweetness, bitterness, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve neat in a coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin & Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless British classic, the Gin & Tonic is a refreshing blend of gin's botanical complexity and tonic water's effervescent bitterness. It originated in colonial India as a way to make gin more palatable with quinine-laced tonic water.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then strained into the glass with ice and topped with tonic water.

cocktail_specs.name: Cinnamon Girl
cocktail_specs.description: A warm, spiced twist on a classic rum cocktail, the Cinnamon Girl balances the smoky depth of reposado tequila with the bright acidity of lime and orange. Its cinnamon syrup adds a subtle sweetness and warmth, making it a perfect choice for those who love layered, aromatic cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe or over rocks.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist or a cinnamon stick

cocktail_specs.name: Naked Batida
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Brazilian Batida, this version forgoes rum in favor of natural yogurt, creating a creamy, tangy, and sweet concoction with vibrant raspberry notes. It’s a refreshing, dessert-like cocktail that balances fruity acidity with velvety texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Fresh raspberries or a sprinkle of edible flowers

cocktail_specs.name: RTV
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing French cocktail, RTV is a harmonious blend of tart verjus, sweet raspberry cordial, and the earthy depth of rhum agricole. Its name stands for 'Rhum, Tonic, Verjus,' reflecting its balanced composition that bridges the gap between classic and modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large ice cube or in a highball glass with a splash of soda water if desired.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice. Top with a splash of soda water (optional).
cocktail_specs.garnish: A few fresh raspberries and a twist of lemon peel.

cocktail_specs.name: Night-Market Gluvine
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and slightly boozy twist on a classic glühwein, this cocktail captures the essence of night markets with its spiced blackberry syrup and light red wine. It's a warm, fruity sipper that balances sweetness and acidity, perfect for chilly evenings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a heatproof mug or glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Combine ingredients in a microwave-safe mug, heat for 1 minute (or until hot), then garnish. Stir gently before serving.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Cinnamon stick, star anise, and a dusting of ground cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Iced Blackberry Horchata
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the traditional horchata, this cocktail blends creamy almond milk with cold-brew coffee and a spiced blackberry syrup. It offers a harmonious balance of nutty, fruity, and slightly bitter notes, making it a refreshing yet complex drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Blackberry slice and a sprinkle of cinnamon or nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Passing Thyme
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that marries the crisp acidity of Chardonnay with the luscious sweetness of currant jelly, balanced by the herbal anise notes of Pastis. Its name reflects its layered complexity, where thyme adds a subtle earthy depth, making it both elegant and intricately flavorful.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a sprig of thyme.
notes: One to shake, one to garnish

cocktail_specs.name: Fronds
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and aromatic cocktail that marries the herbal complexity of vermouth with the crisp sweetness of apple juice, elevated by the anise-like warmth of aquavit. Its name reflects its signature garnish—fennel fronds—which add a delicate, licorice-like aroma to this modern twist on classic ingredients.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients except soda water and fennel fronds with ice. Strain into the glass filled with fresh ice, top with soda water, and garnish with a sprig of fennel frond.

cocktail_specs.name: Blushing Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that plays with the contrast of dry vermouth's herbal complexity and sparkling apple juice's crisp sweetness, finished with a touch of grenadine for depth. Its name hints at the blush-like hue it achieves when shaken, making it a visually appealing choice for spring or summer gatherings.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a sprig of dill.

cocktail_specs.name: This Little Piggy
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and refreshing twist on the classic Gin Fizz, this cocktail replaces soda water with lemonade for a sweeter, more approachable profile. The stuffing syrup adds a subtle peach note, balancing the bright citrus and botanical gin.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sprig of rosemary

cocktail_specs.name: Sunday Roast Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A comforting and nostalgic blend of black tea, milk, and a peach-based stuffing syrup, evoking the flavors of a traditional British Sunday roast. This drink is a modern twist on classic afternoon tea, balancing earthy tannins with sweet, fruity depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve hot in a teacup or mug.
cocktail_specs.method: Steep black tea leaves in hot water for 3-4 minutes. Add milk and stuffing syrup, then strain if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A sprinkle of cinnamon or a lemon twist (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Bamboo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bamboo is a harmonious blend of fino sherry's nutty depth, dry vermouth's herbal brightness, and Angostura bitters' spicy complexity. It was created by Tio Pepe in honor of their famous bamboo barrels used for aging sherry, offering a refined, slightly sweet profile that balances elegance with intrigue.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice and strained into a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Expressed orange twist or a thin lemon peel, garnished with a small sprig of rosemary or a bamboo skewer for presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Sherry Cobbler
cocktail_specs.description: A classic, refreshing cocktail with a delicate balance of sweet and tart flavors. Originating in the late 19th century, it combines fortified sherry or Rainwater Madeira with simple syrup and is traditionally served over crushed ice, garnished with orange slices for a touch of citrus brightness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake and strain, then build on crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Queen Elizabeth
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Queen Elizabeth is a harmonious blend of dry vermouth, Benedictine liqueur, and lime juice. It was created in honor of Queen Elizabeth II and showcases the elegance of French absinthe's influence while maintaining a refined balance of citrus and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve up.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred.

cocktail_specs.name: Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and bitter-sweet Italian aperitivo, the Americano is a classic pre-dinner drink that originated in the early 20th century. It combines Campari's signature bitterness with the smooth sweetness of vermouth, topped with soda water for a light, effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve on the rocks.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred with ice, then strained into a chilled glass filled with fresh ice and topped with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Adonis
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Adonis is a harmonious blend of fino sherry's nutty depth, sweet vermouth's herbal richness, and orange bitters' citrusy brightness. It is often associated with the Tio Pepe brand and is known for its refined balance, making it a favorite among connoisseurs.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred well with ice, then strained into a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing Italian aperitivo with a bright orange hue and a balance of bittersweet Aperol, crisp Prosecco, and effervescent soda. Born in the Veneto region, it became a symbol of Italian summer culture, often enjoyed as a pre-meal libation or a celebratory toast.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a large wine glass filled with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker, then strain into the glass over fresh ice. Top with soda and stir gently.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and a sprig of rosemary or mint (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Kir Royale
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious twist on the classic Kir, the Kir Royale replaces white wine with champagne, creating a sophisticated and effervescent cocktail. Originating in France, it embodies elegance with its delicate balance of blackcurrant liqueur and crisp, bubbly champagne.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently or pour over ice if preferred.

cocktail_specs.name: Spa Water
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant cocktail, the Spa Water is a harmonious blend of cucumber's crispness, lime's zesty brightness, and mint's herbal freshness. It originated in the 1930s at the London-based club 'The Savoy,' where it was served as a sophisticated alternative to traditional gin cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake cucumber, mint leaves, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Basil Orgeat Lemonade
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and aromatic cocktail that marries the nutty sweetness of orgeat with the bright acidity of lemon juice, elevated by the herbal complexity of basil. This drink is a modern twist on classic French flavors, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, sour, and earthy notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake orgeat, lemon juice, and basil leaves with ice; strain into a glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Fresh basil leaf and lemon wheel

cocktail_specs.name: The Grey Fox
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent cocktail that plays on the delicate floral notes of Earl Grey, balanced by the bright acidity of lemon juice. This modern twist uses aquafaba to create a silky texture, making it both visually stunning and uniquely refreshing.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a drop of aquafaba on top for a pearl-like effect

cocktail_specs.name: The Placebo
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical twist on the classic Piña Colada, The Placebo replaces rum with Coco López for a lighter, more refreshing take. Its lush coconut cream base is balanced by bright citrus notes from orange and pineapple juices, finished with a touch of lime and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: A Little Time Off
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that captures the essence of a sunny afternoon. This drink harmonizes bright lemon juice, floral thyme-infused simple syrup, and effervescent ginger beer, creating a balance of citrusy zing, herbal complexity, and spicy fizz.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, shake well, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger beer.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon wheel and a sprig of fresh thyme

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing twist on the classic tonic, this cocktail combines the herbal complexity of Averna with the effervescence of tonic water. It offers a harmonious balance of bitter, sweet, and citrus notes, making it an excellent aperitivo or a light digestif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water and stir lightly to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange Twist and a Dash of Orange Bitters

cocktail_specs.name: Lillet Vive
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing twist on the classic Lillet, this cocktail blends the delicate herbal notes of Lillet Blanc with the effervescent brightness of tonic water. It's a modern take on the aperitivo style, offering a harmonious balance of floral, citrus, and subtle bitterness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing cocktail, the Gin Tonic is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity and tonic water's effervescent bitterness. Originating in colonial India during the British Raj, it has since become a symbol of sophistication and simplicity, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a palate cleanser.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wedge and a few drops of Angostura bitters (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Porto Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Gin & Tonic, this Portuguese-inspired drink replaces gin with crisp, white Portwein, creating a harmonious blend of wine's fruity notes and tonic's effervescence. It’s a refreshing yet elegant aperitivo that bridges the worlds of wine and cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.

cocktail_specs.name: Southern Cola
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth, whiskey-forward twist on a classic cola, this Southern staple balances the sweetness of cola with the rich, caramel notes of Southern Comfort and a bright citrus kick from lime juice. It's a perfect example of how Southern comfort can elevate a simple soda into something sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with cola.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wedge and a cherry, if desired

cocktail_specs.name: Cynar Soda
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly bitter Italian aperitivo, Cynar Soda is a modern twist on the classic Cynar liqueur. It combines the earthy, artichoke-infused flavor of Cynar with the crispness of soda water, creating a light yet complex drink that's perfect for warm weather or as a pre-dinner sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently and strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange twist or a small skewer of artichoke leaf for garnish

cocktail_specs.name: Vermouth Soda
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet elegant cocktail, Vermouth Soda is a refreshing blend of sweet vermouth and soda water. It emerged in the early 20th century as a light, effervescent aperitivo, often enjoyed before meals or as a palate cleanser.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a few drops of Angostura bitters on the surface for color and aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Canton Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent cocktail with a delicate balance of citrus, sweet vermouth, and soda water. This classic fizz is said to have originated in the early 20th century, reflecting the elegance and sophistication of its time.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice and sweet vermouth with ice, then strain into a glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Calypso
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Calypso, this cocktail combines bright lemon juice with sweet vermouth and tonic water for a balanced, citrus-forward sip. Its name evokes tropical vibes, though it lacks the rum or tiki elements often associated with such themes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice and sweet vermouth with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon Twist and a Sprig of Rosemary (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Italian Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth and refreshing Italian aperitivo, the Italian Cooler balances the herbal complexity of blanc vermouth with a touch of sweet grenadine and effervescent soda. It’s a lighter, more approachable cousin to the Negroni, perfect for sipping on warm afternoons.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir with ice, then strain into a chilled glass topped with soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange Twist and Angostura Bitters Float

cocktail_specs.name: Biki
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly bitter Italian aperitivo, the Biki is a modern twist on the classic Aperol Spritz. It combines the herbal notes of blanc vermouth with the bright, citrusy sweetness of Aperol, balanced by soda water for a light and effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Stirred, then topped with soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and a sprig of rosemary

cocktail_specs.name: Admiral Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly boozy highball with a tropical twist, the Admiral Highball combines bourbon's rich warmth with the bright acidity of lemon and pineapple. It evokes the spirit of nautical adventures, balancing sweet, sour, and effervescent elements for a light yet satisfying sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Pineapple Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant cocktail that blends the herbal complexity of blanc vermouth with the sweet, tropical essence of pineapple juice. This drink is a modern twist on classic aperitivo flavors, offering a light yet sophisticated profile perfect for warm weather or as an elegant pre-dinner sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Pineapple wedge and a sprig of mint

cocktail_specs.name: LLB
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and tart Swedish classic, the LLB (Lime, Lime, Bitters) is a simple yet elegant cocktail that highlights the bright acidity of lime juice with just a touch of bitterness. It’s a staple in Scandinavian bars and a perfect example of how minimalism can create maximum impact.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass or rocks glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lime juice, lemon-lime soda (zitronenlimo), and bitters with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Stir gently if serving on the rocks.

cocktail_specs.name: Cold Brew Iced Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and smooth non-alcoholic beverage, Cold Brew Iced Tea offers a mellow, low-tannin profile with subtle sweetness. It's a modern twist on a classic, often enjoyed as a base for creative cocktails or sipped straight over ice.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over a large cube of ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Brew black tea with hot water, steep for 4-6 hours, then chill. Mix sugar syrup and cold water, combine with brewed tea, and serve over ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Surfing Woman
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, citrus-forward cocktail that captures the essence of a tropical beachside vibe with its bright orange and grapefruit notes. This refreshing drink is often associated with tiki culture, evoking images of sun-soaked shores and ocean waves.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the citrus ingredients with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit slice and a maraschino cherry on a skewer, garnished with a lemon twist.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Rose
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing blend of tart lemon, sweet strawberry, and crisp grape juice, the Red Rose is a modern twist on classic rose cocktails. Its vibrant color and balanced flavors make it a perfect choice for summer gatherings or as an elegant aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice, strawberry syrup, and grape juice with ice; strain into a chilled coupe glass filled with tonic. Garnish with edible rose petals or a lemon twist if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Edible rose petals or lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Kandahär
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Swedish cocktail, the Kandahär is a playful blend of tart lemon juice, sweet grenadine, and effervescent tonic water. Its name means 'candy' in Swedish, reflecting its delightful balance of sour and sweet flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice and grenadine with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon wheel and a few raspberries

cocktail_specs.name: Highway
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that captures the essence of a road trip with its bright citrus notes, balanced sweetness, and effervescent finish. This drink is a modern twist on classic citrus cocktails, blending lemon juice, grenadine, orange juice, and tonic water for a lively, summery experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice, grenadine, and orange juice with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Yellow Orchid
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that harmonizes the bright acidity of grapefruit with the sweet, floral notes of orange juice. Its layered citrus profile makes it a perfect choice for sunny days or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lemon juice, lime juice, and grenadine with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with grapefruit juice and orange juice.

cocktail_specs.name: Florida Milk
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Milk Punch, the Florida Milk is a refreshing blend of citrus and rum, topped with creamy milk for a smooth, balanced finish. Originating from Florida's tiki culture, it captures the essence of summer with its bright, fruity flavors and velvety texture.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lime juice, grenadine, orange juice, and Oberon rum with ice. Strain into the glass filled with crushed ice. Top with milk and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Annabelle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing blend of tropical flavors, the Annabelle is a modern twist on classic tiki elements. It balances sweet grenadine with bright pineapple and orange juices, topped off with a smooth, light Cuban rum for depth.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a hurricane glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Cinderella
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical twist on the classic Cinderello, this cocktail replaces traditional grenadine with raspberry syrup for a deeper berry note. It balances sweet, tangy, and creamy elements, making it a refreshing yet indulgent choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe or martini glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into the glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a flamed orange peel if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange wheel and a cherry, flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Davis Cup
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail, the Davis Cup is a celebration of citrus with its bright lemon and orange juice base, balanced by the herbal depth of bitter lemon. It's a classic choice for those who appreciate a harmonious blend of sweet and tart flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Cola & Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent blend of cola's caramelized sweetness and the floral, bergamot notes of Earl Grey tea. This modern twist on a classic pairing creates a harmonious balance between bold flavors and subtle complexity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist or a sprig of fresh mint

cocktail_specs.name: L LB
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent cocktail, the L LB is a modern twist on the classic Long Island Iced Tea, but without the alcohol. It combines tart citrus notes with a touch of bitterness from Angostura bitters, creating a light yet complex flavor profile that's perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake without soda (for the base mixture), then top with sparkling water and stir gently.

cocktail_specs.name: Passion at the Disco
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail that blends the zesty tang of lime with the sweet, fruity depth of passion fruit syrup and the effervescent bite of tonic water. It's a modern twist on classic highballs, perfect for sipping under the disco lights or as a refreshing afternoon pick-me-up.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lime juice and passion fruit syrup with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a passion fruit slice

cocktail_specs.name: Cola & Spice
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on a classic, this cocktail combines the effervescent sweetness of cola with the bright, zesty tang of orange juice and the fiery kick of ginger syrup. It's a refreshing yet complex drink that bridges the gap between a soda and a sophisticated spirit-free cocktail.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Build in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with cola.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and a sprinkle of ground ginger or chili flakes for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Cherry Zip
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Cherry Zip is a modern twist on classic flavors, blending tart cherry juice with nutty orgeat, bright lemon, and a hint of spicy chili. It's a refreshing yet intriguing mix that balances sweetness, acidity, and heat, perfect for those who enjoy bold, layered sips.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water (optional).
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a sprinkle of chili flakes

cocktail_specs.name: Coco Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical twist on the classic Piña Colada, this cocktail replaces traditional rum with Cuban light rum and swaps in coconut syrup for a lighter, more refreshing profile. It’s a vibrant blend of peach, banana, and pineapple juices, offering a smooth, slightly sweet, and fruity experience perfect for summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a tall glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass filled with crushed ice. Top with a splash of coconut cream if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a cherry, or a pineapple leaf for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail, the Port Sour is a harmonious blend of rich tawny port, bright lemon juice, sweet syrup, and orange juice. It embodies the elegance of classic American mixology, often served as an aperitif or a palate-cleansing drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Coco
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Piña Colada, this cocktail replaces cream with coconut syrup and light rum for a refreshing, creamy-sweet profile. It’s a modern take on tiki classics, balancing rich coconut notes with bright pineapple acidity.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a chilled hurricane glass or coupe.
cocktail_specs.method: Shaken and strained.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Pineapple leaf and a light dusting of grated coconut.

cocktail_specs.name: Baby Piña Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A playful, scaled-down version of the classic Piña Colada, this cocktail captures the essence of tropical indulgence with its creamy, sweet, and slightly boozy profile. It’s a perfect choice for those who crave a lighter, more approachable take on the original, often served in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A small pineapple leaf or cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Blacky
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing German-inspired cocktail that harmonizes the tartness of cranberry with the sweetness of honey, balanced by bright lemon juice. Its name derives from 'Johannisbeersaft,' which is German for cranberry juice, making it a nod to its roots in Central European flavors.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake honey, lemon juice, and cranberry juice with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a few fresh cranberries

cocktail_specs.name: Tokyo Teenage
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical-inspired cocktail that captures the essence of Japanese youth culture with its bright citrus flavors and effervescent finish. This refreshing drink is a modern twist on classic tiki elements, blending pineapple and orange juices with lime for a lively, slightly tart profile.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over crushed ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lime juice, sugar syrup, pineapple juice, and orange juice with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lime wheel and a pineapple leaf or cherry for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: Ahorntee
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on a classic tea cocktail, Ahorntee blends the earthy sweetness of maple syrup with the bright acidity of lime juice and the floral notes of Earl Grey. It’s a harmonious fusion of autumnal flavors, often garnished with a sprig of rosemary or a lemon twist for an elegant touch.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake lime juice and maple syrup with ice, strain into the glass filled with Earl Grey tea, top with soda water, and gently stir. Garnish if desired.

cocktail_specs.name: Colito
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and refreshing twist on the classic Cola, the Colito combines the effervescent sweetness of cola with the bright acidity of lime juice. It's a modern take on a simple yet delightful cocktail that bridges the gap between soda and spirit-free cocktails.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into a chilled highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with cola.

cocktail_specs.name: Apple Frazzle
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and zesty cocktail that combines the crisp sweetness of apple juice with the bright acidity of lemon, balanced by a touch of sugar syrup. This drink is a modern twist on classic fruit-based cocktails, perfect for those who enjoy a light, effervescent sip.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake sugar syrup and lemon juice with ice, strain into the glass filled with apple juice and soda water, then stir gently.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Lemon twist and a thin apple slice

cocktail_specs.name: Nutty Frappe
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, nutty twist on the classic Frappé, this cocktail blends anise and almond flavors with cola for a refreshing yet complex profile. It’s a modern take on the Absinthe Frappé, reimagined with orgeat to add depth and sweetness.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tall glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktail_specs.name: Power-Shake
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-style cocktail, the Power-Shake is a luscious blend of tropical juices, sweet grenadine, and effervescent soda. It's a nod to the classic Shaker style, offering a creamy, fruity profile that's both nostalgic and invigorating.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a highball glass over crushed ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake grenadine, orange juice, and pear juice with ice; strain into a highball glass filled with fresh crushed ice. Top with soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange slice and maraschino cherry, skewered on a cocktail pick

cocktail_specs.name: Jupiter
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail inspired by the Roman god, Jupiter. It combines the nutty sweetness of orgeat with bright citrus notes from orange juice, balanced by a subtle grape juice element, topped off with crisp soda water for a light, effervescent finish.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake or stir with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Orange wheel and a sprinkle of almond flakes (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Kleine Königin
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing German cocktail, the Kleine Königin translates to 'Little Queen' and is a harmonious blend of almond orgeat, raspberry juice, milk, and soda. Its light sweetness and creamy texture make it a perfect choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a tall glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake the first three ingredients with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice and top with soda. Stir gently to combine.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Raspberry leaf or a few fresh raspberries

cocktail_specs.name: Mandelshake
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, nutty, and slightly sweet cocktail that hails from the 1950s, the Mandelshake is a delightful blend of almond syrup (orgeat), milk, and grenadine. Its velvety texture and balanced flavors make it a beloved choice for those who appreciate a smooth, dessert-like drink.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: A few drops of grenadine on top to create a layered effect.

cocktail_specs.name: Black Baby
cocktail_specs.description: A decadent, creamy twist on the classic Black Russian, the Black Baby replaces vodka with crème de cassis and adds a touch of milk for a velvety texture. Its deep red hue and rich berry notes make it a standout cocktail, perfect for indulgent moments.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Cranberry twist and a dusting of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Honigflip
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, creamy Dutch classic with a velvety texture and a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and eggy notes. Traditionally made with honey syrup, cranberry juice, milk, and egg yolk, this cocktail is often enjoyed as a dessert-like drink or a comforting nightcap.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a chilled coupe glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled, then strain into the glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Wheeler Dealer
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, this cocktail replaces whiskey with a lively blend of juices—grapefruit, orange, and grape—layered over grenadine for a deep red hue. It's a modern, fruit-forward drink that balances sweetness and tartness, perfect for sipping in warm weather.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve in a tall glass filled with ice, garnished with a grapefruit twist or a skewer of fresh berries.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake grenadine, orange juice, grapefruit juice, and grape juice with ice; strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with tonic water.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Grapefruit twist or a skewer of fresh berries

cocktail_specs.name: Nuts & Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on traditional tea, this cocktail combines the earthy depth of black tea with the nutty richness of orgeat, balanced by bright pineapple juice. It's a modern take on the classic 'Tea Cocktail,' offering a harmonious blend of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve chilled in a highball glass with ice.
cocktail_specs.method: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Top with soda water if desired (though it's not traditionally included).
cocktail_specs.garnish: A few drops of orange bitters on top and a lemon twist for garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: A Day in the Sheds
cocktail_specs.description: This playful and refreshing cocktail captures the essence of a lazy afternoon with its bright apple brandy, cooling cucumber shrub, and sweet fortified wine. The addition of salted potato chips and pickled cucumber adds a savory crunch, making it a unique and memorable experience.
cocktail_specs.serve: Serve over ice in a highball glass.
cocktail_specs.method: Stir gently with ice, then strain into the glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water if desired.
cocktail_specs.garnish: Salted potato chips, pickled cucumber slices, and a sprig of fresh thyme
